EC 07 Sh 97
DHARMA ID: INSEC07Sh097

[page 73]97 At the same village, on a stone in the talavâra’s field.


I.
śrîmat-parama-gambhîra-syâd-vâdâmôgha-lâñchhanaṃ |
jîyât traiḷôkya-nâthasya śâsanaṃ Jina-śâsanaṃ ǁ

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-prithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâja parmêśvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭâ-
rakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam
uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire Kalyâṇapura-
da nelevîḍinoḷ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyutt ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi |

II.
svasti samasta-vastu-guṇa-bhûshaṇan abdhi-parîta-bhûtaḷa- |
prastuta-kîrtti Bhâvabhava-mûrtti Jayâ-vanitâ-prapûrṇṇa-vṛi- |
tta-stana-hâra ...... vâñchhita-kalpa-kujânusâran a- |
bhyasta-kaḷâgama-jñan ene Gaṅgarasaṃ sarasaṃ dharitriyoḷ ǁ
vinayâdhâram udâram unnati kulaṅg .. śvaryyam emb |
inituṃ śôbhise śôbhe-vettan enutuṃ dhâtrî-taḷaṃ kûrttu kî- |
rttane-geyguṃ jayad-uttaraṅganan aśêsha-śrî-varddha ... prasaṅ- |
gan ............ vitaraṇa-vyâsaṅganaṃ Gaṅganaṃ ǁ

ant enisi negardda Nîtivâkya-Koṅguṇivarmma dharmma-mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvaraṃ Ku-
vaḷâḷa-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ Nandagiri-nâthaṃ sakaḷa-guṇa-sanâthaṃ mada-gajêndra-lâñchhanaṃ
paripûrṇṇîkṛita-vibudha-jana-manô-vâñchhanaṃ Padmâvatî-labdha-vara-prasâdaṃ mṛigamadâmô-
daṃ Gaṅga-kuḷa-kuvaḷaya-śarach-chandraṃ maṇḍaḷika- .. draṃ darppôddhatârâti-maṇḍaḷika-
vanaja-vana-vêdaṇḍa durddhara-gaṇḍa nâmâdi-smaasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśva-
raṃ Tribhuvanamalla Bhujabaḷa-Gaṇga-Permmâḍi-Dêvara paṭṭa-mahâdêvi ǁ

III.
puṭṭida ... anujaṃ | Paṭṭiga-Dêvaṅge Gaṅgavâḍige taḷedaḷ |
paṭṭaman esed ire Gaṅgana | paṭṭa-mahâdêviy-antu nôntarum oḷarê ǁ
parivâra-surabhig antar̤- | pura-mukhya-maṇḍanege Gaṅga-mâdêvige nâyaki- |
yaran ad ... oḍaṃ sati | dore ...... nṛipa ...... paḍeye ǁ

ant avargge ǁ

IV.
Gaṅga-kuḷa-tiḷakar enisida | Gaṅga-nṛipaṃ Mârasiṅga-nṛipa Goggi-nṛipaṃ |
tuṅga-yaśan enisidaṃ Kaliy- | aṅga-nṛipaṃ negardar eḷege kumârâgraṇigaḷ ǁ
Kôḷâla-pura-varêśa-nṛi- | pâḷa-sutar mmada-gajêndra-lâñchhanar ari-bhû- |
pâḷa-kuḷa-vanaja-vana-śuṇ- | ḍâḷar nnegardar ssamasta-su-bhaṭâgraṇigaḷ ǁ

ant enisi negardda Gaṅga-Permmâḍi-Dêvaruṃ Gaṅga-mahâdêviyaruṃ kumâra-varggamuṃ Maṇḍa-
ḷi-sâsirad-oḷagaṇ-Eḍehaḷḷiya vîdinoḷ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam iral â-mahâ-
maṇḍaḷêśvaran-arddhâṅga-lakshmi ǁ

ant enisi negarda śrî-Pârśvanâtha-dêvargge Châlukya-Vikrama-varshada 37 neya Nandana-saṃ-

bâḍaṃ Bûdaṅger̤eyal Banniker̤eyal taḷa-vṛitti gardde mattar mûr̤u tôṇṭa mattar ondu gâṇav
eraḍu Purada Koliyo .. â-yeraḍûra taḷa-bhaṇḍada suṅkav oḷagâgi yint initumaṃ Bhujabaḷa-

rasanuṃ Mârasiṅga-Dêvanuṃ Goggai-Dêvanuṃ Kaliyaṅga-Dêvanuṃ samasta-pradhânara nâḍa-

mûḷadoḷ dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭaru ǁ

dhare pusivôgade beḷag î- | dhareyaṃ bhuja-baḷadin âḷda Bhujabaḷa-Gaṅgaṃ |

98 At Sâvagoṇḍanahaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone in the south-east lane.

EC 07 Sh 99
DHARMA ID: INSEC07Sh099

[page 76]99 At Bannikere (same hobli), on a stone, south of the Kallêśvara temple.


I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ parama-bha-
ṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmad-Bhûlôkamalla-Dêva vijaya-râjyam
uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ saluttam ire ǁ tat-pâda-padmôpa-
jîvigaḷ appa Satyavâkya-Koṅguṇivarmma dharmma-mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ Koḷâḷa-pura-
varêśvara Nandagri-nâthaṃ sakaḷa-guṇa-sanâthaṃ mada-gajêndra-lâñchhanaṃ chatura-Virincha-
naṃ Padmâvatî-labdha-vara-prasâdaṃ mṛigamadâmôdaṃ Gaṅga-kuḷa-kuvaḷaya-śarach-chandraṃ
maṇḍaḷika-Dêvêndraṃ Nanniya-Gaṅgaṃ jayad-uttaraṅgaṃ darppôddhatârâti-vanaja-vana-vêdaṇ-
ḍaṃ dusṭara gaṇḍaṃ nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîmâd-Bhûlôkamalla-Vîra-Gaṇga-Perṃmâḍi-
Dêva[ś chi]araṃ jîyât ǁ svasti samasta-guṇa-gaṇâḷaṅkaraṇa satya-śauchâchâra-châru-charitra-naya-
vinaya-śîḷa-guṇa-sampanna su-jana-prasannan âśrita-jana-kalpa-vṛiksha sakaḷa-kaḷâ-sikshâ-dakshan
akhiḷa-sâmanta-santâna-sandhâraṇa Jina-dharmma-harmya-ramya-ratna-tôraṇa nija-kula-kuvaḷa-
ya-sudhâkara samyaktva-ratnâkaran âhârâbhaya-bhaishajya-śâstra-dâna-vinôda sakaḷa-janâhlâda
râya-śrêshṭhi-mukha-tiḷaka Jina-pûjôtsava-harsha-puḷakaṃ śrîman-mahâ-vaḍḍa-vyavahâri Siddhige-
Seṭṭiyara Vîra-Gaṅgarasara snêham anavarataṃ saluttam ire | śrî-Vîra-Gaṅgarasaru Gaṅgavâḍi-
tombhattar̤u-sâsiradoḷage Maṇḍali-nâḍoḷage Kannakâpurada kôṭeyaṃ mâḍi tri-bhôgâbhyantaraṃ
sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam iralu Siddhige-Seṭṭiyara viśishṭar appa Aṅkamayya-
Nâyakaruṃ Bhâskara-Seṭṭiyaruv â-kôṭeya pûrvva-bhâgada Mûlasthâna-dêvara munde bâviyan
agaḷisidoḍ â-bâvigaṃ dêvarggav avaran uddêśisi Gaṅgarasaruṃ Banniker̤ey-ûr-oḍeya Rudrama-
yyanuṃ śrîmach-Châḷukya-Vikrama-varsha[57th]neya Plavaṅga-saṃvatsarada Vaiśâkha-śuddha 15
Âdivâra-byatipâta-sôma-grahaṇad andu dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭa bhûmi (here follow details of gift) int î-dharmmaman âvan orvvaṃ pratipâlisidavarige tri-bhuvanâdhipatyam akkum î-dharm-
man âvan-orabban aḷi .. n ene pâtakaṃ sa-kuṭuṃbame 21 taleya pitṛigaḷum rauravakk iḷivaru
(usual final verse)

(Front) Gaṇâdhipatayê namaḥ ǁ namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

śrî-jaya | Śâlivâhana-śaka-varuśa ↓21499 varuśa Siddhârti-nâma-saṃ | da-Âśvîja-su 10 lu Ra ǁ Hire-
[page 78]Hanumappa-Nâyaka ........ âtana kumâra Raṅgapa-Nâyakaru ................. Mayagoṇḍa-Gauḍ
Koḍamagi gaḍege ... vâḍi âta manige bandu yivara hoṇe koḍi yandu kêḷidalli Mayagoṇḍa-
Gavuḍanu Timmappanu hoṇe koṭanu | Kariyanṇanu Hoḷehonnura gauḍa Mallappana hoṇe ko-
ṭanu | appaṇe kêḷikoṇḍu Mayagoṇḍa-Gavuḍanu haṇḍege kêḷikoṇḍanu | sâtorige ga 10 ge pârige
ga 50 mâḍi ...... kuḷitu hanneraḍu | nâva-dhânyava kuḍisi kuḷitu bhisi heṇḍe-mâḍi tukada bâki
tukada tupa | haṇḍenu Mayagoṇḍamaṃ Goṭe-Gavuḍana menayoḷage pûjisi Mayagoṇḍa-Gavu-
ḍanu tamma bandhu-baḷagava kûḍikoṇḍu uṇḍu simê-gauḍike vuṭam idisi ûṭada akki ma gaṇḍuga
karurchu .. poṭara | heṇḍe hotu Mayagoṇḍa-Gavuḍa hotu mude mumḷu âne hinde Ânavêri-Hanu-
manta-dêvaru horaṭu nimma sakharu sahavâgi horaḍisikoṇḍu | heṇḍe hotu munde nâḍavaru â-
heṇḍe mundake sâgihôguvâga nâḍiga Yaṅkapanu aḍa-biddu vêḍikoṇḍâga âlada-marake gotu
maḍi | alle sura-chandra mêle kallu neṭu â-kallu salugallu neṭu yitake heṇḍe holake kalu neṭṭu |
yivu chandra yirita âbhôpadu (back) heṇḍe holâd abhivare ... 2 akaḍi 60 maru 5 Mayagoṇḍa-Gavu-
ḍage palisi koṭa vuḍugore(re)mêḷu varahada hachaḍa koṭaru idake tapidare Gôpi-dêvi-padake
tapida hâge | koṭṭanta dharma tapidare Bhîma-Râma-padake tapida hâge | Mayagoṇḍa-Gavuḍana
mani-dêvaru Makaḍi-Maḷlêśvara-dêvaru yidake heṇḍe holan anubhavisi baruvadu tanna âyusa-
parambhapariyadalli anubhavisi baruvadu nâyikaru guṇikararu muntâgi yiddakke sakshi (here follow names of other witnesses) tanna sannumatadinda vappita-hâki barakoṭṭa barahavu sîme-gavu-
ḍiki sannumatadinda barakoṭṭanthâ baraha yint ivara sannumatadinda baradanthâ syânabhôga-
Yaṅkaṇana baraha tâmrada śâsana śrî

shavâgi | ya koḍaliyandu kêḷiḍarinda bhûmiyanu koṭṭadarinda bhûmiyanu nanage palisidarin-
da dêvara kîrti bahaḷa-kâla anubhavisabahudu | kîrtiya ruta yidarinda tanna manasu harushav-
âgi ...... mannoṭe grâmada vaḷage ga 60 varahada bhûmiyannu kallu neṭṭu phalisi koṭṭadarinda

naḍeyabêku yendu vandu gamavannu avussarada hesaru hâki janaru kûḍi naḍiyabêku yendu

bêku yendu â-grâmavanu huginu hoyisi pâlisi koṭṭaru sari yendu voppisi gauḍa Mallappa-Gauḍanu
tanna magaḷige daṇêru koṭṭanthâ sari-grâma Varada-Gauḍanu tanna magaḷige moktada yilla

EC 07 Sk 5
DHARMA ID: INSEC07Sk005

5 At Îsûr (Shikârpur hobli), in front of the Kôṭe Râmêśvara temple.


svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâ-
rakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Traiḷôkyamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam
uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-bara saluttam ire tat-pâda-padmô-
pajîvi samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmantâdhipati mahâ – prachaṇḍa – daṇḍanâyakaṃ
vairi-bhaya-dâyaka satya-Râdhêyaṃ śauch-Âñjanêya sujana-prasanna nuḍidu mattenna śrîmat-
Traiḷôkyamalla-Dêva-pâdâbja-bhṛiṅga sâhasôttuṅga nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-sahita śrîman ......
verggaḍe-daṇḍanâyakaṃ .. (4 lines effaced) sarôjinî-râja ...... rṇṇâvataṃsa ripu-vijaya-daksha ...
...... per̤age paḷivara paṇḍati gaṇḍa ... danti .. kâr̤a raṇa-raṅga-nîr̤a pusivara bâyaṃ suḍuva
pisuṇara nêlvva ... jaya-lakshmî-tôraṇaṃ Nâkiya-gandha-vâraṇa nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ
śrîmad-daṇḍanâyakaṃ Kêsi-Râjanuṃ samasta-guṇa-virâjitan appa śrîmat-perggaḍey – Âyvamay-
yaṅgaḷu Saka-varsha 983 neya Plava-saṃvatsarada Bhâdrapada-sudda 9 Śômavâradandina Kanyâ-
saṅkrân (left side) .... bâra .................. dêvargg .......... (usual final phrases and verses)

srî svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêsvara parama-
bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Traiḷôkyamalla-Dêvara vijaya-

mantrôstâha-sakti(ya)-sampannar appa śrîmat-pergge[ḍe]-Sôvanâtaiya gaṇa ..........
........................ tam ire Sakha-varsha 984 neya Śubha[kṛi]t-saṃvatsaṛada Puśya-su 10

sirikaṇḍaṃ dhûpa modalâda dêvara aṅga-raṅgakke ............ keye kapâlakke .. vaḍḍa-râvuḷa

I.
śrî-Gaṇêśâya namaḥ |

jayaty âvishkṛitaṃ Vishṇôr vârâhaṃ kshôbhitârṇavaṃ |
dakshiṇônnata-daṃshṭrâgra-viśrânta-bhuvanaṃ vapuḥ ǁ

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâ-
raka Hastinâpura-varâdhîśvara arôha-Bhagadatta ripu-râya-kântâ-datta-vaidhavya Pâṇḍava-kula-
kamala-mârttâṇḍa êkâṅga-vîra raṇa-raṅga-dhîra Aśvapati-Râya-diśâpaṭṭa Gajapati-Râya-saṃhâ-
raka Narapati-Râya-mastaka-taḷa-prahâri sâmanta-mṛiga-châmûra Koṅkaṇa-chatur-diśâ-bhyaṅkara
chachcha-puṭa châcha-puṭa Îśvara-mukha-kamala-vinirgata-śuddha-sâraṅga-Brahma-vîṇâ-[vâ]di
Bharata-śâstra-prasiddhânêka-śâstra-pravîṇa Kôraṇṭaka – Vyâḷi-Nâgârjunâdi-mantra-śâstra-prasi-
ddha samudaya-namita-pâdâravinda ari-râya-kula-vilaya-kâlânala nîtyâkara parâṅganâ-putra suva-
rṇa-varâha-lâñchhana-dhvaja samasta-râjyâvaḷî-virâjita samâlaṅkṛita-śrî-Sôma-vaṃśôdbhava śrî-

dakshiṇa-diśôpakramaṃ râjyaṃ dig-vijayaṃ yâti vijayaṃ karômi Tuṅgabhadrâ-Haridrâ-saṅgamê
śrî-Harihara-dêva-sannidhau kaṭakam utkalitaṃ Chaitra-mâsa-kṛishṇa-pakshê Sômadinê tṛitîyâ-
yâṃ Viśâkhâ-nakshatrê saṅkrântê vyatîpâta-tan-nimittê sarpa-yâgaṃ karômi Banavase-pannirchhâ-
sira-sahasra-tan-madhyê Baḍagaṇa-Yaḍanâḍa-yappattara tan-madhyê śrî-anâdy-agrahâra-Bêgûra-
grâmât Brâhmaṇât Kannaḍa-śâkheya Śrîvatsa-gôtrada Sômêśvara-paṭṭavardhanaru Kannaḍa-śâ-
kheya Vaśishṭha-gôtrada Mâdhava-Bhaṭa-paṭṭavardhanaru Kannaḍa-śâkheya Gautama-gôtrada

I.
namas tasmai Varâhâya lîlayôddharatê mahîṃ |
khurântara-gatô yasya Mêruḥ kaṇakaṇâyatê ǁ

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ pramêśvaraṃ parama-

lyâṇadoḷ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyvuttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi samadhigata-
pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmantâdhipati mahâ-prachaṇḍa-daṇḍanâyakan Anantapâḷana besadiṃ

andin-uttarâyaṇa-saṅkramaṇa-nimmittaṃ śrîmad-agrahâraṃ Mârasiṅgana Bêgûra Vishṇu-dêvargge
dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ .. ḍi â-grâmada aḍakeya vaḍḍa-râvuḷada suṅkadoḷage mû ... aḍakeya suṅka-
mumaṃ mattaṃ tammage naḍeva kir̤u-kuḷa-suṅkadoḷage bilkaḍeya eleya pêr̤iṅge dasavandamumaṃ

oḍaṃbaḍisi Châḷukya-Vikrama-kâlada 14 neya Śukla-saṃvatsarada Jêshṭha-mâsada amâvâsye-

EC 07 Sk 16
DHARMA ID: INSEC07Sk016

[page 86]16 At the same place.


I.
pratyaksha-vastu-vishayâya jagadd-hitâya
viśva-sthiti-praḷaya-saṃbhava-kâraṇâya |
sarvvâtmanê vijita-kôpa-Manôbhavâya
tubhyaṃ namaḥ tri-bhuvana-prabhavê Śivâya ǁ

svasti samasta-bhuvnâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallaba mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭâ-
raka Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam
uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire ǁ svasty akhiḷa-
jagad-utpatti-sthiti-praḷaya-saṃhâra-kâla-kâraṇa – Garuḍa-dhvaja – Pannagaśayana-nâbhî-kamaḷâ-
sana-Brahma-Lakshmî-viśâḷa-vaksha-sthaḷa-ha ... vatî-sarôja-virâjamânaru Rug-Yajus-Sâmâtharbba-
vêdâṅgôpâṅga-lakshaṇa-lakshitaru yajana-yâjanâdhyayanâdhyâpana-pâragaru agnisṭômâdi-sapta-
sôma-saṃsthâvabhṛitaru rakta-sarasîruhôdara-daḷa-nibha-Chatur-vvaktra-śâstra-shaḍ-aṅgâshṭâda-
śa-smṛiti-purâṇa-kâvya-nâṭakârtha-grantha-prayôga-pada-vinyâsa-lalitâṅgôpâṅgar Mâhêśvara-Vai-
shṇavêty-âdi-samaya-niyamastharu Nyâya-Vaiśêshika – Lôkâyata – Sâṅkya – Bauddha-Mîmâṃsâdi-
tarkka-śâstrâgama-pariṇataru saptarshi-samânar êka-vâkyar aśêsha-dik-prakâśita-kîrtti-dhvajaru
dvâtriṃśat-sahasra-samayâgragaṇyar śrî-Mallikârjjuna-dêva-labdha-vara-prasâdita-puṇyar appa
śrîmad-agrahâraṃ Bêgûra sâsirada mûnûrbbaru Châḷukya-Vikrama-varshada 10 neya Krôdhana-
saṃvatsarada Chaitra-bahuḷa 11 Âdityavâra Mêsha-saṅkramaṇadandu ǁ yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-
dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭhâṇa-japa-samâdhi-nishṭhitaru Kapi-gôtra-pratishṭhitaru Koḷḷagar-
adhishṭhitar appa śrîmatu Sôviyaṇa-Bhaṭṭara magaṃ Nâraṇa-Bhaṭṭara magaṃ gôtra-pavitraṃ
Appaṇa-Bhaṭṭaru pâda – pûje goṭṭu dêsiga – pravâsigar-âhâra – satrakke devasaluṃ brâhmaṇar
uṇbantâgi Nar̤ila-ker̤eya keḷage kachchaviya gaḍiṃbadalu biṭṭa gal̤de kamma ayvattu 50 satrakke
maney ondu 1 (usual final phrases and verses)

II.
mad-vamśajâr̤ para-mahîpati-vamśajâ vâ
pâpâd apêta-manasô bhuvi bhâvi-bhûpâḥ |
yê pâlayanti mama dharmam imaṃ samastaṃ
têbhyô mayâ vîrachitâñjalir êsha mûrddhni ǁ
EC 07 Sk 17
DHARMA ID: INSEC07Sk017

17 At the same place.


(Lines 1 to 6 the same as in No. 16 above) svasti yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-
mônânushṭhâṇa-japa-samâdhi-śîla-sampannar aśêsha ........ Rug-Yajus-Sâmâtharbba-pâra-
gar agnishṭômâdi-viśishṭêshṭa-vidvaj-janaru ...... rasîruhôdara-daḷa-nibha-Chatur-vvaktra-
śâstra-shaḍ-aṅgâshṭâdaśa ........ kârttha-grantha-prayôga-pada-vinyâsa-lali .........
saṃpannar appa śrîmad ......... samasta-guṇa-sampannar appa Âṅgira .........
............. charitra Bhâradvâja-kuḷa .......... dhâraṇiyoḷ ...........
...... raṇa-vivêki vimaḷa .......... râjita ..... saṃyak-kuḷâbdhîndra ................

[page 87]18 At the same place.


I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ
II.
viśuddha-jñâna-dêhâya tri-vêdî-dibya-chakshushê |
śrêyaḥ-prâpta-nimittâya namas Sômârddhadhâriṇê ǁ

Gaṇa ... svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-sabda-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvarṃ Kâḷâñjara-pura-varâdhîśvara
suvarnna-vṛishabha-dhvaja ḍamaruga-tûryya-nirgghôshaṇa Kaḷachuryya-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍa
mâna-Kanakâchaḷa subhaṭar-âditya kaligaḷ-aṅkusa gaja-sâmanta śaraṇâgata-vajra-pañjara pratâ-
pa-Laṅkêśvara para-nârî-sahôdara Sanivâra-siddhi giri-durgga-malla chalad-aṅka-Râma vairîbha-
kaṇṭhîrava nissaṅka-malla namâdi-samasta-prasasti-sahitaṃ śrîmatu bhuja-baḷa-chakravartti Tri-
bhuvanamalla-Bijjaṇa-Dêv-arasaru sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire ǁ svasti sama-
dhigata-pañcha-mahâ-sabda-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvaraṃ Kôḷâla-pura-varâdhîsvaraṃ Nandagiri-nâthaṃ
mada-gajêndra – lâñchhanaṃ Padmâvatî-labdha-vara-prasâda mṛigamadâmôda Gaṅga-Gâṅgêya
jayad-uttaraṅga mârkkôla-Bhairavaṃ nâmâdi-samasta-prasasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsva-
raṃ Nanniya-Gaṅga-Permmâḍi-Dêv-arasaru Yeḍevaṭṭe-yepa .. Beḷḷave-yeppattumaṃ Narive-
ḷigeyumaṃ anâdiy-agrahâraṃ Bêgûraṃ sukhadin âḷuttam ire |

vṛi ǁ
III.
bêḍidaḍ allad îyadu niḷimpa-kujaṃ karad îva dânadiṃ |
nôḍe surâvanîjam adu pêḷ doreyê maṇi chintisalke kai- |
gûḍuvad allad irddaḍ adu tâṃ kuḍad artti-janakke râgadiṃ |
nîḍ irad îvan î-vasudheyoḷ sale Nanniya-Gaṅga-bhûbhujaṃ ǁ

mattêbha ǁ

âtana sahajâta-yugar | nnîti-vidar mMalliyaṇṇanuṃ Masaṇeyanuṃ |
bhû-taḷadoḷ .. ta saha- | jâtaṅgaṃ bhaktar avaniṃ per̤ar oḷarê ǁ

â-sênabôva-Sôva-Gauḍa Mâdimayyaṅge śrêyôrttham âgi svasti Śaka-varshsha 1081 Bahudhânya-
saṃvatsarada Bhâdrapadad amâvâse-sûrya-grahaṇa-dina-traya-saṅkramaṇa-byatîpâta-puṇya-ti-
thiy andu sâsirada mûnûrvvariṅge pâda-pûjeyaṃ koṭṭ oḍambaḍisi Uttara-Maḷḷikârjjuna-dêvargge

ôṃ ǁ
I.
pratyaksha-vastu-vishayâya jagadd-hitâya
viśva-sthiti-praḷaya-saṃbhava-kâraṇâya |
sarvvâtmanê vijita-kôpa-Manôbhavâya
tubhyaṃ namas tri-bhuvana-prabhavê Śivâya ǁ

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ parama-
bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Traiḷôkyamalla-Dêvara vijaya-
râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire | tat-
pâda-padmôpajîvi samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaran udâra-Mâhêśvaraṃ cha-
lake bal-gaṇḍaṃ sauryya-mârttaṇḍaṃ patig êka-dâḍaṃ saṅgrâma-Garuḍaṃ manuja-Mândhâtaṃ
kîrtti-vikhyâtaṃ gôtra-mâṇikyaṃ vivêka-Châṇâkyaṃ para-nârî-sahôdaraṃ bîra-Vṛikôdaraṃ kôd-
aṇḍa-Pârtthaṃ saujanya-tîrtthaṃ maṇḍal̤ika-kaṇṭhîravaṃ para-chakra-bhairavaṃ râya-daṇḍa-Gôp-
âḷa maleya-maṇḍal̤ika-mṛiga-śâl̤dûl̤aṃ śrîmat – Traiḷôkyamalla – Dêva-pâda-paṅkaja – bhramaraṃ
[page 89]man-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Lakshmarasar Banavâse-pannir-chchhâsiramumaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-viśi-
shṭa-pratipâḷanadiṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire | Eḍeveṭṭ-erppattarkkaṃ
Jyôgayyaṃ manneyan âgi sukhadin âḷutt ire ǁ

kanda ǁ
II.
kari-ghaṭegaḷ-oḍḍanoḍey ir̤i- | d ari-baḷamaṃ geldu chakri Tailapanaṃ saṅ- |
garaḍoḷ mechchisid adaṭaṃ | para-baḷa-mallaṃ pratâpi Kontada-Bîraṃ ǁ
śrîmad-Vaiśyânvayadoḷ | sâmânyame Bal̤cha-kulada Kontada-Bîraṅg |
â-mahimey-uttavaṃ maga- | n î-mahiyoḷ negal̤dan avana taneyaṃ Sômaṃ ǁ
âtana su-putran ahita- | vrâta-bhayaṅkaran udâri gôtra-pavitraṃ |
nîti-vidaṃ dharmmaṇyaṃ | bhû-taḷadoḷ negal̤da Biruda-Sarvvanyâṅkaṃ ǁ
Hara-charaṇa-kamaḷa-bhṛiṅgaṃ | dhuradoḷ per̤apiṅgan anya-vanitâ-putraṃ |
sthira-vâkyaṃ budha-mitraṃ | sura-taruv eredavarge Biruda-Sarvvanyâṅkaṃ ǁ

âtaṃ Mârasiṅgana Bêhûral il̤du Birudasarvvajñaghaṭṭa-modalâge palavuṃ ker̤egaḷaṃ kaṭṭisi
tanna kaṭṭisida Sarvajñagaṭṭiṅgam alliya Mallikârjjuna-dêvara maṭhada vidyârtthigaḷ-âhâra-dâ-
nada śatrakkaṃ Pâvaṭa ... manneyaṃ Jyôgayyanumaṃ Bêhûra Sânta-Gâvuṇḍanuṃ Kêta-
Gâvuṇḍanuman oḍaṃbaḍisi śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Lakshmarasar alli sarvva-namasyam
âge paḍedu Saka-varsha 988 neya Parâbhava-saṃvatsarada Bhâdrapadada puṇṇame-Sômavârada
sôma-grahaṇa-parvva-nimittadiṃ śrîmat-Kâśmîra-paṇḍita-dêvara śishyar svasti yama-niyama-svâ-
dhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-japa-samâdhi-shaḍ-aṅgôpahârâdi-sampannar appa śrîmat-Triḷôchana-paṇ-
ḍita-dêvara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ Mallikârjjuna-dêvara gal̤deyiṃ paḍuvalu pokkariṇi-
yiṃ baḍagalu biṭṭa gal̤de ...... Birudasarvajñagaṭṭiṅge ker̤e-goḍaṅgege ker̤eya keḷage .........

20a At the same place.


I.
pratyaksha-vastu-vishayâya jagadd-hitâya
viśva-sthiti-praḷaya-saṃbhava-kâraṇâya |
sarvvâtmanê vijita-kôpa-Manôbhavâya
tubhyaṃ namas tri-bhuvana-prabhavê Śivâya ǁ
II.
prachaḷita-ravîndu-maṇḍaḷam âkuñcḥita-Śêsham uchchaḷaj-jaḷadhi(ḥ) |
uddhûḷitasya Śaṃbhôr ubhaya-karâsphâḷanaṃ jayati ǁ

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâ-
raka Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷaka Châḷukyâbharaṇa sâhasâḷaṅkaraṇa gaṇḍaroḷ gaṇḍaṃ têja-mârttaṇḍaṃ
śaurya-Nârâyaṇaṃ chatura-Chârâyaṇaṃ chauvâṇa-Sahasrabâhu ripu-râja-Râhu kîrtti-Vidyâdha-
raṃ vikrama-Śrîdharaṃ kôdaṇḍa-Râmaṃ mârppaḍe Bhîmaṃ mallikâmôdaṃ tyâga-vinôdaṃ ari-râ-
ya-taleya karavattaṃ râya-pratâpâdityaṃ gaṇḍa-baṅgâr̤aṃ Kali-yuga-nîr̤aṃ ripu-nṛipati-hṛit-sellaṃ
Jagadêkamallaṃ śrîmaj-Jayasiṃha-Dêvar nija-vijaya-kaṭaka-samanvitaṃ lîḷâ-viḷâsadinde Tagiril̤a-
nelevîḍinoḷ Saka-varsha 953 ya Prajâpati-samvatsarada Paushya-suddha-pañchamî-Bṛihaspati-
vârad andu Banavâsi-pannir-chchhâsirada kaṃpaṇaṃ Eḍeveṭṭav-eppattar̤a baḷiya Bêhûra Mârasiṅ-
ga-Gâvuṇḍaṃ Jagadêkamalla-Gâvuṇḍa-vesarumaṃ samasta-râjya-chihnamuma aṅkagâbhinava-têja-
mumaṃ paḍedu tanna tammaṃ Dêka-Gâvuṇḍaṃ mâḍisida Śivâlayakke khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-nava-karm-
ma-pûjâ-nimittaṃ vṛitti vêḷkum endu binnapaṃ geyye tad-varshâbhyantarad uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrama-
ṇadandu dêvatârchchanânantaraṃ dêva-dvija-guru-sâkshiyaṃ aṇṇaṃ Vijayâditya-Dêvana praadhân
[page 90]Padmanâbhayyana Guṇavarmmayyan-âṇatiyiṃ â-dêgulada ker̤eya keḷage kachchaviya gaḷiṃ-
badoḷe biṭṭa gal̤de gaḷeya mattar 3 beddale mattar 5 aḍakeya tôṭadalu varshakke maradal ond
aḍake eleya suṅka maneya nelasaṇaṃ mûḍaṇa per-bâgiliṃ por̤age | teṅka sêtuvina baḍagaṇa-
kôḍi | mûḍa dêvâlayaṃ | baḍaga Nêr̤ilaker̤e | nandâdîvigege gâṇaṃ ma 6 r̤u

EC 07 Sk 20b
DHARMA ID: INSEC07Sk020b

20b


mattam â-nâḍa manneyaṃ ari-nṛipa-madêbha-(kumbhi)-kuṃbha-sthaḷa-sphâḷana-kisôra-kêsarî pa-
ra-baḷa-kêsarî | vairi-baḷa-jaḷadhi-baḍavânaḷaṃ | drôha-kâḷânaḷaṃ | vikrânta-tuṅgaṃ | Chavvana
siṅgaṃ | parivâra-chintâmaṇi | su-jana-chûḍâmaṇi | ripu-nṛipati-nikshatraṃ | gôtra-pavitraṃ |
pratipaksha-râkshasaṃ | yuddha-samakshanuṃ | nuḍidante gaṇḍaṃ | gaṇḍa-prachaṇḍaṃ | śrîmatu
manneyaṃ Jôgayyaṃ Saka-varsha 971 neya Virôdhi-saṃvatsarada Mâghad-amâvâsye-Maṅgaḷa-
vâra-vyatîpâta-sûryya-grahaṇad andu Bêhûra Mallikârjjuna-dêvage alli tanage naḍeva mânyada
keyyoḷage biṭṭa gaḷde 9 gaḷeya matta 1 â-kaṃpaṇada baḷiya Navileyale berddala mattar 2 Dê-
vaṅgêriya mane .. initumaṃ pratipâḷisuvar | (usual final phrases and verses.) ... Kâḷamukha-
samaya-samuddharaṇar śakti-parisheya bhujaṅga ......... Kâśmîra-paṇḍita-dêvara śishyar ......
...... samâdhi-saṃpannar appa śrîma ............ kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâ ......
......... śrî-Mallikârjjuna ............

EC 07 Sk 25
DHARMA ID: INSEC07Sk025

25 At Arasanagere (same hobli), on a stone in front of the Dûdihaḷḷi Channappa’s house.


śrî-Gaṇâdhipatayê namaḥ |

I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varsha 1437 neya Yuva-saṃvatsarada Vaiśâkha-śu 3 lu
śrîmatu Âpastaṃbha-sûtrada Harita-gôtrada Kôṭhîśânvayada Mâdhavârâdhya-oḍeyara kumâraru
Hariharârâdhyarige Âśvalâyana-sûtrada Vaśishṭa-gôtrada Haṇṇi-Mâdarasara makkaḷu Śivana-
samudrada Tipparasara makkaḷu Triyaṃbakarasaru koṭṭa agrahârada śilâ-śâsanada kramav
ent endare Kṛishṇa-Râya-mahârâyaru sukhadiṃ râjyavan âḷuttaṃ yiddalli â-râyaru namage
nâyakatanake pâlisida Mâḷênahaḷḷi-sîmege saluva Mâdaravaḷḷi-grâmad – oḷagaṇa Bayirâpurav
eṃba grâmavanu prâkali sûryyôparâga-puṇya-kâladalli śrî-Hariharanâtha-prîtiy âgi Harihara
purav âda Bayirâpuravanu nimage sa-hiraṇyôdaka-dâna-dhârâ-pûrvvakav âgi koṭṭev âgi â-grâma-
maṇḍala hoḷê-daṇḍey âgi vâsakke saṅkôchav âgal âgi Arisinagêri-sîme-oḷage grâma-maṇḍalakke
takkashṭu bhûmiyanu dhârên er̤adu Vâmana-mudre-kallanu neṭisi koṭṭev âgi â-Bayirâpurada
holada chatus-sîmeya vivara (after details of boundaries) yint î-chatus-sîme-oḷag-uḷḷa nidhi-nikshêpa-
jala-pâshâṇa-akshîṇi-âgâmi-siddha-sâdhyaṅgaḷ eṃba ashṭa-bhôga-têja-sâmyagaḷanu â-chandrâr-
kka-sthâyigaḷ âgi nimma santâna-pâraṃparey âgi sukhadiṃ bhôgisi bahiriy endu nâvü naṃma
sva-ruchiyinda oḍaṃbaṭṭu koṭṭa Hariharapurav emba pratinâmadhêyav âda Bayirâpurada agrahâ-
rada śilâ-śâsana ǁ (usual final verses)

II.
sarvêshâṃ chharditaṃ bhuṅktê śvâpi sva-chchharditaṃ na tu |
tataḥ kashṭatarô nîchaḥ sva-dattasyâpahârakaḥ ǁ

Triyaṃbaka-dâsa baraha śrî ǁ

EC 07 Sk 26
DHARMA ID: INSEC07Sk026

29 At Kûḍagere (Beḷandûr hobli), on copper plates.


(I b) siddham ǁ śrî-vijaya-Vaijayantyâṃ dharmma-mahârâjaḥ Svâmi-Mahâsêna-mâtṛi-gaṇânudhyâ-
tâbhishiktaḥ Mânavyasa-gôtrô Hâritî-putraḥ pratikṛita-svâdhyâya-charchchakaḥ Kadaṃbânâṃ
śrî-vijaya-Śiva-Mândhâtṛi-varmmâ (IIa) anêka-suchirêṇôpachita-vipula-puṇya-skandhaḥ âhavâr-
jjita-vipula-parama-dṛiḍha-satvaḥ sa vatsarê dvitîyê Vaiśâkha-paurṇamâsyâṃ Kodmâla-grâmê
sîmni sa-pânîya-pâtaṃ sa-dakshiṇaṃ su-khaṭva-vâsaudanaṃ (II b) a-bbaṭa-pravêśaṃ a-taskara-
vishṭakaṃ Kauṇḍinyasa-gôtrâya dattânuyôgâya Taittiriya-sabrahmachâriṇê Dêva-śarmmaṇê Moḍe-
karani-nâma-pâlaṃ râja-mânêna viṃśati-nivarttanaṃ kêdâraṃ dattavân (III a) pramâdât adhar-
mmâd vâ yô’syâbhihartâ sa pâtaka-samyutô bhavati uktañ cha

I.
sva-dattâṃ para-dattâṃ vâ yô harêta vasundharâṃ |
shahasti-varsha-sahasrâṇi narakê pachyatê tu saḥ ǁ

yô’sya abhirakshitâ sa tat-phala-bhâk uktañ cha

II.
bahubhir vasudhâ bhuktâ râjabhis Sagarâdibhiḥ |
yasya yasya yadâ bhûmiḥ(bhûmas)tasya tasya tadâ phalaṃ ǁ

Dâmôdaradattêna rahasyâdhikṛiêna likhitêyaṃ paṭṭikâ

EC 07 Sk 30
DHARMA ID: INSEC07Sk030

[page 92]30 At the same village, on a stone near the Siddhêśvara temple.


svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâra-
kaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmaj-Jayasiṅgha-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam â-chan-
drârkka-târaṃ-baram uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhige saluttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi samadhigata-
pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Banavâsi-pura-varêśvaraṃ Châmuṇḍâ-labdha-vara-pra-
sâdaṃ vairi-ghaṭâ-kêsari su-jana-kaivâran ârôhaka-Triṇêtraṃ Mada-dhunî – dhavaḷaṃ gaja-râja-
mallaṃ kaṭakada gôvaṃ ari-baḷa-timira-mârttaṇḍaṃ saraṇâgata-vajra-pañjaraṃ ripu-kuñjarâṅkuśa-
nâmâdi-samasta-prasasti-sahitaṃ śrîmad-Ir̤iva-Beḍeṅga-Dêvara magaṃ śrîmat-Kundamarasar Bana-
vâsi-pannir-chchhâsiramuṃ Sântaḷige-sâsiramumaṃ Biḷavṛittiyaṃ tri-bhôgâbhyantara-siddhiyin-
dam âḷuttam ire tat-putra samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmantaṃ vijaya-lakshmî-kân-
tan ayyana siṅga siṅgan-aṇugaṃ | samara-prachaṇḍaṃ komara-mârttaṇḍam maṇḍaḷika-kumara-
gaṇḍa-gaḷa-gattariy ârôhaka-gaja-kêsari kaṭakam âbhîśa virôdha-nâśaṃ sâmanta-biruda-bhêruṇ-
ḍaṃ mûr̤u-râya-sâmanta biruda-gaṇḍa-mukha-darppaṇaṃ dushṭêbha-mallaṃ dhûrtta-jana-hṛit-se-
llaṃ niṭṭ-elv-uḷḷa-biruda-peṇḍati-gaṇḍaṃ sâmanta-Garuḍaṃ Tivuḷa-baḷa-jaḷadhi-mathana-mantha-
nôdbhava-jayâṅganâliṅgita-viśâḷa-bhuja-daṇḍaṃ | etta gâḷi bîsit attaṇa-biruda-peṇḍati-gaṇḍaṃ
Kaliyuga-nîr̤aṃ Kundaman-aṅka-kâr̤a-nâmâdi-samasta-prasasti-sahitaṃ srîmat-Satyâśraya-Dêvar
Sântaḷige-sâsiramaṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadindam âḷuttuṃ ǁ Saka-varsha 953 neya Pramôdôt[a]
saṃvatsarada Paushya-babuḷa 13 Maṅgaḷavâramum uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrântiy andu Koḍalâ-tîrtha-
maṃ mind alliya mûla-sthânaṃ Piṅgaḷêśvara-dêvarggaṃ Svayaṃbhu-dêvarggaṃ nitya-nivêdyaṃ
sthânakkam enduṃ tîrthadiṃ teṅka Gâṅger̤ey-êriya keḷage Sattigâla-bayaloḷ Bâḷachandra-Jîyara
śishya Sântasiva-Bhaḷârara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-purvvakaṃ koṭṭa gal̤de gaḷeya mattar eraḍu
aṅkadoḷaṃ matta 3 int î-keyge mêrey âvud endaḍe (here follow details of boundaries) int î-dhar-
mmaman âr-orvvar pratipâlisidavargge Śrîparvatadoḷ êḷu-kôṭi-liṅgakke nitya-nivêdyam iṭṭa pha-
ḷaṃ sâsir-brâhmaṇargge sâsira-kavileya koṭṭa phaḷaṃ | int idan âr-orvvar aḷid-arasanakke gavuṇ-
ḍanakke Vâraṇâsi-Prayâge-Arghyatîrthaṃ-Kuru kshêtradoḷe sâyira-tappodhanamuṃ sâyira-brâ-
hmaṇarumaṃ sâyira kavileyuman aḷida pañcha-mahâ-pâtakana pôda-lôkakkê pôdan adhô-gatig
iḷidaṃ ǁ (usual final verses)

Yimmaḍi-Pratâpa-Dêva-Râyaru sukha-râjyam geyiva Śaka-varuśa↓1 sâvirada munnûr̤a ar̤uvatta-êḷa-

da-su 8 Maṃ śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa-Dêva-Râyaru Vijeyânagariya
siṃhâsanadalli sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadi samasta-râjyamaṃ pratipâlisutt iddalli Dêva-Râya-Oḍe-

mukhakke Râma-Gavuḍaru hôgi yiddu alli dêvara pâdava kûḍidanu â-sthitiyanû Yirugappa-Voḍe-

[page 95]40 At Chikka-Beḷuguñji (same hobli), on a vîrakal built into the roof of the Vîrabhadra temple.


I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

Saka-varusha sâ 1353 neya Sâdhâraṇa-saṃvatsarada Kârttika-ba 13 svasti śrî râjâdhirâja râja-pa-
ramêśvara śrî-vîra-pratâpa-Vijaya-Râya-mahârâyara kumâra Dêva-Râya-mahârâyaru Vijayanaga-
riya-paṭṭaṇadallu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyaüttam irddu Gôve Chandraguttiya râjya-
vanu bhaṇḍârada Ârsappagaḷa maga Handiya-Râyan âḷuttam irddalli Posagundada Sômayi-dê
vara sthânika ... dinde Sôvi[ya]rasanu mar̤e mâri binnahaṃ mâḍi â-Posagundakke dhâḷiya
mâḍidalli â-Posagundada dânamûḷi Hanneker̤eya Sâta-Gavuḍana maga Keñche-Gavuḍa ser̤e sûr̤e-
hôhalli kâdi bedakalu î-kalu naḍuvalli â-Keñche-Gavuḍana guru Śivarâtraiya-Oḍeyarige sejya-
goḍaneyalli kha 3 da polana dhâren er̤adu âtana svargakke saḷisi baradu kaḍisi naṭṭa kall ûru-
bhûmiya dhâren er̤edavaru Nâga-Gavuḍa Kâmi-Gavuḍa Nâgarasiyâ er̤adu naṭṭa vîra-
gallu î-kalla kaḍidâta Tammôjana maga Kalikôja maṇgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî

43 At Guttanahaḷḷi (same hobli), on a stone in the Sînappa’s field to the north of the village.


svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusa sa 1445 neya Svabhânu-saṃvatsarada Mâgha-bahu-
ḷa 30 Guruvâ | ashṭa-graha-yôga kûḍidali Gadigina Mali-Seṭṭiyara maga Sômi-Seṭiyarige śrî-kara-
[page 96]ṇada-Triyambaka-arasaru namage Ambaṭekoppada sîmeya mâgaṇiyâgi pâlisida Barûra Guttana-
haḷiyalu Barûra śrî-Siddê-dêvara ... tri-kâla-amṛitapaḍige saṭaṇa-khaṇḍugada holake maṅgaḷa
mahâ śrî śrî

EC 07 Sk 44
DHARMA ID: INSEC07Sk044

44 At Barûru (same hobli), on a stone in the enclosure of the Siddhêśvara temple.


I.
śrî-paramêśvaran akshaya- | rûpakan amarôragêndra-vandita-charaṇaṃ |
pâpa-haran appa Śambhuva- | n âpottuṃ neniya ...... Kalêśvaranaṃ ǁ

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama .....
Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇa śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva-vijaya-râjyam utta ...
bhivṛiddhi-pravardhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi sam-
adhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmantâdhipati mahâ-prachaṇḍa ... nâyakav ari-bhaya-
dâyakaṃ sakaḷârtthi-kuvaḷaya-chandara vipra-Vidyâdhara chatura-Chaturânana sauryya-pañchâ-
nanaṃ pati-hit Âñjanêya sâhasa-Vainatêya Hara-charaṇa-kamaḷa-sha .. araṇa guṇa-gaṇâbharaṇa
daṇḍanâtha-maṇḍana-mâṇikya purâ ... Châṇukhya vâg-vadhû-vadana-maṇi-darppaṇa vandi-vṛinda-
santarppaṇa saraṇâgata-vajra-pañjara nâmâdi-samasta-prasasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-sênâdhipati
mâ-pradhânaṃ daṇḍanâyakaṃ Barmma-Dêvarsar Banavâse-pannir-chchhâsiramumaṃ Sântaḷi-
sâsiramumaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâḷaneyiṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyam geyyuttam
ire Saka-varsha 999 ya Naḷa-samvatsarada Śrâheyoḷ Bidiyabe Bidiyamayyana putraṃ Dâyima-
Gôsâsi üra samîpada teṅkaṇa ker̤eyaṃ kaṭṭisi kâlanta gaḷêlu dharmmamaṃ mechchi Bariyûra-(y)-
ûroḍeyaṃ Biṭṭimayya-pramukha-mahâjanam aśêshaṃ nered il̤du dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi Dâyima-
Gôsâsige koṭṭa ûra samîpada guṇigana nâlku matta ... n â-Dâyima-Gôsâsi alliya Mûlasthâ-
nada Siddhêśvara .... ttarâyaṇa-saṅkrânti-vyatîpâta Âdityavâra .... pûrvvakaṃ
mâḍi biṭṭan â-keyyoḷage nivêdyaka ...... biṭṭa mattaru mûr̤u dêvara nanḍâ-dîvigege
.... (usual final phrases and verse)

45 On copper plates from Gauja-agrahâra (same hobli).


(Nâgari characters.)

Nandi

I.
(I b) ...... âvishkṛitaṃ Vishṅôr vârâhaṃ kshô .... |
............... bhuvanaṃ vapuḥ ǁ

svasti samasta-bhuvanâsraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêsvara parama-bhaṭṭâ-
raka Hastinâpura-varâdhîsvara ârôhaka-Bhagadatta ripu-râya-kântâ-datta-vairi-vaidhabya Pâṇḍa-
va-kula-kamala-mârttaṇḍa kadana-prachaṇḍa Kaḷiṅga-kôdaṇḍa gaṇḍa-mârttaṇḍa êkâṅga-vîra raṇa-
raṅga-dhîra Asvapati-Râya-disâpaṭṭa Gajapati-Râya-samhâraka Narapati-Râya-mastaka-tala-pra-
hâri hayârûḍha-prauḍha rêkhâ-Rêvanta sâmanta-mṛiga-chamûra Koṅkaṇa-châtur-disâ-bhayaṅkara
nitya-kara parâṅganâ-putra suvarṇṇa-varâha-lâñchhana-dhvaja samasta-râjâvaḷi-virâjita-samâlaṅ-
kṛita śrî-Sôma-vaṃsôdbhava śrî-Parîkshich-chakravarttî tasya putra Janamêjaya-chakravarttî Has-
tinâpurê sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdêna râjyaṃ karôti dakshiṇa-diśâvarê dig-vijaya-yâtrêyaṃ vijayaṃ
karômi Tuṅgabhadrâ-Haridrâ-saṅgamê śrî-Harihara-dêva-sannidhau kaṭakam utkalitaṃ Chaitra-
[page 97]mâsê kṛishṇa ........ karaṇa-uttarâyaṇa-saṃ .... (II a) vyatîpâta-nimittê sûryya-par-
baṇi arddha-grâsa-gṛihîta-samayê sarppa-yâgaṃ karômi Banavâse-pannirchchhâhasra-madhyê
khampaṇa-Sântalige-sâhasra-madhyê Gautama-grâmât brâhmaṇâ Kannaḍa-śâkheya Gautama-gô-
trada Gôvinda-paṭṭavarddhanaruṃ Kannaḍa-śâkheya Vasishṭha-gôtrada Vâmana-paṭṭavarddha-
naruṃ Kannaḍa-śâkheya Bhâradvâja-gôtrada Kêśavayajva-dîkshitaruṃ Kannaḍa-śâkheya Śrî-
vatsa-gôtrada Nâraṇa – dîkshitaruṃ chatur-mukha-nânâ-gôtrêbhyô dvâtriṃśat-sahasra-brâhmaṇâ
sarppa-yâga-pûrṇṇâhuti-tad-aṅga-samayê mantrâṅga-praṇamaṃ karôti chakravartti mechchi pañ-
châṅga pasâya chhatra sukhâsana balada gaddige aṅka-daṇḍa khaṇḍaṇâ nâḍu biṭṭiga aliya suṅka
ashṭa-bhôga-têja-svâmya Gautama-grâma tan-madhya-pravishṭa Nâḍavalli Bâḍaballi Chikka-Hâ-
rika Doṇanduru Talaṅger̤e Sulligôḍu Togaru Ganja Âluru Bâcheyanahalli Champagôḍu Kir̤a-
Sampagôḍu êvaṃ dvâdaśa-grâmât sarba-namasya-dhârâ-pûrbakaṃ datta tasya grâmasya sîmânt-
arâṇi kathaṃ (rest contains details of boundaries and usual final verses)

45 (bis)↓1 At the same village, on a stone in the enclosure of the Gautamêśvara temple.


(Front) svasti śrî sâmanta-Râma-Dêvaṃ ... Gautamêśvarâ-bhaṭâraṅge koṭṭadu bali â-chandra-târaṃ
nindadu mûnûr̤-âr̤uvatu devasakke bali ǁ soḍaruṃ â-chandra-târakaṃ prâkâramuṃ gôpuramuṃ
Mal̤avantu datti | svasti śrî Gautuma-grâmada sâsiravvarguṃ koṭṭavu mûr̤uṃ sâle â-chandra-
târakaṃ Mavaḷḷiâ mûsâsirvvargguṃ sâle | Brahmapuradâ mahâjanakke śâle Nirvvarêrâ mahâ-
janakke sâle â-chandra-târakaṃ ǁ Pol̤ala-sâsirvvarguṃ sâle â-chandra-târakaṃ Kuppuṭûrâ-sâsir-
vargguṃ sâle â-chandra-târakaṃ Tadamûrâ-sâsirvvargguṃ sâle â-chandra-târakaṃ Miṭṭiseâ ma-
hâjanakke sâle Eleseâ-sâsirvvargguṃ sâle Muṭṭaguppeâ-sâsirvvargguṃ sâle â-chandra-târakaṃ ǁ
Tâgaratteâ mahâjanakke sâle â-chandra-târakaṃ Veḷiyavûrâ mahâjanakke â-chandra-târakaṃ
eraḍu sâle ǁ Banniûrâ mahâjanakke eraḍu sâle â-chandra-târakaṃ Kesavûra mahâjanakke sâle
â-chandra-târakaṃ ǁ Sâr̤ede-mahâjanakke eraḍu sâle â-chandra-târakaṃ Munniyûrâ sâsirvvarg-
guṃ sâle â-chandra-târakaṃ Vêḷuvâyâ mahâjanakke eraḍu sâle â-chandra-târakaṃ Pettiḷadâ
mahâjanakke sâle â-chandra-târakaṃ Kâkiyadâ mahâjanakke sâle â-chandra-târakaṃ Pârvvanâ
Kochâlge sâle â-chandra-târakaṃ ǁ svasti śrî Digal̤ara Besugi koṭṭadu gô-sahas[r]a nâlku-kêrige
ner̤eye gô-sa[ha]sraṃ śrî-Âdepa-Mudapparâ magana El̤ekêsigaḷa peṇḍara madake Gautamêśva-
rakke koṭṭadu soḍaruṃ prasiddha-sâleyuṃ â-chandra-târakaṃ kavi .. Kêsiriyamma uyyâ
Sante-Er̤eyamma koṭṭadu śâle svasti śrî Medagoṇḍavârâ magan Kavaḍe koṭṭadu soḍaruṃ .
vara magan Siridêvan koṭṭadu sâle Gautumêśvara ...... svasti śrî .....
... permmakkaḷa santâna pârvvanti Niyûra mahâjanakke koṭṭadu sâle â-chandra-târakaṃ
.. śrî-Kaḍab ..... gaḷ Er̤eyave dêgula mâḍisi maṇ goṭṭoḷ mâjana .....
soḍaruṃ sâleyuṃ chattîsa-sâle â-chandra-târakaṃ (2 lines illegible)

(back) svasti śrî Maṇarâ-padumaḍigaḷ Gautama-stanakke koṭṭadu sâle â-chandra-târakaṃ
svasti śrî Bâṇigâra-Kaṇṇamman Pṛithivî-Gôsâsi-Kaṇṇapparasara magandi bhâgiy akkuṃ aḷivon
pañcha-mahâ-pâtakan śâle idu â-chandra-târakaṃ kâvon kalyâṇa- ... gi Arasi-Makottigaḷ Gautu-
ma-stânakke koṭṭadu śrî-Kadambarâ magandir Âjavammarasar (svasti śrî pṛithivî-ballabha mahâ-
râjâdhirâja paramêśva) Kaṇṇâchâriya likhitaṃ svasti śrî pṛithivî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja para-
mêśvara Kannarasaṃ pṛithivî-râjyaṃ geyye Bâṇigarâ magan Kaṇapori-Dharmma-Nâyigage koṭṭa-
[page 98]du eraḍu sâle aṭṭ uṇbôdu â-chandra-târakaṃ kâvon kalyâṇa-bhâgi aḷidon pañch-mahâ-pâtakan
svasti śrî-Gaṇḍarasar pṛithvî-râjyaṃ geyye Koḷavara-Kovayan Gautama-stânake koṭṭadu soḍaruṃ
sâleyuṃ â-chandra-târakaṃ nindatu kâvon kalyâṇa-bhâgiy akkuṃ aḷivon pañcha-mahâ-pâtakan
akkuṃ svasti śrî Âtrêyara bâsadigaḷa Mâgaṭṭira Kavageti ... Gautuma-stânake soḍaruṃ
sâleya koṭṭadu â-chandra-târakaṃ svasti śrî Koḍala-Jakkara Poleyammanâ śâle padinêl̤u dharaṇa

valada śâleyuṃ soḍaruṃ koṭṭadu â-chandra-târakaṃ kâvon kalyâṇa-vâgiy akkuṃ al̤ivon ....

Gavudada bhaṭâraṅge koṭṭadu sâle â-chandra-târakaṃ

svasti śrî Nekuṇḍara Vâjupêyâjiyâ magan Jannan koṭṭadu sâle â-chandra-târakaṃ śrî Kadamba-
ra Ajammarasara Gautama-stânakke koṭṭadu soḍaru â-chandra-târakaṃ kâvon kalyâṇa-bhâgi aḷi-
von pañcha-mahâ-pâtakaṃ svasti śrî Kavilara magaḷdir Sarvasar̤ara Isadigaḷge koṭṭedu Er̤etimasa
koṭṭadu purvva-sâle svasti śrî Varigara Polemuḍi koṭṭadu soḍaru â-chandra-târakaṃ svasti śrî
Attâruga-Nâgayyana magan Kander̤eyan koṭṭadu soḍaru panneraḍu gaddaṇa â-chandra-târakaṃ
Senendyara Śrî-dêvi koṭṭadu soḍaru â-chandra-târakaṃ svasti śrî Âtteyarada-ser̤e-sarvvatiḍyan
koṭṭadu śâle â-chandra-târakaṃ svasti śrî Si .. koṭṭadu soḍaru â-chandra-târakaṃ svasti śrî
Âtteyara Kêsaṇṇana magan Siridêvape koṭṭadu śâle â-chhandra-târakaṃ

49 At the same village, an a vîrakal in the Bhûtana-bana.


Saka-varsha 1081 neya Pramâdi-saṃvatsarada Âśvayuja-śu 1 Sômavâradandu svasti yama-niya-
ma-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânusṭhâna-japa-samâdhi-sîla-guṇa-sampannaru êkâgra-samâ-
dhi-śâstra-smṛiti-mârgga-nirataru pada-byâkaraṇa-nirṇṇayânîkaruṃ chatur-vvêda-mukhôdgataruṃ
śabda-śâstrâḷaṅkaraṇa .... mukha-darppaṇaruṃ japa-dhyâna .. bhâvaruṃ Śiva-pâdârchchi
[page 100]taruṃ ..... samaya ... kṛipâḷaruṃ hita ..... Brahma-vamśôdbhavaruṃ nir-
ṇaya ... vairi-ghaṭa-sarppa .....................
............... appa śrîmatu Kumâra-Bîrarasaru .......
.... Kâḷa-Saṅkaṇṇa .......... Hayya kâdi tur̤uvaṃ magurchchi sâyalu
dêva-kannakiyaru bandu dêva-lôkakke koṇḍu-hôgal âtana vîratvake mechchi âtana .. bîḍiṅ-
ge Gaudada mûvatt-ir-chchhâsira-aśêsha-mahâjanaṅgaḷu śrîmatu Kumâra-Bîrarasaru ....

EC 07 Sk 50
DHARMA ID: INSEC07Sk050

50 At the same place, on another stone.


svasti samasta-bhuvana ........................ pravarddhamâna .............. mahâ ...
............ mûr̤u-sâsiramumaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-viśishṭa-pratipâḷaneyiṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôda-
diṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire svasti yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭhâṇa-japa-
samâdhi ...... sampannar appa śrîmad-agrahâraṃ Gaudada mahâjana mûvatt-ir-chchhâsira ......
Saka-varsha 997 neya Râkshasa-saṃvatsarada Mâgha ......... Kaḷi-Sântara-Dêvaru ......
ttiyalu .................. riyade ṭaḷt ir̤id idir-ântu kâdi Gaudada ...... Lôkabbeya .........
.............. ṇbaḷi guṇigana mattar 1 mane-vaṇa gutte gûḷam sarvva-bâdhe-parihâra ...... chit-
târi-Jakkan-umbaḷi matta danada maneya ... parihâra matte maga vidita ... mûvat-
ir-chchhâsiram il̤du koṭṭar â-chandrârkkaṃ ǁ

I.
jitêna labhyatê lakshmîr mṛitênâpi surâṅganâ |
kshaṇa-vidhvamsanê kâye kâ chintâ maraṇê raṇê ǁ
EC 07 Sk 51
DHARMA ID: INSEC07Sk051

51 At the same village, on a broken stone in the Chitambara-Bhaṭṭa’s field.


svasti samasta-bhuvanâsrayam śrî-pṛithvî .. bha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêsvaraṃ pa ...
bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâsraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmad-Bhuvanaikamalla-Dêvara vijaya-
râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandra-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire tat-pâda-
padmôpajîvi samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ śrî-[Satyavâ]kya Gaṅga-Per-
mmanaḍiy Udeyâditya Dêva ... vase-pannir-chchhâsiramumaṃ Sântaḷi-sâyiramumaṃ ...
dushṭha-nigraha-viśishṭa-pratipâḷanadiṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vi .... râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire ..
.... svasti Gaṅgâ-jaḷa-dhauta .. nirmmala-parama-pavitrîkṛitôttamâṅga pratyaksha .
..... ntâmaṇi gôtra-śikhâmaṇi parivâra-kâmadhênu ..... bbe Veṇṇakabbe

(I b) svasti ûrjjitam bhagavatâ gata-[ghana]-gaganâbhêna Padmanâbhêna śrîmaj-Jâhnavêya-kuḷâ-
maḷa-byôma-vibhûshaṇa-bhâskaras sva-khaḍgaika – prahâra – khaṇḍita-mahâ-śiḷâ-stambha-labdha-
[page 101]baḷa-parâkramaḥ ........... lalâṭa-paṭṭôdbhâsita[ś]śrîmaṅ-Koṅgul̤ivarma dharama-ma-
hârâjâdhirâja[ḥ] tasya putrô Viśṇugôpa-mahârâjâdhirâjas tasya putraḥ Kôl̤âḷa-pura-varâdhîś-
vara[ḥ] Gaṅga-kuḷa-mârttaṇḍa[ḥ] mada-gajêndra-lâñchana[ḥ] Padmâvatî-(II a)-dêviya labdha-
vara-prasâda[ḥ] Taḍaṅgâla-Mâdhava-Râyas Thal̤avanapura-madhyê Śaga-varsha nayana-giri ...
Śâdhâraṇa-śammachchhaarê Phâlguṇa-mâ-amâvâse-Âdivârad andu Kâre-nâḍa Dêvanûranuḷ ..

ravanu balvaḷatind oppisid allige mechchu koṭṭa bhûmi (rest contains details of boundaries)

tanna bigu ... kaligal | ninnind aggaḷarum oḷare Bimma-daḷâr̤â ǁ

sakaḷa-jana-stutya śrîmat-Traiḷôkya-malla-vîra-Sântara-Dêvaṃ svarggasthar âgalu tat-pâdârâ-
dhaka Purada Biṭṭiyaṇṇa nuḍidante gaṇḍa ............... beṅkoḷvaṃ svâminî-bhṛityaṃ gôtra-nistâra
Por̤apaḷeya Gâvuṇḍa munna mûr̤u-devasam ene benna-bâran ettikoṇḍu ter̤edu Sântara ...... parô-
kshadale âtana pimbaḍige ǁ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara ...... tara-Dêvara daya geyye paḍeda

70 At the same place.


svasti śrîmatu Châḷukya-Vikrama-varsha 2 neya Pla↓1-saṃvatsarada Âśvîja-bahuḷa 10 Bṛihavâ-
rad andu śrîmad-anâdi-agrahâra Tânagundura tur̤uvaṃ Manneyaṃ magule arasan avaṃ kâyye

vatt-irchchhâsiraṃ kâruṇyaṃ geydu oḷager̤ey-oḷage guṇeganal ondu mattalu keyyumaṃ ondu

EC 07 Sk 71
DHARMA ID: INSEC07Sk071

71 At Uttarâṇihaḷḷi (same hobli), on a ¿stane? ⟨stone⟩ north of the Vîrabhadra temple.


svasti samasta-bhuvanêsvaraya↓1 śrî-pṛithuvî-bhallahaṃ mahârâjâdhirâja paramêsvaraṃ parama-
bhaṭṭâraka Satyâśrayaṃ kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇa śrî-pṛithuvî-râjyaṃ geyye svasti samadhi-
[page 106]gata-pañcha-mahâ-sabda mahâ-sâmanta śrîmad-Bhîma-Râjaṃ Banavâsi-pannir̤-chchhâsiravaṃ(n)
âḷtire Ottayya nâl̤-gâvuṇḍu geyye Saka-varsha ↓2934 neya Subhakṛit-saṃvatsarada Phâlguṇa-
bahuḷa 9 Â[di]tyavârad andu Uttaraṇiya gavuṇḍa Koṇḍêsara Bûtagôsi liṅga-padishṭe geydu mâḍi-
sida dêgulaṃ dêvargge biṭṭa kel̤i guṇigana mattal ondu dêvargge biṭṭa kavileya î-dharmma-
van orvvan ataniṃ parôkshade neḍeyisidan âtaṅge Kurukshêtradoḷ sâyira-kavileyaṃ dhanaṃ gotta-
phalam akkun aḷid-âtaṅge Bâraṇarâsiyol śâyira-kavileyuvaṃ sâsivvar-brâmaṇaruvaṃ konda hâ-
haṃ sârggu svasti śrî Uttaraṇiya gavuṇḍu Koṇḍêsara-Bûtagôsige mûr̤u bhâgaṃ Koṇḍêsara-Jôga-
yyaṅge ondu bhâgaṃ

Notes
↑1. † So in the original, and as a rule the long vowels are omitted throughout this inscription.
↑2. * So in the original : but Saka 934 = Virôdhikrit, and Subhakrit = 924.
EC 07 Sk 72
DHARMA ID: INSEC07Sk072

vîrakaḷu svarggastan âdalli âtana maduvaḷige Nâgamma kûḍe sahagamanav âdalli nilisida mâsti-
kaḷu-pratishṭege maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî

svasti yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭhâṇa – japa-samâdhi-śîla – sampannar
vvidita-vêda-vêdântâgama-shaṭ-tarkka-pañcha-vyâkaraṇâdi-samasta-nirṇṇikta-charitar agnishṭôm-
âtyagnishṭôma-ukthya – shôḍasi-vâjapêyâtirâtrôptôryyâma-sapta-sôma-samsthâvabhṛithâvagâhana-
pavitrîkṛitôttamâṅgar appa śrîmad-agrahâraṃ Jambûra mahâjanaṃ sâsirvvarum Âtrêya-gôtrajar
appa Kêśavôjharu namaskâra-pûrvvakaṃ ǁ svasti Saka-varsha 931 neya Saumya-saṃvatsarada
uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrânti-Âdityavârad andu agnishṭageya dharmmakk endu biṭṭa kaldaleya keyi

narakân nâtivarttantê yâvach chandra-divâkarau ǁ

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varuśa | 1613 neya Prajôtpatya-saṃvatsaradalu nirûpa-
prati śrîmat-Keḷadi-Channamâjiyavaru Śivap-Oḍeyarige śaraṇârthi Uḍagaṇi-sîme Chikka-Jam-
bûra-grâmada Kallê-Gauḍanu hujûru bandu tânu Śukla-saṃvatsaradalli | Mogalara râjakadalli
tanna kaiyinda sambaḷava koṭṭu mandi kaṭṭi masalattiyalli kashṭava mâḍiddhêne umbaḷi pâlisi-
koṇḍu tanna guru-dêvaru Chikka-Jembûra maṭhada ârâdhya staḷada Harasûra Liṅgappa-dêvaru
[page 108]tanna tande Gaṅge-Gauḍa kaṭṭist î-Virakta-maṭṭakke saha svâsti pâlisikoḷabêk endu hêḷikoṇḍa
samanda yî-grâma . dinda yîtage umbaḷi uttârava koṭṭadu śistininda ga 12 prâku nilista .
ga 23 ubhayaṃ ga 35 kke vivarâ (here follow details) mûvattaidu-varahânu uttârava koṭṭu pura-
varggakke uttârav âda bhûmige liṅga-mudrâ-śîlâ-sthâpitava mâḍisuvallige hujûrinda ûḷigada
Channa-Mallana kaḷuhisi idhêve chavu-grâmadavara karasikoṇḍu gaḍita . ra bârada rîti yiva-
na mund ittu rêkhe-pramâṇu bhûmi viṅgaḍisi-koṭṭu pura-vargga uttârav âda hanneraḍu varahâda
bhûmige śilâ-sthâpitava mâḍisikoṭṭu yî-kâgadava sênabhôvara kaḍitake barasi tiruga yîtana
vaśake koḍuvahâge Prajôtpatya-saṃvatsarada Mâga-ba 10 llu kaṭu-mâḍisuvadâgi nirûpa 1 śrî

[page 109]83 At Aḍagaṇṭi (same hobli), on a stone in front of the Basava temple.


svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâra-
kaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ .. kyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmad-Âhavamalla-Dêvara râjyam uttarôttarâbhi-
vṛi .......... mânam â-chandrâkka-târaṃ saluttam ire svasti samasta-nṛipa-jana-stutya ..
vâkya-Koṅguṇi-varmma-dharmma-mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ Kôḷâlapura-varêśvaraṃ Nandagiri-nâtha ma-
da-gajêndra-lâñchhanaṃ Padmâvatî-labdha-vara-prasâdaṃ Nanniya-Gaṅgaṃ Gaṅga-Kusumâyu-
dhaṃ maṇḍaḷika-makuṭa-chûḍâmaṇi śrimach-Châḷukya – Gaṅga-Permmânaḍi-Vikramâditya-Dêvar
Vanavâsi pannir-chchhâsiramuṃ Sântaḷige sâsiramuṃ Nol̤ambavâḍi mûvatt-i .. siram-oḷagâgi
Gaṅga-maṇḍaḷaṃ tombhattar̤u-sâsiramuṃ dushṭa-nigraha-visishṭa-prati .... nadiṃ râjadhâni-
Baḷḷigâveyalu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ-geyyuttam ire samasta-râjya-bhara-nirûpita-ma-
hâmâtya-padavî-virâjamâna mânônnata-prabhu-mantrôtsâha-śakti-traya-sampannar-appa śrîmat-
Perggaḍe-Nâraṇayya pramukha-karaṇaṃ Banavâse pannir-chchhâsiraman anubhavisuttam ire
Jiḍḍuḷige-yel̤pattar̤a Arasimmayyaṃ nâl̤-gâvuṇḍu geyye Aḍigaṭṭeya Goggi-Seṭṭiya magaṃ Mâ-
chayyan ûr-ggâvuṇḍu geyye Saka-varsha 979 tteneya Hêmaḷambi-saṃvatsarada Phâlguṇa-ba-
huḷa 1 Âdivârad andu Bêḍara ghaṭṭi Maḍiyaṅgêriyan ir̤idu tur̤uvaṃ koṇḍu peṇḍir-uḍeyan urch-
chidar emba puyyelaṃ kêḷdu kaḍegaṇisade Mâch-Gâvuṇḍan aṭṭi mu ..

I.
jitêna labhyatê lakshmîr mṛitênâpi surâṅganâ |
kshaṇa-vidhvaṃsanê kâyê kâ chintâ maraṇê raṇê ǁ

yemb î-ślôkârthaman âtma-gataṃ bagedu saṅgrâma-parichchhêdiyâgi mâr-bbaladoḷaṃ mûdalisi
Beḷagavattiyalu tur̤uvaṃ maguḷchi palaran ir̤idu kaḍikhaṇḍamâgi sura-lôka-prâptan âdaḍ avar-
aṇṇaṃ Chiṭṭa-Gâvuṇḍanuṃ Mâcha-Gâvuṇḍana bhârryye Châgiyabbeyum avara magan Âleyyanum
il̤du Ma ... ṭṭada bayaloḷ brâhmaṇaṃ Maduvayyaṅge kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ
biṭṭa gal̤ḍe (details of gift and final phrases)

86 At Śirâḷakoppa (same hobli), on copper plates in possession of Jôyis-Śêshappa.


(Nâgari characters.)

(I b) śrî-Śaṅkaranê gatî | śubham astu |

I.
jayaty âvishkṛitaṃ Vishṇôr vârâhaṃ kshôbhitârṇavaṃ |
dakshiṇônnata-daṃshṭrâgrê viśrânta-bhuvanaṃ vapuḥ ǁ

[page 110]svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-dhara-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara parama-
bhaṭṭâraka Hastinâpura-varâdhîśvara ârôhaka-Bhagadatta ripu-râya-kântâ-datta-vairi-vaidhavya
Pâṇḍava-kula-ka[mala]-mârtâṇḍa kadana-prachaṇḍa kaliga-kôdaṇḍa gaṇḍa-mârttaṇḍa yêkâṅga-
vîra raṇa-raṅga-dhîra Aśvapati-râya-diśâpaṭṭa Gajapati-Râya-saṃhâraka Narapati-Râya-mastaka-
tala-prahâri sâmantaka-mṛiga-châmûra Koṅkaṇa-châtur-diśâ-bhayaṅkara chachcha-puṭṭa kâcha-
puṭṭa Îśvara-mukha-kamala-vinirgata-Brahma-vîṇâdi-Bharata-śâstra-prasiddha anêka-śâstra-pra-
vîṇa Kôraṇṭa-Vyâḷi-Nâgârjunâdi-mantra-traya-suddha prasiddha-samudaya-namita-pâdâravinda
ari-râya-kula-vilaya-kâlânala nîty-âkara parâṅganâ-putra suvarna-varâha-lâñchhana-dhvaja | śrî-
Sôma-vaṃśôdbhava Parîkshita-chakravarttî tat-putra Janamêjaya-chakravarttî Hastinâpurê sukha-
saṅkathâ-vinôdêna dakshiṇa-diśâ-varê yâ-dig-vijaya-yâtreyaṃ Tuṅgabhadrâ-Haridrâ-saṅgamê śrî-
Harihara-dêva-sannidhau kaṭakam utkalitaṃ Chaitra-mâsê kṛishṇa-pakshê Sômadinê Bharaṇî-
mahâ-nakshatrê saṅkrânti-vyatîpâta-nimitta-samayê | sarpa-yâgaṃ karômi âśîrvâda-pûrvakaṃ
chakravartti machchi pañchâṅga-pasâya-(II a) chhatra-sukhâsana-aṅka-daṇḍa-khaṇḍanê-jôtisha-
upâdhike sarva-namasyavâgi yêvaṃ Hirê-Jambûra-grâmât Masûru Goṭṭe-varaha Ballûra-grâmât |
brâhmaṇât | Kannaḍa-śâkheya Vaśishṭha-gôtrada Âśvalâyana-sûtrada Ruk-śâkheya Chhâya-Bhaṭ-
ṭara putra Chikka-Chhâyê-Bha[ṭṭa]ru tat-putra Śaṅkara-Liṅgaṇa-Jôyisarige aikamukhya tasyagrâ-
mântara-sîmântarâṇâṃ katha(ḥ)-pûrvakaṃ prathama-sthaḷaṃ pûrva-paśchima-dakshiṇôttara-pâ-
[shâ]ṇa-pratishṭheyu dvitîya-sthaḷaṃ pûrva-paśchima-dakshiṇôttara-pâshâṇa-pratishṭheyu tṛitîya-
sthaḷaṃ pûrva-paśchima-dakshiṇôttara-pâshâṇa-pratishṭheyu chaturtha-sthaḷaṃ pûrva-paśchima-
dakshṇôttara-pâshâṇa-pratishṭheyu yêvaṃ-katha (II b) Jambûra-sîme-Masûra-śîme-jyôtisha-upâ-
dhyake yâvach chandraś cha sûryyaś chav âgi Kṛishṇârpaṇaṃ ǁ yêvaṃ grâmât Ari-râya-kula-
vilaya-kâlânala śrî śrî (usual final verses)

87 At Beḷagâmi, (Tâḷagunda hobli), on a pillar in the main-entrance of the Kêdârêśvara temple.


svasti śrîmach-Châḷukya-Vikrama-varshada 55 neya Virôdhikṛitu-saṃvatsarad Âśvaijad amavâsey
Âdivâra-sûryya-grahaṇad andu śrîmatu Hoysaṇa-Ballâḷa-Dêvan-arasi tuppada-bâgala śêviyaru
śrî-Ballêśvara-[dê]vara nivêdyakkaṃ pûjârigaḷig .... var-artthamâgi sâlevaru .. śege
kaḍaṃ goṭṭa gadyâṇa ... vṛiddhi varshakke gadyâ ... yeraḍu honnu Mallêśvara-dê-
vargge kuḍuvantâgi ... koṇḍa pûjâri Lôkimayyana kâlaṃ karchchi Ballêśvarada sthâ-
...... paḍi yeraḍu gadyâṇa .... maṃ dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭar â-sthâ-
nakkam â-hoṅge Lôkimayyana vaṃśadavar-oḍeyaru sâleyaparuśeyâ honnan avargge kuḍuvudu
koṭṭ-î-dharmmamaṃ pratipâḷisuvudu maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî yî-dharmmaman aḷidavaṃ pañcha-mahâ-
pâtakan akkuṃ ǁ

śubham astu Śaka 1807 ke sariyâda Pârttiva-saṃ ǁ rada Mârgaśira-bahuḷa 3 lu san 1885 ney
isavi December târîkhu 24 ne Guruvâra-sûryyôdayadalli Maisûru-mahâ[râja] Châma-Râja-Vaḍêru

EC 07 Sk 92

92 At the same place, on a 2nd stone.


ôṃ namaḥ Śivâya ǁ

I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ
II.
namaś śâśvatikânanta-jñânaiśvaryamayâtmanê |
saṅkalpa-saphala-brahma-stambhârambhâya Śambhavê ǁ
III.
Kaḷachuryya-kuḷâdhîśa Murâri-sachivêśvara |
svasti tê Kêśavâmâtya yâvad â-chandra-târakaṃ ǁ

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâ-
raka Kâḷañjara-pura-varâdhîśvara suvarṇṇa-vṛishabha-dhvaja ḍamaruka-tûryya-nirghôshaṇa Kaḷa-
churyya-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍa kadana-prachaṇḍa mâna-Kanakâchaḷa su-bhaṭar-âditya kaligaḷ-
aṅkuśa gaja-sâmanta śaraṇâgata-vajra-pañjara pratâpa-Laṅkêśvara para-nârî-sahôdara Śanivâra-
siddhi giri-durgga-malla chalad-aṅka-Râma vairîbha-kaṇṭhîrava niśśaṅka-mallâdi-yathârttha-nâ-
ma-śrîmad-bhuja-baḷa-chakravartti Tribhuvanamalla Bijjaṇa-Dêvaṃ mahî-vallabheyan anudinav
anubhavisidan ent endaḍe ǁ

vṛi ǁ
IV.
pṛithvî yâ Pṛithunâ purâ chirataraṃ mûḍhêna gôtvaṃ gatâ |
sêyaṃ Bijjaṇa-Dêva-paṭṭa-mahishî-vṛittau bhṛiśaṃ krîḍatê |
ratnaṃ dêva tathaiva bhâti jaḍadhau vêḷâdhipâdhasthaḷê |
Vishṇôr vvakshasi kaustubhaṃ nṛipa-vara prauḍhêna sâ ślâghatâ ǁ

[page 112]va ǁ int a-dvitîya-svâmitvadiṃ vasudhâ-vaḷayamaṃ sukhadin êka-chchhatradiṃ râjyaṃ geyvutt
irdd âtma-râjya-bhara-nirûpaṇaṃ mâḍid â-mahârâja-priya-tanaya-pratâpamaṃ pêḷvaḍe ǁ

mattêbha ǁ
V.
ripu-bhûpâḷa-tamaugham ôḍe kumuda-brâtaṃ karaṃ perchche tad- |
ripu-kântâ-mukha-paṅkajaṃ korage nakshatrôdayêśaṃ kaḷâ- |
ḷi-paribhrâjitan ûrjjitôrjjita-yaśaś-śrî-chandrikâdhîśvaraṃ |
nṛipanê Sôman enalke Bijjaṇa-mahîpâḷâbdhiyoḷ puṭṭida ǁ

va ǁ â-bhuja-baḷa Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva-tanûjaṃ râjâdhîrâjaṃ râja-mârttaṇḍaṃ mârttaṇḍa-karâti-
tîbra-têja-svabhâvaṃ bhâvitâśêsha-yâchakâbhilashita-phaḷa-pradâyakaṃ vairi-bhaya-dâyakaṃ Râ-
ya-Murâri Sôvi-Dêva-chakrêśvaraṃ samasta-pradhânariṃ parivêshṭitanâgi sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôda-
diṃ râjyaṃ geyvuttam irddu samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmanta sênâdi-bâhattara-
niyôgâdhishṭhâyakaṃ prabhu-mantrôtsâha-pramukha-nîti-nishṭhâyakaṃ śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ
sarvvâdhikâri mahâ-pasâyitaṃ Byâḷikeya-Kêsimayya-Daṇḍanâyakaraṃ karadu dakshiṇa-diśâva-
rada bhaṇḍâravâda dêśaṅgaḷ ellavaṃ dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâḷanaṃ mâl̤pud endu kâruṇyaṃ
mâḍal mahâ-prasâdam endu kaikoṇḍa mahâ-prachaṇḍa-daṇḍa-nâtha-pratâpônnatiyaṃ pêḷvaḍe ǁ

vṛi ǁ
VI.
idu Vidyâdhara-lôkah allad idu nâkânîkavant allad int |
idu Gandharvva-nikâyav all aṇav id â-sat-Kinnara-brâtav all |
id alê Byâḷika-Kêsimayya-vijaya-prârambhadoḷ marggipôd- |
adaṭa-kshmâpa-nikâya-pur̤paka-chayaṃ vyômaika-sâṅkîrṇṇakaṃ |
champaka ǁ
VII.
Manu-chaya-sêvya-vṛitti nija-vṛitti purâtana-râja-nîti tâṃ |
tanag aḷavaṭṭa nîtiye parârtthame tanna bhujârjjitârtthav âl̤- |
dana mahimônnatitvame nijônnetiy âśrita-tushṭi tannad end |
enipa negaḷte perchche sale jîvise Kêśava-Daṇḍanâyakâ ǁ

va ǁ ant anêka-mahimônnataṃ Taddavâḍi sâsiramumaṃ Hânugall aynûr̤umaṃ Banavase pannir-
chchhâsiramumaṃ sukhadin anêka-kâlaṃ paripâḷisuttaṃ sva-dêśâvalôkanârtthaṃ bandu śrîmad-
anâdi-paṭṭaṇaṃ râjadhâni-Baḷḷigâveya śrîmad-dakshiṇa-Kêdârêśvara-dêvara mâṭa-kûṭa-prâsâda
ratna pûje suvarṇṇa-kaḷaśa vidyâ-dânânnadânâdy-anêka-śrî-kârryamaṃ nôḍi yidu Vârâṇasigaṃ
virmmaḍi Kêdârakkaṃ nûrmmaḍi Śrîparvvatakkaṃ sâsirmmaḍiy adu-kâraṇav illig ênânuṃ dharm-
mavaṃ mâḍi kṛitârtthan ahen endu tadîya-sthânâchâryyar appa śrîmad-râja-guru-dêvara samî-
pakke vand avara vidyâ-viśêsha-mahimônnatiyaṃ nîḍuṃ nôḍi ǁ

vṛi ǁ
VIII.
śabdê Pâṇini(ḥ)-paṇḍîtô naya-chayê Śrîbhûshaṇâchâryyakḥ |
nâṭyâdau bharatê muniś cha Bharataḥ kâvyê Subandhuḥ svayaṃ |
siddhântê Lakuḷîśvaraś Śiva-padê Skandô mahî-maṇḍaḷê |
sô’yaṃ râja-gurur yyathârtha-kathitaś śrî-Vâmaśaktir yyatiḥ ǁ

ity-âdy-anêka-prakâradiṃ stutiyisutav âtmîya-dharmmâbhiprâya-vṛittântaman avarg ar̤ipuvudun
tad astu nîv ênaṃ dharmmavaṃ mâḍidaḍaṃ svîkarisi ihev enal śrîmat-Kaḷachuryya-varshada 16
neya Sarvvadhâri-saṃvatsarada Vaiśâkha-Paurṇṇami-Âdityavâra-sôma-grahaṇa-saṅkramaṇa-vya-
tîpâtad andu Hânugal-nâḍa Yelambiya-kampaṇada bal̤iya bâḍaṃ Chikka-Kaṇṇugiyaṃ śrîmad-
dakshiṇa-Kêdâra-dêvar-aṅga – bhôga-raṅga-bhôga-khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhârakkaṃ brâhmaṇa-
tapôdhanar-anna-dâna-vidyâ-dânakkav â-sthânad âchâryya śrîmad-Gautama-Dêva-priya-śishya
śrîmad-râja-guru-dêvara kâlaṃ karchchi tri-bhôgâbhyantarav â-chandrârka-târaṃ-baraṃ salvant-
âgi śrîmad-Râya-Murâri Sôvi-Dêvage binnahaṃ geydu tâṃbra-śâsanamaṃ paḍedu tanda Byâḷikeya-
Kêśimayya-Daṇḍanâyakaṃ dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭan î-dhrmmoman âvanânuṃ paripâlisidâ-
[page 113]Vâraṇâsi-Kurukshêtrâdy-utkṛishṭa – kshêtraṅgaḷal vêda-śâstrôditâhitâgnikâmushyâyaṇa – sahasra-
brâhmaṇarige sahasra-kavilegaḷaṃ suvarṇṇânêka-ratnaṅgaḷiṃ kôḍuṃ koḷagumaṃ kaṭṭisi dânamaṃ
koṭṭa phalav î-dharmmaman aḷidavan â-kshêtradoḷ â-tithiyoḷ â-brâhmaṇaruman â-kavilegaḷaṃ
sva-hastadindav aḷida narakakke iḷidan îy-artthada sâkshitvêna śruti ǁ (usual final verse)

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara śrî-vîra-Pra-
tâpa-Dêva-Râyara kumâra Vijaya-Râya-mahârâyaru ............ Hastinâvatiya nelavîḍinoḷu sukha-

nâḍ-oḷagaṇa ... Kuḍigereya Siddhêśvara-Dêvaru Pañchêśvara-Dêvaru mukhyavâda ...............
âchâriya Buḷḷa-Dêvaṅgaḷa su-châritrav ent endaḍe ǁ parama-śuddha .. pâvana-charitra viśâla-
chittaṃ śâstradoḷ pariṇatânvayâmbudhi-sudhâkaraṃ ...... śrî ... kalpa-bhûruhaṃ ...............
arâti-da ... pa râjipaṃ dhareyoḷ â-Bommi-Dêvana su-putram Buḷḷa-Dêvaṃ kṛita-dâna ............
nigamôktiya vichâradoḷuṃ migi ... prabhâva dhâruṇiyoḷu tannaṃ ........... koṭṭa ...... ambu-
dhâreyan er̤adu ...... bhakti ............ tannoḷ âvagaṃ vara-guṇi Buḷḷa-Dêvana charitrateg âr
sari bhû-taḷâgradoḷ ǁ

I.
kara-charaṇa-dvayakke ......... jaṅgama-rûpininda dhâ- |
... raṇiyoḷu pûje-gomban ati-bhaktara .. vadoḷaṃ nirantaraṃ |
parama-Śivâgamîkarige tâv adhikâri enippan âvagaṃ |
sthirateyoḷu Buḷḷa-Dêvana guṇaṅgaḷa baṇṇipar âr dharitriyoḷ ǁ

94 At the same place, on a 4th stone.


I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ
II.
jayaty âvishkṛitaṃ Vishṇôr vvârâhaṃ kshôbhitârṇṇavaṃ |
dakshiṇônnata-daṃshṭrâgra-viśrânta-bhuvanaṃ vapuḥ ǁ

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvara parama-bhaṭ-
ṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam
[page 114]uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravardhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire ǁ svasti samasta-
bhuvana-vikhyâta – pañcha-sata-vîra-sâsana-labdhânêka-guṇa – gaṇâḷaṅkṛita satya – sauchâchâra-
châru-châritra naya-vinaya-Vîra-Baḷañja-dharmma-pratipâḷana viśuddha-guḍḍa-dhvaja-virâjitâ-
nûna-Khaṇḍaḷi-Mûḷabhadrôdbhava dvâtriṃsa-veḷâmavavum ashṭâdasa-paṭṭaṇamuṃ chaushashṭi-
yôga-pîṭhamam ar̤uvatta-nâlku-ghaṭika-sthânamum Ayyâvoḷe-pura-paramêśvaran śaraṇâgata-vajra-
pañjararuṃ pirid-ittu-mar̤evaru mar̤ege vare kâvaruṃ para-nârî-sahôdararuṃ âśrita-jana-kalpa-vṛi-
ksharuṃ nâmâdi-samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-paṭṭaṇaṃ râjadhânî-Baḷḷigrâmeya paṭṭaṇa-
svâmi Hanumanta-Seṭṭiyuṃ Bammi-Seṭṭiyuṃ Mêchi-Seṭṭiyuṃ Saudore-Biṭṭimayyanuṃ ... ḍa-svâmi
Śaṅkarayyanu sênabûva-Śaṅkaraiyyanu chalad-aṅka-Râmaṃ maṇigâr̤a Nâgi-Seṭṭiyum antu sama-
sta-nagaramu mummuri-daṇḍamuṃ Mandâra-Baladêva-Seṭṭiyu Mêhari-Kâṭayanu Biṭiyaṇṇanu
Bhattakêriya Kâḷi-Seṭṭiyuṃ jagatî-samûhaṃ berasi nâlvar vvôvugaḷum ar̤uvattu-kottaḷiyuṃ naga-
rada vaśa-varttigaḷum ir̤du ǁ

III.
dhareg eseva śakti-pari(r)shege | karam agraṇi yenipa parvvatâvaḷiyoḷ Mû- |
varakôṇeya-santatig â- | bharaṇaṃ Kêdâraśakti-muni-pati negar̤da ǁ
IV.
â-munipan-agra-śishyar | śrîmat-Śrîkaṇṭha-Paṇḍitar vvasudheyoḷ inn- |
ê mâto Lâkuḷîśar | ttâm ene sarvva-jña-kaḷpar esedar aḷumbaṃ ǁ

â-munipana śishyar svasti yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-prâṇâyâma-pratyâhâra-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-mau-
nânushṭhâna-japa-samâdhi-śîḷa-sampannar siddhânta-tarkka-vyâkaraṇa – kâvya-nâṭaka-bharatâdy-
anêka-sâhitya-vidyâ-pravîṇarum appa dakshiṇa-diśâ-bhâgada Tâvareger̤eya Nakharêśvara-Dêvar-
âchâryyaru Sômêśvara-Paṇḍita-Dêvargge svasti śrîmach-Châḷukya-Vikrama-varshada 18 neya Śrî-
mukha-saṃvatsarada Pâlguṇad Amâvâsye-Âdivâra-sûrya-grahaṇad andu dêvar-aṅga-bhôgakkaṃ
khaṇḍa-sphuṭitakkam alliya vidyârtthi-tapôdhanar-âhâra-dânakkam endu kâlaṃ-karchchi dhârâ-
pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi (after details of gift) int inituman aśêsha-nagaraṃ neradiddu koṭṭaru ǁ î-dhar-
mmakke Châvvoṇḍabôvaṃ anukûḷa-sahâya ǁ

V.
ivan îy-andadoḷ eyde rakshisidavaṅg ishṭârttha-saṃsiddhi saṃ- |
bhavikuṃ pûṇd aḷipaṅge Gaṅge Gaye Kêdâraṃ Kurukshêtram em- |
b ivar̤oḷ pêsade pârvvaraṃ kavileyaṃ strî-bâḷaraṃ liṅgiy-a- |
ppavaraṃ kondan avaṃ sva-gôtra-sahitaṃ bîḷguṃ mahâ-ghôradoḷ ǁ

95 At the same place, on a fifth stone.


I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ
II.
gôtrâsînam a-gôtraṃ cha gô-trâyaṇa-yutaṃ Śivaṃ |
Pañcha-gôr nnidhanaṃ sômaṃ vandê Nyaṅkv-aṅka-śêkharaṃ ǁ

va ǁ svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-
bhaṭṭârakaṃ Dvârâvatî-pura-varâdhîśvara Yâdava-kuḷa-kamaḷa-kaḷikâ-vikâsa-bhâskaraṃ Gûrjara-
vâraṇâṅkuśaṃ Mâḷaviya mallaṃ Teluṅga-râya-śiraḥ-kamaḷa-sa-mûḷôtpâṭana-karaṃ ari-râya-jaga-
jhampaṃ râya-Nârâyaṇa śrî-Siṃhaṇa-Dêvana pratâpav ent endaḍe ǁ

III.
Karṇṇâṭa-kshitipâḷa-sainya-timira-pradhvaṃsa-tîbrâtapô |
garjjan-Mâḷava-vâraṇâkhiḷa-ghaṭâ-saṅghaṭṭa-pañchânanaḥ |
[page 115]Têluṅgêśa-chamû-samûha-jaḷadhi-sphûrjjat-sadâ-Kumbha-sûs |
sarvva-kshmâpati-śêkharô vijayatê śrî-Siṃhaṇas sarvvadâ ǁ

tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ sarvvâdhikâri mahâ-parama-viśvâsi râya-nâyaka-
Nârâyaṇaṃ śrî-Mâyi-Dêva-Paṇḍitara prabhâvam ent endaḍe ǁ

vṛi ǁ
IV.
śrîmat-Siṃha-nṛipô nivêdya sakaḷa-vyâpâra-chintâṃ kṛitî |
bhuṅktê sarvva-sukhôpabhôga-niratas saṃsâra-bîjaṃ prabhuḥ |
byâpârêṇa su-niśchitêna satataṃ yêna prajâ rañjitâḥ |
prâyô’râti-gaṇân vijitya sakaḷân âstê bhuvaṃ dhârayan ǁ

va ǁ ant alliya śrîmanu mahâ-pasâytaṃ sarvvâdhikâri parama-viśvâsi gaṇḍa-peṇḍâra Hemmayya-
Nâyakana prabhâvav ent endade ǁ

V.
hṛidayê kamaḷâṃ dṛishṭvâ jihvâyâṃ cha sarasvatîṃ |
kîrttis sâpatnya-khinnêva yasya yâti dig-antaraṃ ǁ
ślôkaṃ ǁ
VI.
Śômêśvara-yatêś śishyô Vaidyanâthâṅghri-pûjakaḥ |
Bhîmâ-pâdâbja-madhuliṭ dîvyâdd Hemma-mahîpatiḥ ǁ

âtana satiya prabhâvam ent endaḍe ǁ

kanda ǁ
VII.
vommiṅge sariy Arundhatiy | immiṅg â-Lakshmi-dêvi sarisaman akkuṃ |
hemmeyalu saradhi nâyaka- | Hemmana sati Ruppubâyig itarar ssariyê ǁ

vachana ǁ ant â-dampatigaḷ irbbaruṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ Baḷigâvege band-irdd â-stha-
ḷakk adhideyvam appa śrîmad-dakshiṇa-Kêdârêśvara-dêvara prabhâvam ent endaḍe ǁ

mâḷinî ǁ
VIII.
Vidhi-Hari-sura-mukhyâś śrî-Baḷigrâma-madhyê |
śruti-janita-vachôbhir bbhakṭi-namrâs stuvanti |
hṛidaya-kamaḷa-kântaṃ yaṃ prapaśyanti siddhâ |
namata Śivam amêyaṃ taṃ chidânanda-rûpaṃ ǁ
IX.
upâsatê Virûpâkshaṃ tatra Kôṭi-maṭha-sthitaḥ |
Vâmaśaktir yyathâ pûrvvam Upamanyur mmahâ-tapâḥ ǁ

va ǁ ant alliya dêva-bhôgamaṃ âchâryya-Śrîkaṇṭha-Dêvara śishyar appa mahâ-brati Vâmaśakti-
Dêvara vidyâ-samagrateyaṃ bratitvamaṃ kaṇḍu Kêdârêśvara-dêvara nandâ-dîvige-gandhâkshate-
pushpa-dhûpa-dîpa-naivêdya-tâmbûḷa-Chaitra-pavitra-Śivarâtri-śîtâḷagaḍuge-pañcha-pavva-graha-
ṇa-kâraṇaṃ 137 neya Yuva-saṃvatsarada Bhâdrapadad Amâvâsye-Bṛihaspativâradandu Hemmay-
ya-Nâyakaru Banavâse-nâḍa suṅkâdhikâradaliy â-sthânâchâryya Vâmaśakti-Dêvara pâda-prakshâ-
ḷanaṃ geydu dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi hejjuṅka-manneya meyder̤e-vokkalu-der̤e-mukhya kir̤ukuḷa-
suṅka-voḷagâgi muttu mâṇika paṭṭe davasav êna hêr̤idaḍaṃ sarvvamânyavâgi biṭṭa sthaḷada ettu
25 Sirivoḷala-sthaḷada gâṇa 2 (final phrases)

X.
Vindhyâṭavîshv a-tôyâsu śushka-kôṭara-vâsinaḥ |
kṛishṇasarppâḥ prajâyantê dêva-brahma-sva-hâriṇaḥ ǁ

suṅkadavan âgali aras âgali adhikâriy âgali yî-śâsanada mariyâdege aḷidâtana (usual im- precatory phrase.)

EC 07 Sk 96
DHARMA ID: INSEC07Sk096

[page 116]96 At the same place, on the sixth stone.


ôṃ namaḥ Śivâya ǁ namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

I.
namaś śâsvatikânanta-jñânaiśvaryyamayâtmanê |
saṅkalpa-saphala-brahma-stambhârambhâya Śambhavê ǁ

namô râja-guravê svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabba mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara
parama-bhaṭṭâraka Kâḷañjara-pura-varâdhîśvara suvarṇṇa-vṛishabha-dhvaja ḍamaruka-tûryya-nirg-
ghôshaṇa Kaḷachurrya-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍa kadana-prachaṇḍa mâna-Kanakâchaḷa subhaṭar-âdi-
tya kaligaḷ-aṅkuśa gaja-sâmanta saraṇâgata-vajra-pañjara pratâpa-Laṅkêśvara para-nârî-sahôdara
Śanivâra-siddhi giri-durgga-malla chalad-aṅka-Râma vairîbha-kaṇṭhîrava niśśaṅka-mallâdi-ya-
thârttha-nâma śrîmad-bhuja-baḷa-chakravartti Tribhuvanamalla-Bijjaṇa-Dêvaṃ mahî-vallabheyan
anudinam anubhavisidan ent endaḍe ǁ

vṛi ǁ
II.
pṛithvî yâ Pṛithunâ purâ chirataraṃ mûḍhêna gôtvaṃ gatâ |
sêyaṃ Bijjaṇa-Dêva-paṭṭa-mahishî-vṛittau chiraṃ krîḍatê |
ratnaṃ dêva tathaiva bhâti jaḍadhau vêḷâdhipâthas-sthaḷê |
Vishṇôr vvakshasi kaustubhaṃ nṛipa-vara prauḍhêna sâ ślâghatâ ǁ

va ǁ ant enisida râjâdhirâja-priya-tanaya-pratâpamaṃ pêḷvaḍe ǁ

vṛi ǁ
III.
ripu-bhûpâḷa-tamaugham ôḍe kumuda-brâtaṃ karaṃ perchche tad- |
ripu-kântâ-mukha-paṅkajaṃ korage nakshatrôdayêśaṃ kaḷâ- |
ḷi-paribhrâjitan unnatônnata-yaśaś-śrî-chandrikâdhîśvaraṃ |
nṛipanê Sôṃan enalke Bijjaṇa-mahîpâḷâbdhiyoḷ puṭṭida ǁ

va ǁ antu puṭṭi kshôṇî-taḷav ellavan êka-chchhatradind âḷda Râya-Murâri Sôvi-Dêvânujan âḷdan
ent endaḍe ǁ

ka ǁ
IV.
tat-samanantaradoḷ dhare- | g utsavamaṃ mâḍi satya-śaucha-bratada Sa- |
ritsuta-doreyaṃ nava-Puru- | kutsaṃ Saṅkamma-Dêvan âḷdaṃ dhareya ǁ
utpaḷa ǁ
V.
Gauḷa-gajan Turushka-turagaṃ vara-Siṃhaḷa-nâtha-mauktikaṃ |
Chôḷa-sudhâmbaraṃ Magadha-katturiyuṃ Maḷayêśa-chandanaṃ |
Lâḷana bâḷakan ariyir endu charar sale binnapaṅgaḷaṃ |
kêḷisut irppar ôlagadoḷaṃ vibhu-Saṅkama-Dêva-bhûpana ǁ

ant anêka-prakâradiṃ vasudhâ-vaḷayavaṃ nish-kaṇṭakaṃ mâḍida mahârâjâdhirâja chakrêśvarana
râjya-pradhânâṅgaṅgaḷe mahâ-pradhânar âdar enisida piriya-daṇḍa-nâyakaṃ Lakmi-Dêvanuṃ bâ-
hattara-niyôgâdhishṭhâyakaṃ Chaṇḍuṅgi-Dêvanuṃ vasudhaika-bândhavaṃ Rêchaṇayya-daṇḍanâ-
yakanuṃ sarvvâdhikâri Sôvaṇayya-daṇḍanâyakanuṃ samasta-sênâgrêsaraṃ Kâvaṇayya-daṇḍanâ-
yakanuṃ voḷagâgi samasta-pradhânasahitaṃ vinôdadiṃ dakshiṇa-diśâvarakke vandu Banavase-
pannir-chchhâsirad adhishṭhânaṃ Baḷḷigrâmeya śrîmad-dakshiṇa-Kêdârêśvara-dêvara tri-kûṭa-
prâsâdamumaṃ latâ-maṇṭapamumaṃ ratna-pûjânêka-svarṇa-kaḷaśaṅgaḷumaṃ vidyâ-dânânna-dânâ-
dy-anêka-śrî-kâryyamaṃ nôḍi yathârtthaṃ dakshiṇa-Kêdârav illi nâv ênânuṃ dharmma-kâryya-
maṃ mâḍalvêl̤kuv endu tadîya-sthânânhâryyar appa śrîmad-râja-guru-dêvaraṃ kaṇḍ avara
tapaḥ-prabhâvâdi-sâmartthyakk âścharyyadiṃ nîḍuṃ nôḍi ǁ

VI.
[page 117]śabdê Pâṇini-paṇḍitô naya-chayê Śrîbhûshaṇâchâryyakaḥ |
nâṭyâdau Bharatê muniś cha Bharataḥ kâvyêshu Mâghas svayaṃ |
siddhântê Nakulîśvaraś Śiva-padê Skandas svabhâvair gguṇais |
sô ‘yaṃ râja-gurus sadâ vîjayatê śrî-Vâmaśaktir yyatiḥ ǁ
ślôka ǁ
VII.
ity-anêka-guṇâdhîśaṃ Gautama-priya-nandanaṃ |
satvôddhatas samâsâdya Saṅkama-kshôṇipâḷakaḥ ǁ

va ǁ svasti śrîmat-Saṅkama-Dêva-varshada 5 neya Vikâri-saṃvatsarada Vaiśâkha-mâsad amâvâsye-
Sômavâra-Vṛisha-saṅkramaṇa-vyatîpâtad andu śrîmat-Kêdârêśvara-dêvara aṅga-bhôga-raṅga-bhô-
ga-khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhârakkaṃ tapôddhana-brâhmaṇar-âhâra-dânakkaṃ | Jiḍḍul̤igeya
kampaṇaḍa bal̤iya bâḍaṃ Kir̤u-Baḷḷigâveyaṃ śrîmat-Saṅkama-Dêva-chakravartti | tadîya-sthânâ-
châryyar appa śrîmad-râja-guru-Vâmaśakti-dêvara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍiy
â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ sarvva-namaśyaṃ salvantâgi koṭṭan î-dharmmaman âvan orbbaṃ
paripâlisidaṃ śata-kratuvaṃ mâḍidavan ǁ î-dharmmaman aḷidavaṃ śata-kratuvuman tadîya-dvija-
ruvan aḷidantaha narakakke vôhan |

svasti śrîman-maha-maṇḍaḷêśvaran Tailaha-Dêvanuṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara Yer̤aharasanuṃ
bandu dharmmamaṃ nôḍi yidu namm anvayânugatav appa guru-kuḷa-sthânav illi nâvuv ênânuṃ
dharmmavaṃ mâḍal-vêl̤kuv endu dharmma-buddhiyan tandar avara pratâpamaṃ pêḷvaḍe ǁ

vṛi ǁ
VIII.
kadanakk ugrâriy ammal tridaśa-bhuvanavaṃ prîtiyiṃ bandu kâṇbaṅg |
odavidd aiśvaryamaṃ bhîtarig asu-gatiyaṃ mâl̤panê nôl̤pav endaṅg |
ide dal mâl̤paṃ kar̤utt Ekkala-nṛipa-tanayan Tailapa-kshôṇipâḷaṃ |
madadindaṃ prîtiyindaṃ hṛidayada kṛipeyiṃ sâdu mechchalke nichcha ǁ
ka ǁ
IX.
dhuradoḷag ôḍida ripu-nṛipa- | r arasiyara kaṭâksha-ruchiyan îkshisar innuṃ |
dhareyoḷag Er̤aharasana posa- | karavâḷina beḷage poḷayit emb ati-bhayadiṃ ǁ

va ǁ ant anêka-prakârada pogaḷtegaṃ negaḷtegan tâve neley enisi śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ
Tailaha-Dêvanuṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Yar̤aharasanuṃ śrîmat-Kêdârêśvara-dêvara mahâ-
naivêdyakkaṃ nandâ-dîvigegaṃ prâg-likhita-viśishṭa-tithiyoḷ tadîya-sthânâchâryyar appa śrîmad-
râja-guru-Vâmaśakti-dêvara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi Jiḍḍul̤ige-nâḍa bal̤iya
bâḍaṃ Kir̤u-Baḷḷigâveya manneyumaṃ kir̤u-kuḷâya-dâya-sahitaṃ sarvva-namaśyav â-chandrârkka-
târaṃ-baraṃ saluvantâgi koṭṭar (usual final phrases) îy-artthada sâkshitvêna smṛiti | ślôka |
sva-dattâṃ &c. ǁ

DHARMA ID: INSEC07Sk097

97 On the same stone.


svasti śrîmat-Saka-varsha 1108 neya Parâbhava-saṃvatsarada Vaiśâkha-ba 5 Va śrîmat-Kêdâra-
dêvara maṇṭapaman avadhiyal nirvâṇaṃ mâḍidakke śrîmad-râja-guru-dêvar mmechchi Kir̤u-Baḷ-
ḷigâveya hâlanalli Râvaleger̤eyin teṅkal Hâḷigûṭada keyi kammaṃ nûr̤-ayvattaṃ Bisadôja | Châvô-
ja | Siṅgôjan int î-mûvarggav â-chandrârkkaṃ sarvva-namaśyaṃ salvant âgi koṭṭar ǁ mattam â-
Beḍugey-eppattar̤a baḷiya bâḍaṃ Siruvoḷalumaṃ sarvva-namasyavâgi tri-bhôgâbhyantara naḍe-
vantâgi koṭṭaru sosti astu Siva-sâsana

DHARMA ID: INSEC07Sk098

[page 118]98 At the same place, on a seventh stone.


I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ
II.
Girijâ-śṛiṅgârênduḥ pravarddhayaty ântaraṃ manô-vârddhiṃ |
sura-danujârâdhyasya cha yasya sa vaḥ pâtu Pârvvatî-ramaṇaḥ ǁ
III.
svasti śrî-vanitârppita- | vistîrṇṇôrasthaḷaṃ-ripu-braja-masta- |
nyasta-charaṇaṃ samasta-ja | na-stuta-sita-kîrtti Vikramâditya-nṛipaṃ ǁ
IV.
tat-pâda padma-madhukara- | n utpâṭita-baḷavad-ahita-bâhu-baḷaṃ vi- |
dvat-pûjyaṃ guṇa-ratna-sa | ritpatiy enisidan Anantapâḷa-chamûpaṃ ǁ
V.
pati-hitaroḷ ellam aggada | pati-hitan ati-śuchigaḷ ensi negaḷdavaroḷ mikk |
ati-śuchi dakshar enipparo- | ḷ ati-dakshan Anantapâḷa-daṇḍâdhîśaṃ ǁ
VI.
ari-vîra-viḷaya-Kâḷaṃ | vara-vibhudhâmbhôja-vana-marâḷan id êṃ bi- |
ttarisidano lôkadoḷ bhâ- | sura-yaśaman Anantapâḷan âha ... ǁ

svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-sâmantâdhipati mahâ-prachaṇḍa-daṇḍanâyakaṃ |
ripu-pura-Tripura-Hara-sâyakaṃ | sakaḷa-naṭa-nagna-bhugna-gâyaka – vandi-brinda-santarppaṇa-
samarttha-vitaraṇa-viḷâsaṃ | vîra-lakshmî-nivâsaṃ | virôdhi-Pañchânanaṃ | vivêka-Chaturâna-
naṃ | guṇa-ratna-mâḷikâḷaṅkâraṃ | budha-janâdhâraṃ | Lâṭa-kuḷa-kumuda-vana-vidhu-karaṃ |
Hara-charaṇa-sarasiruha-madhukaraṃ śrîmad-Anantapâḷa-daṇḍanâyakan eraḍ-Ar̤u-nûr̤umaṃ Bana-
vase-pannirchchhâsiramuṃ vaḍḍa-râvuḷamuṃ perjjuṅkamumaṃ paḍedu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ
pratipâḷisuttam ire ǁ tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ

VII.
śrî-vanitâ-kucha-sambhṛita- | pîvara-vaksha-sthaḷaṃ lasad-guṇa-maṇi-mâ- |
ḷâ-vilasitan ên esedano | Gôvindaṃ sakaḷa-vibudha-janatânandaṃ ǁ
VIII.
anatârâtiyan ôvad ikki jayamaṃ tâḷdal samartthâtman â- |
vano Gôvindane sârdda śishṭar-eḍar̤aṃ tûḷdalke sâlvannan â- |
vano Gôvindane kîrttiyaṃ paḍedu jîy ayy embinaṃ sandan â- |
vano Gôvindane matte matte per̤araṃ kâṇeṃ dharâ-chakradoḷ ǁ
IX.
śaraṇ emag endu bandaḍ ar̤iyeṃ maled ântaḍe bhâladoḷ podal̤d |
uriv Urigaṇṇan ugra-phaṇi-kuṇḍaḷamaṃ kiviyoḷ karâbjadoḷ |
suruchira-śûḷamaṃ mir̤upa dâḍegaḷaṃ nija-vaktradoḷ vibhî- |
karam ene tôr̤uguṃ samara-raṅgadoḷ î-raṇa-raṅga-Bhairavaṃ ǁ
X.
uriv Urigaṇṇa nîḷd urivol âge bhayaṅkara-kôpa-vanhi bhî- |
kara-kara-śûḷamaṃ karam agurbbisut irppa karâsi tâne pôlt |
ire gaṇam âge sad-bhaṭa-gaṇaṃ ripu-sênege pôlkum ugra-saṅ- |
gara-dhareyoḷ mahâ-praḷaya-Bhairavanaṃ raṇa-raṅga-Bhairavaṃ ǁ
XI.
baṛa-siḍilaṃ tuḍuṅkuva madândha-gajakk idirâgi kôḷkaḷaṃ |
mur̤iv ur̤adinda per-bbuliya mîseyoḷ uyyalan âḍuv ondu pê- |
rar̤ikey bîrar ântaḍam ad ê-vesagoṇḍape nettaraṃ nela-
kk er̤eyade mâṇgumî-samara-raṅgadoḷ î-raṇa-raṅga-Bhairavaṃ ǁ

buruha-yugaṃ .. samara-raṅgadoḷ î-raṇa-raṅga-Bhairava ǁ

chchariy enal êr̤isuvaṃ saṅ- | garadoḷ raṇa-raṅga-Bhairavaṃ Gôvindaṃ ǁ
XV.
birudara Javan adaṭara gôḷ- | muri malevara mâri gaṇḍa-vachcharadoḷ ma- |
chcharisuvara mirttu sauryyâ- | bharaṇaṃ raṇa-raṅga-Bhairavaṃ Gôvindaṃ ǁ
XVI.
raṇa-raṅga-Bhairavaṃ guṇa- | maṇi-maṇḍanan aṇṇan-aṅka-kâr̤aṃ su-bhaṭâ- |
graṇiy ene negardirddaṃ dhâ- | raṇiyoḷ Gôvindan ahita-danuja-Mukundaṃ ǁ
XVII.
adaṭinoḷ aṇminoḷ âyado- | ḷ odavida nichchaṭikeyoḷ per̤ar ssaman ill em- |
budan enisuva su-bhaṭaṃ jita- | kadanaṃ raṇa-raṅga-Bhairavaṃ Gôvindaṃ ǁ
XVIII.
vara-vidyâ-nidhi-Kêsi-Râja-vibhugaṃ Nîlabbegaṃ puṭṭi bhâ- |
sura-kîrtti-priyan âgi sanda guṇa-ratnaṃ Dâsi-Râjaṃ Parâ- |

kare Sômâmbike tân enalke jagadoḷ Gôvindan êṃ dhanyanô ǁ

vachanaṃ ǁ mattam â-mahânubhâvan-audâryya-prabhâvamaṃ pêḷvaḍe ǁ

praśnôttaraṃ ǁ
XIX.
.. sana .... muntaṇa .. sa . yi-pôgad âmp |
esakaman ântavaṅge pesar âvud ad êtar̤a mêle bir̤du tân |
oseyisuvaṃ priyaṃ muḷidaḷaṃ kivig êṃ pesar ârppin-êḷgeyiṃ |
vasumatiyoḷ vichârisuvaḍ ê-doreyaṃ raṇa-raṅga-Bhiravaṃ ǁ

Kali-kâla-Karṇṇaṃ ǁ

vachanaṃ ǁ â-samasta-guṇa-gaṇâbharaṇanuṃ | vibhuda-jana-śaraṇanuṃ | nija-viśuddha-kîrtti-
chandrikâ-prabhâva-vikasita-jagad-vaḷaya-kairavanuṃ | raṇa-raṅga-Bhairavanuṃ sakaḷa-su-kavi-
jana-kaḷpa-bhûjanuṃ | viśhama-haya-Vatsa-râjanuṃ | vîra-lakshmî-nivâsanuv | Anantapâḷa-pra-
sâdâsâditâdhikâra-lakshmî-viḷâsanum enisida śrîmad-daṇḍanâyaka-Gôvindarasar Mêlvaṭṭeya
vaḍḍa-râvuḷamuv eraḍuṃ bilkoḍeyuṃ perjjuṅkamumaṃ paḍedu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ prati-
pâḷisuttam ire ǁ

XX.
dhareg eseva Sakti-parshege | karam agraṇiy enipa Parvvatâvaiḷiyoḷ Mû- |
vara-kôṇeya santatig â- | bharaṇam Kêdâraśakti-yatipati negal̤daṃ ǁ
XXI.
â-Kêdâra-munîndrana | lôka-prastutana śishyan aty-amaḷa-guṇâ- |
nîkaṃ yaśaḥ-patâkaṃ | Śrîkaṇṭhaṃ vibudha-chûta-vana-kaḷakaṇṭhaṃ ǁ
XXII.
Hara-pâdâmbhôjadoḷ chittaman eseva mukhâmbhôjadoḷ Bhâratî-sun- |
dariyaṃ châritradoḷ nirmmaḷateyan akhiḷâśântadoḷ Śakra-dikkuñ- |
jara-bhâsvat-kîrttiyaṃ bittarade nirisidaṃ sad-guṇâḍhyaṃ munîndrâ- |
bharaṇaṃ Śrîkaṇtḥa-dêvaṃ budha-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ tarkka-vidyâ-samudraṃ ǁ

â-mahânubhâvana śishyan ê-doreyan endaḍe ǁ

XXIII.
Akaḷaṅkâmbra-mahîja-Chaitra-samayaṃ Lôkâyatâmbhôdhi-śî- |
takaraṃ Sâṅkhya-dharâ-diśâ-radani Mîmâmsâṅganâ-kambu-kaṇ- |
ṭha-kanan-mauktika-bhûshaṇaṃ Śugata-nîrêjâta-chaṇḍâmśu Tâ- |
rkkika-Sômêśvara-sûṛi pempu-vaḍedaṃ Naiyyâyikâgrêsaraṃ ǁ
XXIV.
kelabar Tarkka-viśâradar kkelabar âptâḷâpa-sambôdhakar |
kkelabar nnâṭaka-kôvidar kkelabar oḷ-gabbaṅgaḷaṃ ballavar |
[page 120]kkelabar vyâkaraṇajñar int initumaṃ bâpp intu viśvambharâ- |
taḷadoḷ ballavar âr enalke negal̤daṃ vidyâbdhi-Sômêśvaraṃ ǁ

svasti yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhyâraṇa-maunânushṭhâna-japa-samâdhi-śîḷa-sampannaṃ |
vibudha-jana-prasannaṃ | nyâya-śâstra-vistṛita-sarôja-vana-divâkaraṃ | Vaiśêshika-vârddhi-var-
ddhana-śarat-sudhâkaraṃ | Sâṅkhyâgama-pravîṇa-mâṇikyâbharaṇaṃ | guru-charaṇa-sarasiruha-
shaṭcharaṇaṃ | śabda-śâstra-sahakâra-vana-Vasantaṃ | prajñôdayôdbuddha-Lâkuḷa-siddhântaṃ |
nirupamôpanyâsa-Dêva-nadî-pravâhaṃ | nija-datta-mantra-prabhâva-saṃvarddhita-śishya-sandô-
haṃ | sâhitya-vidyâ-mahâ-nadî-pravâha-nimnagâdhîśvaraṃ | bhakti-prabhâva-paritushṭa-Paramê-
śvaraṃ | niravadya-nirmmaḷa—tapô-guṇaika-niḷayaṃ | kîrtti-kaumudî-mudita-mêdinî-vaḷayaṃ |
nâmâdi-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîmat-Sômêśvara-paṇḍita-dêvar ǁ

XXV.
ene negar̤d â-muni-nâthaṃ | tanag ar̤ipi yaśôrtthi Kṛishṇa-Râjânujan oḷ- |
pina-kaṇi Gôvindaṃ pada- | vinatâhita-bṛindan akhiḷa-vibudhânandaṃ ǁ

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ parama-
bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-
râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam iral Kalyâ-
ṇada nelevîḍinoḷ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire | śrîmach-Châḷukya-Vikrama-
varshada 27 neya Chitrabhânu-saṃvatsarada Paushya-śuddha 13 Budhavârad uttarâyaṇa-saṅkrâ-
ntiyandu ǁ Kuntaḷa-dharitrî-kânteya viḷôḷa-kuntaḷa-kaḷâpadant eseva Banavase-pannirchchhâsi-
rakk aḷaṅkâram âgi tôrppa Baḷḷigâveya Tâvareger̤eya dakshiṇa-Kêdârêśvara-dêvara sthânad
âchâryyar appa Sômêśvara-paṇḍita-dêvara kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi śrîmad-daṇḍa-
nâyakaṃ Gôvindarasar śrîmat-Kêdârêśvara-dêvara dhûpa-dîpa-nivêdyakk endu | âv-âgardoḷ piḍid
alli mâr̤uvaḍam er̤aḍu-lakkav-aḍakege perjjuṅkamuṃ vaḍḍa-râvuḷamum eraḍuṃ bilkoḍeyuṃ sarvva-
namasyam endu biṭṭar ǁ

XXVI.
ivan îy-andadoḷ eyde pâḷisidavaṅg ishṭârttha-saṃsiddhi sam- |
bhavikuṃ pûṇd al̤idandu Gaṅge Gaye Kêdâraṃ Kuru-kshêtram em- |
b ivaroḷ pêsade pârvvaraṃ kavileyaṃ strî-bâḷaraṃ ḷiṅgiy a- |
ppavaraṃ kondan avaṃ sva-gôtra-sahitaṃ biḷguṃ nigôdaṅgaḷoḷ ǁ

(usual final verse.)

XXVII.
vinuta-madhurôktiyiṃ tann | an-atiśaya-vachô-vibhûtig iduve yaśaś-śâ- |
sanam âdud embinaṃ śâ- | sanaman idaṃ baredan âśu-kavi Niṭalâkshaṃ ǁ
XXVIII.
parikise Malli-dêva-vibhug âr ssaman irbbarum ir-kkelaṅgaḷoḷ |
bareduvan antyadiṃ bareva bâjipa bâjipa kabbam entuṭ ant- |
ire posa-gabbamaṃ nuḍiva bhâvisi kêḷva kathâ-chatushkamaṃ |
dhare parikarmmam end initumaṃ guṇiyippa mati-prabhâvadoḷ ǁ

śrimat-sahaja-Sârasvata | vâchaka-Vârijâsanaṃ | nânâ-vidhâvadhâraṇâ-chakravartti Mallikârjju-
na-bhaṭṭaṃ kavi-Kañjasambhavaṃ ǁ

EC 07 Sk 99
DHARMA ID: INSEC07Sk099

99 At the same place, on an eighth stone.


I.
śrîmat-traiḷôkya-vandaysya Lakuḷîśasya śâsanaṃ |
jayaty anugatâtmêshṭa-dṛishṭâdṛishṭa-phala-pradaṃ ǁ
[page 121]yô dharmmâḷi-naṭîṃ śâsti vêda-daṇḍa-dharô naṭaḥ |
tach-chhâsanaṃ jayaty êtat tri-ḷôkî-maṅgaḷa-pradaṃ ǁ
vasantatiḷakaṃ ǁ
II.
yad-Viśvanâtha-padavî-stuti-rûpa-vêda- |
vrâtaika-śâsana-śiḷâ-taḷavad vibhâti |
Paṅkêjagarbbha-hṛidayaṃ sa jayaty achintyas |
traîḷôkya-śâsana-paṭus Taruṇêndumauḷiḥ ǁ
↓1ślô ǁ
III.
sâmikaṃ bâr̤parâḍîdaṃ bhûtayâ vâya-lakshitaṃ |
iti Sômêśvarô’ paśyan munir vvâdi-manôharaḥ ǁ

śivam astu ǁ

vṛi ǁ
IV.
svasti śrîmach-Chaḷukyânvaya-gagana-śarat-pûrṇṇa-chandraṃ kavîndra- |
prastutyaṃ chandra-rôchiḥ-paṭaḷa-nibha-yaśaṃ śatru-bhûpâḷa-masta- |
nyasta-śrî-pâda-padmaṃ vitaraṇa-guṇa-santarppitâśêsha-bhû-dê- |
va-stômaṃ sârvvabhaumâgraṇi vipuḷa-baḷaṃ Vikramâditya-Dêvaṃ ǁ
V.
birudaṃ biṭṭ al̤ki kaṇḍirpp ati-bhaya-rasadin tamma tamm âḷva viśvam- |
bhareyaṃ biṭṭ adri-kuñjaṅgaḷoḷ ul̤id ul̤id irpp urkki mârântu yuddhâ- |
jiradoḷ biṭṭ âtma-kântaughaman amara-vadhû-varggadoḷ lîḷeyindaṃ |
nered irpp udyôgamaṃ śâtravarge salisuvaṃ Vikramâditya-Dêvaṃ ǁ

va ǁ enisi pogaḷteyuṃ negaḷteyum appukeyda samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha ma-
hârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâraka Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷaka Châḷukyâbharaṇa śrîmat-
Tribhuvanamalle-Dêvaṃ nija-vijaya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrâr-
kka-târaṃ salal Kalyâṇada nelebîḍinoḷ parama-kalyâṇâbhyudaya-bhâgi samasta-dharâ-maṇḍaḷa-
man êka-chchhatradiṃ pâḷisuttaṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadind ire ǁ

vṛi ǁ
VI.
jagadoḷ muṃ khyâtiyan tâḷdida mṛigadharan-âmnâyadoḷ râja-bhâvaṃ |
negaḷd âkhyâ-śâmyadind â-śaśige gata-kaḷaṅkâtmaroḷ tammoḷ entuṃ |
negaḷdatt ill arttha-sâdṛiśyadin enisi jasaṃ betta nânâ-kavîndrô- |
ktig aḍarppâd oḷpu tammoḷ negaḷe negaḷda Pâṇḍyarkkaḷoḷ puṇya-puñjar ǁ

va ǁ anêkar arasu-makkaḷ prabhavise |

kan ǁ
VII.
Kṛita-yugadoḷ Jamadagnige | kṛitakṛityaṅg ogedu Rêṇuki-patig aṅgî- |
kṛita-guru-vadhanaṃ vadhiyisi | Kṛitavîryyâtmajanan ati-baḷaṃ Paraśudharaṃ ǁ
vṛi ǁ
VIII.
dharaṇî-maṇḍaḷadoḷ dharâbhujaran irppatt oudu sûḷ kondu tad- |

baram itt alli dharâmara-svaḍoḷ iralk âg endu pôg-otti sâ- |
garamaṃ châpada korppinoḷ budha-nutaṃ śrî-Rêṇukî-nandanaṃ ǁ

IX.
kaṇa-mâtrôdakaman iralk | aṇam îyade paśchimâbdhi teged eḍeyoḷ Koṅ- |

X.
Koṅkaṇa-dhâtrî-vaniteya | kaṅkaṇadant eseva Haiveyoḷ Sisugali sand |
aṅkada nâyaka-maṇivol | biṅkaṃ paḍed irkkum atuḷa-śôbhâ-sadanaṃ ǁ

vasatam enisirppar adar̤iṃ | Sisugaliy enisittu râjadhâni-śrêshṭhaṃ ǁ

janatâ-manô’bhinandana- | m ene kîrtti-jyôtsne beḷage jagadoḷage jalakk- |

sutan ogedaṃ vibhu tad-dam- | patigaḷg Abdhijeyum Abdhiśayananum ivar î- |

XVII.
vanitâ-jana-vandye yaśô- | dhane Sâvala-Dêvi su-dṛiḍha-purusha-vratey ant |

XIX.
Ratig eṇeyâge bîra-siri mâdhavam âge mahâhavaṃ samû- |
rjjita-vishamâstra-pâtadin arâtigaḷaṃ Divijêndra-kâminî- |
tatig er̤agippa balme nijam âgire sanda samagran amba bâ- |
pp atiśaya-Kâma-dêvan ivan endapud urvvare Kâma-Dêvanaṃ ǁ

va ǁ ant ensi Pâṇḍyânvayâvaḷiy emba mâniniya mogakke mûg irppante Pâṇḍya-pîṭhikeyoḷ ir-
dda | samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara | Gôkarṇṇa-pura-varâdhîśvara | Pâṇ-
ḍya-vaṃśa-chûḍâmaṇi | gaṇḍara dâmaṇi | parâṅganâ-Nadî-nandana | budha-jauânandana | Koṅ-
kaṇa-râshṭra-pâla | pusivara sûla | kîrttige nalla | Nigaḷaṅka-malla | śiraḥ-śêkharîbhûta-śrîmat-

bhuvanamalla-Kâma-Dêvarasar ssukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyuttam irdd-ondu devasaṃ
Śiva-dharmma-kathâ-kathana-prasaṅgadoḷ |

ślôkaḥ ǁ
XX.
dharmmaḥ kîrtti-latâ-kandô dharmmô lôka-dvayê hitaḥ |
dhârmmikâd aparô nâsti vandyô jagati kaśchana ǁ

va ǁ emba Śiva-dharmmânuśâsanaman âtmârâdhyar appa Sârasvata-mahôdaya śrîmat-Sômêśvara-

ttan âgi |

XXXI.
dhareyan adan akhiḷa-bâdhâ- | parihârade Mêchi-Seṭṭi sale kâd ûḍutt |
ire salipar akhiḷa-bâdhâ- | parihâraṃ mâḍi pañcha-maṭha-nagaraṅgaḷ ǁ

XXXIV.

[page 124]va ǁ enisid âtmârâdhyar appa | yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭhâna-japa-
samâdhi-śîḷa-sampanna | budha-jana-prasanna | dhâraṇâ-Padmagarbbha | paṭûtpâdana-sanda-
rbbha | kavitâ-sarôjinî-makaranda | gamaki-mukha-mukurunda | vâdi-manôhara | vâgmitva-Vidyâ-
dhara | nir-avadya-tapô-guṇâbhyudaya | Sârasvata-mahôdaya śrîmat-Sômêśvara-paṇḍita-dêvaraṃ
dharmma-kâryya-pratigrahakk âgrahaṃ geyd anugrahaṃ paḍedu | Banavase-pannirchchhâsira-
kkaṃ taley enisida râjadhâni Baḷḷigâveya teṅkaṇa Tâvareger̤ey-êriya jagat-trayâdhîśvara śrî-
dakshiṇa-Kêdârêśvara-devara dêva-kulada khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhârakkam â-dêvara gandha-
pushpa-dhûpa-dîpa-naivêdyâdi-nânâ-vidhôpahârakkam alliya tapôdhanâdigaḷa âhârakkam endu
sarvva-namasyam âge ǁ

end intu |
