[page 286]23 On a third vîrakal at the same place.


svasti śrî Saka-kâlam eṇṭanûr̤-ayvatt-êl̤aneya Vijayam emba varshaṃ pravarttise Suvarṇṇavarsha
pṛithvî-râjyaṃ geyye Banavâsi-nâḍaṃ chhalad-aṅka-Râman Sântaran âḷe Raṭṭapaḷḷiya Polaganu ....
.. palli .............. Kunda-gâvuṇḍana munde nindu ...... Râṇigavallaṃ palaraṃ taḷt ir̤idu sattu
su-gatige sandaṃ avar-abbe Siriyakkaṃ kallaṃ nirisidaḷu ǁ

EC 07 Hl 25
DHARMA ID: INSEC07Hl025

25 At Chikkayerehaḷḷi (same hobli), in the yard of the Râmêśvara temple.


ôṃ namaḥ Śivâya | namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ

vṛitta ǁ
I.
sômârkkânaḷa-mârutâmbara-dharâ-tôyâtma-rûpaṃ kaḷâ- |
dhâmâḷaṅkṛita-châru-jûṭan a-bhavaṃ śrî-Râmanâthaṃ sura- |
stôma-prastutan îge nâḷ-prabhuv enipp î-Kêta-gauḍaṅg iḷâ- |
prêmaṅg ûrjjita-dhârmmikaṅge padapiṃ dîrgghâyumaṃ śrîyumaṃ ǁ
II.
paridhâvan-matsya-puchchhâhata-makara-karâsphâḷanâbhîḷa-nakra- |
sphuritôdyach-chhiṃśumâra-kramaṇa-samuditôchchaṇḍa-vâtâbhighâtôd- |
dhura-vîchî-śîkaraugha-sthagita-nikhiḷa-dig-maṇḍaḷaṃ rañjikuṃ bhâ- |
sura-Jambû-dvîpamaṃ suttir̤id akhiḷa-dharâbhôga-bhadraṃ samudraṃ ǁ

va ǁ â-samudrada suttiṅg oḷagâda Jambû-dvîpada madhya-pradêśadoḷ ǁ

vṛi ǁ
III.
sura-vidyâdhara-dampatî-prakaradiṃ chandrârkka-târâ-gaṇôt- |
kara-śôbhâñchita-mêkhaḷâ-vaḷayadiṃ sat-kâñchanôddîpta-ban- |
dhura-gôtrâchaḷad unnata-pratibheyiṃ kalpâṅghripârâma-vis- |
taradiṃ rañjipud ujvaḷôrjjita-yaśaś-śrî-sundaraṃ Mandaraṃ ǁ
kaṃ ǁ
IV.
â-Mandarakke dakshiṇa- |
bhû-maṇḍaḷam esevud alli Bharata-kshêtraṃ |
Śrî-maṇḍanam ene tôrkkuṃ |
Bhû-mâninig amardu nimirda Knntaḷa-dêśaṃ ǁ
Kuntaḷa-dêśaṃ hasta-ta- |
ḷântaradol bhûmi kûrttu koṭṭant ire niś- |
chintadin âḷdidar akhiḷa-su- |
khaṃ tammoḷ baḷasi baḷaye Châḷukya-nṛipar ǁ

va ǁ tad-anantaraṃ tad-anvaya-pravarttana-vyatyayadoḷ ǁ

vṛi ǁ
V.
Kamaṭhâdhîśa-Phaṇîndra-dik-karigaḷ in tam-tamma kêḷî-viḷâ- |
sa-manaḥ-prîtiyoḷ irppud âyata-mahâ-bhû-bhâramaṃ tâḷvuva |
śramav êk int inibarggav âṃ taḷeyal in sâlveṃ dal embante dur- |
ddama-dôr-ddaṇḍade tâḷdidaṃ vasudheyaṃ ............ ǁ

(10 lines effaced).

â-Beḷagavarttiy-arasugaḷ-anvayâvatârav ent endaḍe ǁ

vṛitta ǁ
VI.
âtata-kîrtti Mâcharasan âḷvan iḷâ-taḷamaṃ vibhûti-vett- |
âtana tamman unnata-bhujaṃ negaḷvaṃ sale Malli-Dêvan ud- |
dyôtita-vikramaṃ tad anujaṃ pesar-Aiharasaṃ tad-âtmajaṃ |
bhû-taḷa-sêvyan ûrjjita-guṇônnatiyiṃ kali Râya-bhûbhujaṃ ǁ
[page 287]kaṃ ǁ
VII.
ṭad-apatyan akhiḷa-lakshmî- |
sadanaṃ kadana-prachaṇḍan apramita-yaśaṃ |
vidaḷita-ripu-kuḷa-naḷinî- |
madavad-vêdaṇḍa-rûpan Îśvara-bhûpaṃ ǁ
arasaṅka-karagasaṃ Sin- |
dara-dêvaṃ Mâḷatî-prasâdânvayan Î- |
śvara-maṇḍaḷêśa-tanayaṃ |
parârttha-nidhi Malli-Dêvan âḷdaṃ dhareyaṃ ǁ
â-nṛipa-tanayan udâraṃ |
mânita-mânyaṃ vinirjjitâhita-sainyaṃ |
sûnṛita-vachanaṃ dhareyoḷ |
tân enisal pempu-vettan Îśvara-bhûpaṃ ǁ

tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi nâḷ-prabhu Hattivûra Kêta-gâvuṇḍan-anvayâvatârav ent endaḍe ǁ

vṛitta ǁ
VIII.
Banavase-nâḍa Baḷḷaveya-kampaṇad ûrjjita-lakshmîy embinaṃ |
janad anurâgadind esepu tôrppud agurvvina Hattivûru nan- |
dana-vana-râjiyiṃ baḷed aḷumbade tôr̤uva gandha-śâḷiyind |
anupama-ramya-harmmya-tatiyind ati-sêvyam ad entu nôrppaḍaṃ ǁ

â-vûroḷ ǁ

vṛi ǁ
IX.
piriyaṃ sêvya-guṇaṅgaḷiṃ vibhavadind audâryyadiṃ dhairyyadiṃ |
piriyaṃ sanda-vivêkadiṃ vinayadiṃ dâkshiṇyadiṃ puṇyadiṃ |
piriyaṃ Śaṅkara-pâda-paṅkaja-namat-sad-bhaktiyiṃ yuktiyiṃ |
piriyaṃ Baisara-Dâsa-gauḍan esedaṃ viśvambharâ-bhâgadoḷ ǁ
â-vibhuvina kula-vadhu sam- |
bhâvite pati-hitey enippa pempiṃ negaḷdaḷ |
bhû-vaniteya suteyavol â- |
Sôvabe-gâvuṇḍi viśva-viśvambhareyoḷ ǁ
â-dampatigaḷa puṇyadi- |
n âdaṃ putraṃ praṇûta-budha-mitraṃ sam- |
pâdita-yaśô-vitânaṃ |
mêdiniyoḷ Kêta-gauṇḍan âhava-śauṇḍaṃ ǁ
mer̤edu nija-bhaktiyiṃ kûr- |
tt er̤agisi tâṃ patiyan âtan-aṅgane guṇadiṃ |
ner̤ey aydey âda saypind |
Er̤eyabe-gâvuṇḍi putravatiy ene negaḷdaḷ ǁ
Kêtana tammaṃ bhuvana-vi- |
nûta-yaśaṃ Mâḷa-gauṇḍan uru-bhuja-daṇḍaṃ |
bhü-taḷadoḷu pesarvettaṃ |
nûtana-Ravi-tanayan enipa dânônnatiyiṃ ǁ
â-Mâḷa-gauṇḍan-aṅgane |
bhû-mâniniy-antir eseva-vibhavada pempiṃ |
tâmarasa-vadane budha-chin- |
tâmaṇiy ene Mâḷa-gauṇḍiy esedaḷ dhareyoḷ ǁ
tat-taneyaṃ nija-kula-sam- |
patti sudhâvârddhi-varddhanôdaya-chandraṃ |
vṛitta-bhujan enisi negaḷdan u- |
dâtta-yaśaṃ Hattivûra Dâsa-gavuṇḍaṃ ǁ
[page 288]vṛi ǁ
X.
guṇada baṇambe pempina tavarmmane satyada bittu sarvva-la |
kshaṇada nidhânav aṇmin-erevaṭṭ abhimânada râśi dharmmad oḷ- |
gaṇi nayad âkaraṃ vibhavad ûrjjita-bhûmiy enal prabhutvad a- |
graṇi sale Hattivûr-eseva-Dâsa-gavuṇḍane dhanyan urvviyoḷ ǁ
âtana kânte châru-vibhavônnate sêvya-guṇa-praṇûte vi- |
jñâta-kaḷâ-kaḷâpe su-charitra-vibhûshaṇe dâna-śîle vi- |
khyâta-patibrata-prabhuteyaṃ nere tâḷdi manônurâgadiṃ |
bhû-taḷadoḷ negaḷte-vaḍedaḷ pesar-Âchave-gauṇḍi santataṃ ǁ
ka ǁ
XI.
â-Dâsa-gavuṇḍaṅgaṃ |
mêdini-vikhyâtey Âchi-gauṇḍigav olavind |
âdaṃ magan akhiḷa-janâ- ǁ
hlâdakaraṃ Kêta .............. taṃ ǁ

vvî-râmânvita-Dâsan-agra-ta ................ ṃ |

khyâta-subandhu bandhu-vibhavâbharaṇaṃ raṇa-dhîran embud î- |
bhûtaḷav Âcha-gauṇḍiya tanûbhavanaṃ sale Kêta-gauṇḍanaṃ ǁ
sthiranê Mandara-dhairyyan âtma-hitanê śrî-Râmanâthârchchakaṃ |

XIII.
vinayame beḷa-geyi vidvaj- |
jana-santôshaṇame râśi satyame bitt end |
enisida maymeya pervveḷa- |

XIV.
saṅgata-chakravâka-mithuna-stani châru-sarôja-vaktre san- |

tuṅga-bhuja-pratâpa-nidhi Kêta-gavuṇḍana kânte santataṃ ǁ

XV.
pati-hite tâne sach-charite tâne guṇânvite tâne sat-kalôr- |
jjita-mati tâne sêvya-vibhavônnate tâne vinûta-satya-saṃ- |
yute sale tân enal vinuta-Kêta-gavuṇḍana dharmma-patni tân |
atiśayav embinaṃ negaḷdaḷ uttame Kâḷave-gauṇḍi dhâtriyoḷ ǁ
vinutaṃ śrî-Hattiyûra prabhuv ene negaḷd î-Kêta-gauṇḍaṅge putrar |
jjana-sêvyaṃ Dâsa-gauṇḍaṃ tad-anujan esedaṃ Mâcha-gâvuṇḍan ant â- |
tana tammaṃ Chîya-gauṇḍaṃ tad-anujan atuḷaṃ Râman urvvi-lalâmaṃ |
vi ............ budha-nidhi vasudhâ-viśrutaṃ Nâga-gauṇḍaṃ ǁ

alliya sthânapati ǁ

.......... gaṇan adhigatâgama-vidyâ- |

tad-apatyaṃ nuta-dharmma-kâryya-nirataṃ sâhitya-vidyâ-viśâ- |

kaṃ ǁ

samanipud aihika-vibhavaṃ |
nimird esaguṃ kîrtti-vallî ........ |
............ mant |
amardikkuṃ dharmma-tatparaṅg arid uṇṭê ǁ

endu dharmmaman abhivarṇṇisal â dharmmamane mukhyaṃ mâḍi ǁ svasti śrîman-nâḷ-prabhu
Hattivûra Kêta-gâvuṇḍan akhiḷa-bandhu-jana-parivṛitan âgirddu śrî-Râmanâtha-dêvara pûje-punas-
kârakkaṃ nandâ-dîvigegaṃ nitya-nivêdyakkaṃ Chaitra-pavitrakkaṃ mâṭa-kûṭakkaṃ khaṇḍa-sphu-
ṭita-jirṇṇôddhârakkav aṅga-bhôga-raṅga-bhôgakav endu Śaka-varshada 1130 neya Vibhava-saṃvat-
sarada Kârttika-śu 15 Sômavâra-vyatîpâta-saṅkramaṇadandu hegger̤eya baḍagaṇa-kôḍiyalli mattar
oṃ 1 vûriṃ paḍuvaṇa naḍu-kumbadalli moge mattar ondu 1 Aihanagaṭṭada keḷagaṇa yere
mattar ondu 1 antu mûr̤u-mattaraṃ dêvargge dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭaru ǁ ker̤ege Hiriyaker̤e-
ya teṅkaṇa-kôḍiyal ere kamba ayvattu 50 Chikkanaker̤ey-Aṇiyakoṇḍad oḷagaṇa baḍaga-deseya
keṅgâḍu kamba 50 ǁ antu ker̤ege mattar ondu ǁ namas Śivâya â-Hattivûra hola-sîmey entendaḍe
mûḍalu Chaṭṭabey-âla teṅkalu Baḷḷegereya kôḍiya mattad-oḍavu haḍuvalu Bikkeyamoraḍiya teṅka-
ṇa-nêgila-kallu baḍagalu nêgila-kallu îśânyadalu Dugiya-Bammana koḷadindaṃ baḍagalu Honnâ-
vareya koḷa mêre ǁ

kaṃ ǁ

(usual final verse).

śrî-Râmanâtha śaraṇu śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ Tûdapiḷḷe-daṇṇâyakanu suṅkada heggaḍe Viru-
payya-Nâkayyaṅgaḷu sahitav âgirddu śrî-Râmanâtha-dêvarige biṭṭa gâṇa 1 hatt-ettina-vakkalu-der̤e

svasti śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Sinda-Gôvinda sitagara-gaṇḍa Pâtâḷa-chakravartti arasaṅka-
karagasa birudar-aṅkuśa maleya tottaḷe-duḷiva Malaparoḷu gaṇḍa kadana-prachaṇḍa Nissaṅka-malla

padmârâdhakanum appa Îśvara-Dêvarasaru Beḷagavarttiya nelavîḍinoḷ irddu Eḍavaṭṭe Baḷḷave

ttam ire yire ǁ Saka-varuśada 1093 Nandana-saṃvatsarada 14 Â Sâ[n]taḷigeya-nâḍa arasu Siṅgi-

maga Chîlaya | Mattala-Mallayana maga Kêtayanu yint ivaru aṇṇa-tammandiru kaṇḍu her̤ahiṅgade
parid eydi tâgi taḷt-ir̤id echchu Javan okilikidante palabaraṃ kondu billa daṇḍegoṇḍu ghêṇa kittu ku-
dureyaṃ tividu tur̤uvaṃ hintiki sura-lôka-prâptar âdaru ǁ and ent endaḍe Chîlayaṅgaṃ Beḷavu-ga-

svasti śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Malli-Dêvarasaru Beḷagavattiya nelevîḍinoḷu yirddu Eḍavaṭṭe

Saka-varisada 1118 Piṅgaḷa-saṃvatsarada Vaisâkha-su 10 Âdivâradandu Vummâ-Dêvi Kavuḍi-voḷey-
alli bîḍa biṭṭu dhâḷi-mârggadiṃ Beḷagavattige bandu kâdi keṭṭu hôgutta Kattagiyall idda jîva-dana-
vaṃ koṇḍu-hôhâga nâḍavaru huyyalâgi haridu bavaravaṃ hiḍidalli matt alli Malayana maga Chîlayanu
kûḍe haridu her̤ahiṅgade Hattivûra Müḍaṇameyya Voḍḍanaker̤eya keḷage tâgi taḷt-ir̤idu Javan
okilikidante palabaraṃ kondu bilaṃ daṇḍegoṇḍu ghêṇa kittu kudureya tividu sura-lôka-prâptan âda ǁ

chintâmaṇiyuv appa Bîrayanu nilsidaṃ bîra-gala ǁ

↓2Tasibanivritta-padhavê gati ǁ Kaluke-Râṅgâsôvi-padhavê gati ǁ Haṭṭi-Râṅgâsômi-padhavê gati ǁ
râjêśrî Hirê-Hanumapana makkat Tula-Hanumapana makka Yimmaḍi-Hanumapana makkana komârâ
kKeṅgapana makka yirttaghe Basavapa-âidha Basava-komararu ǁ

I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

śrîman mamatta sosta śrîman-mama .. śrî-jayâ-Sâlivâhana-śaka-varuśa ↓31399 varaśâ Plavaṅga-nâma-
saṃcharada Paluguṇa-su 12 Śnivarâdalu ǁ Dâsarahaṭṭi-Raṅgasvâmi shuhi yêḷu-gûḍinali kaḷad ôḍi vaḷa-
gaṇahuttada vaḷage yidda Raṅgasvâmi vudhupalaradhu Śanivârada parva-kâladalli mûvattu-ghaḷigeya-
lu Râmachandhrim embali Kaḷali murkadoḷage huṭṭidantha Raṅgasvâmiya sêvige vuḍumaḍi Samêrâya
Timmapanu Dâsarahaṭṭi Râṅgapa Guttiyapaligu Haṭṭi-Raṅgasvâmiya Samerâyatanavu namma nayanu
hêḷi tîrisikoḍabêku endu hêḷi-koṇḍalli avaru richarâvuḍiralli nim-maneya higaḍadeverâdhu nîvu nîvu
yittaṇḍadavaru kûḍi dêvara munde pâvaḍha-mâḍidhalladhe verâdhu yendu yibbarigu hêḷi yidarava-
ḷage geddavarige Samêrâyatana koḍabêku yendu .. yî-kaṭṭu mâḍisi nîvu summane hôgakêligadhu
nîvu nîvu yittaṇḍa kûḍi vabba-vabbana hoṇe koṭu sôtavarige ga 100 geddavarige 50 l yî-rîtiyalu hoṇe
koṭu hôgabêku yendu hêḷidalli â-mâtige Dâsarahaṭṭi Samêrâya-Raṅgappage Nêmatti Vujanî-Gauḍa
hoṇi Vuḍumaḍḍi Samêrâya-Timmapage tâne Vîri-Gauḍa Timmapanu hoṇi yî-rîtiyalu hoṇi koṭṭu
bandu Haṭṭi-Râṅgappana guḍi munde Tirumali-Dâsaiyana śirâga-pâvaḍa mâḍidalli dhintattakke
pavaḍage dhare sariy endu vayidha-mâḍidalli dhirnnartakke pavaḍa gedditu ǁ pavaḍakke kûḍida
janarannu yalla samastaru kûḍidâga manige hôdaru râ ǁ gâḷavaru vichâra mâḍidalli sôtavar yâru
geddavaru yâru yendu kêḷidalli kaṇḍanthâvaru dêvaru Dâsarahaṭṭi Samêraya-Raṅgappanu geddanu
Vuḍumaḍḍi Tippappanu sôtanu yendu hêḷidaru vaḷittu nîvu âḍida-prakârakke namma haṇa (back)
vannu koḍi endu kêḷidalli avarige tamma tamma haṇavanu verasidaru | dêvaru nimage vandu arike
mâḍikkoḷḷuttêne nanagû yêḷu-nûru maṭṭige karchu bittu yidakke dêvara daya harâdu nanage vandu
grâmavannu pâlisabêku yendu kêḷikoṇḍalli avarige vaḷḷittu yendu Dâsarahaṭṭiy emba grâmavanu
hâkikoṭṭaru yî-grâmavannu kâla-kâlakke ga 50 ke rukka yidhikke yidannu nînu ninna janaü saha
vuṇḍu-baruvadu yandu hêḷidaru ǁ ninna mani marri grâma mâḍikoṇḍu anubhavisi-kombudu Dâsara-
haṭṭi Samêrâya-Raṅgapanu dêvaru namma .... namage vandu ........... bêku yendu râ ǁ gaḷige
(here follow details of gift.) vandu-kaṇḍugada prakârâ appaṇekoṭṭaru ǁ Dâsarahaṭṭi Samêrâya-Raṅgap-
page Samêrâya-Kanaḍana râjyada vivara Maḷênahaḷḷi-sîme Sîmogge-śîme Yikkêri-sîme Beḷagutti-sîme
.. yindhanu yi-Raṅgappanu anubhavisabêku yendu .... koṭṭa tâmbrada śâsana sahi ǁ Dâsarahaṭṭi
Samêrâya-Raṅgappa mâḍida pavaḍa mânya 1 nu bandhutâ Raṅgappa .... ru ............ pakkavu
saha koṭṭaru ǁ yidakke sâkshi ǁ (here follow names of witnesses).

35 At Beḷagutti (Belagutti hobli), on a vîrakal to the west of the Siddhêśvara temple.


svasti samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Malli-Dêvarasaru sukha-saṅkathâ-
vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam i .. 1109 neya Plavaṅga-saṃvatsarada Kârttika-bahuḷa-amâvâsye-
Sômavâradandu ǁ

vṛitta ǁ
I.
Chaṭṭa-nṛipâḷakaṃ berasu Pâṇḍyanum ôvade Nêlivarttiyaṃ |
toṭṭane pâydu jîva-dhanam ellaman âgaḷe koṇḍu pôge benn- |
aṭṭi teraḷchi taḷt ir̤idu pervvaḍeyaṃ tur̤uvaṃ magurchchi tâṃ |
Chaṭṭeya-Nâyakaṃ paḍedu mechchi[si]daṃ sura-kanneyarkkaḷa ǁ
[page 292]Malla-nripâḷakaṃ besase perggaḍe-Mallana putran âjiyoḷ |
tallaḷav appinaṃ pagege sar̤r̤-ene kiḷt alagiṃ turaṅgamaṃ |
bill-aṇiyaṃ karul̤t ir̤idu chechcharav â-tur̤uvam magurchchi tân |
illade Chikk-Chaṭṭan amarâṅganeyarkkaḷoḷ oḷdu kûḍidaṃ ǁ
kaṇḍadoḷ iṇḍiyâḍi bisu-nettaroḷ ôkuḷikûḷiyâḍi pechchi mâr- |
koṇḍoḍan echcha pûṇigara paṇdaleyaṃ poḍe-seṇḍan âḍid-og- |
gaṇḍan ivan dal end êṃ posa-muttina sêseyan ikki kûḍe kai- |
koṇḍ oḍan oydar achcharasiyar kkali-Chaṭṭanan âji-raṅgadoḷ ǁ
nachchi pored âḷdanaṃ sale |
mechchisi tur̤uvaṃ magurchchi mârppaḍeyaṃ talt |
achch ir̤ida .... puraṅgaḷan |
orchchatamaṃ koṇḍan alte nâyaka-Chaṭṭaṃ ǁ

svasti śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Malli-Dêvarasaruṃ Kanna-Gâvuṇḍana Bomma-Gâvuṇḍanuṃ

varaṃ salisuvaru (usual final phrases).

37 On a third vîrakal at the same place.


śrî-Gôvindâya namaḥ ǁ svasti samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Malli-Dêvara-
saru Beḷagavarttiyoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire Śaka-varshada 1118 neya
Naḷa-saṃvatsara-Chaitra-bahuḷa-êkâdasî-Sômavâradandu ǁ

kaṃ ǁ
I.
toṭṭ enal Ummâ-Bâyiya |
kaṭṭ-âḷgaḷ kudure-verasu tur̤ugoḷe keṭṭ â- |
Gaṭṭeya-Nâyakan ur̤ad ir̤id |
oṭṭajeyind ânt avaṃ maguḷchidan âgaḷ ǁ
vṛitta ǁ
II.
Boppâ-Dêvi-samêtav irddu besasal Malla-kshamâpâḷan int |
oppam-bett idir-ânta-vairi-balamaṃ beṅkoṇḍu tîbrâsiyiṃ |
topp end ôvade poydan aṅgarikaroḷ ballâḷ karaṃ Gaṭṭeyaṃ |
bâpp end î-dhare baṇṇisalke paḍedaṃ svarggâpavarggaṅgaḷaṃ ǁ
bharadiṃ Malleya-Nâyaka-priya-sutaṃ Gaṭṭayyan ugrâjiyoḷ |
turagaṃ muttidoḍ ikki tat-turagamaṃ ball-âḷgaḷaṃ khaḍgadiṃ |
karuḷuṃ kaṇḍamum âli-sûsuvinegaṃ śrî-Raṅga Gôvind enutt |
uru-têjaṃ paded apsarô-gaṇa-yutaṃ Vaikuṇṭhamaṃ pordidaṃ ǁ

intu kâdi palaraṃ kondu tur̤uvam magurchchiy aṅgarika Malleya-Nâyaka Mâcheya-Nâyakara magaṃ
Gaṭṭeya-Nâyaka sura-lôka-prâptan âda ǁ srîmat-Malli-Dêvarasaru samasta-pradhânaruṃ mûliga-
Bamma-Gâvuṇḍanuṃ sahitavâgirddu Gaṭṭeya-Nâyakan-âḷutanakke mechchiy Ubbaramâniyalu gadde
kamba 10 Sôvabarasiya-keṛeya keḷa beddale kamba 20 salisuvar ǁ

38 On a fourth vîrakal at the same place.


namaḥ Śivâya ǁ svasti samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Malli-Dêvarasaru
Beḷagavatiyoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ-geyyuttm ire Śaka-varshada 1118 neya Naḷa-saṃ-
vatsarada Vaiśâkha-suddha-paurṇṇamî-Vaḍḍavâradandu ǁ

[page 293]kaṃ ǁ
I.
Ummâ-Bâyiya dhâḷiy ad |
ommeye kavi-tandoḍ eydi saṅgarad eḍeyoḷ |
vummaḷiy appinav ari-balav |
ammi kar̤ul̤t ir̤idan ur̤ade nâyaka-Mailaṃ ǁ
vṛi ǁ
II.
toḍe kaḍiy-ôpinaṃ bariy eraḷ-kelan ommeye chekke-vôpinaṃ |
naḍu biḷe-vôpinaṃ tale kaṇakkenal âgaḷ uruḷdu pôpinaṃ |
toḍardaran ôvade aṅgaruka-Maileya-Nâyakan âtma-khaḍgadiṃ |
kaḍu-gali poydu-voyd irade mechchisidaṃ sura-kanneyarkkaḷaṃ ǁ
bhâsura-kîrtti-vett eseva Malla-nṛipâḷakan-aṅgarakkan â- |

âsurav appinaṃ ripu-turaṅga-balaṅgaḷan ikki gellavaṃ |
sâsigan oḷpu-vett amara-kâminiyarkkaḷoḷ oldu kûḍidaṃ ǁ

va ǁ antu kâdi palaraṃ kondu tur̤uvaṃ maguḷchi sura-lôka-prâptan âda ǁ Śivâya namaḥ ǁ Siddhê-
śvarâya namaḥ ǁ

40 On a sixth vîrakal at the same place.


...... svasti samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Malli-Dêvarasaru Be ... sukha-
saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire Śaka-varshada 1118 neya Na .... Vaiśâkha-suddha-
pûrṇṇami-Vaḍḍavâradandu ǁ

kaṃ ǁ
I.
bharadind Ummâ-Bâyiya |
tu ............. dhanamaṃ pôgal |
parid echchu Jêḍar-Appaṃ |
tur̤uvaṃ pint-ikki kâdidaṃ tat-kshaṇadoḷ ǁ
.. r̤ad idirâda pûṇigara paṇ-daleyaṃ par̤iy echchu tûḷdi tat- |
tar̤ed ar̤idâ ...... raṅga-balamaṃ kali kiḷt alaginde sêneyaṃ |
par̤ivar̤iyappinaṃ tavisi Jêḍara ...... meyan-Appugaṃ baḷald |
or̤agi surâṅganâ-janada tôḷoḷ avaṃ sura-lôkav eydidaṃ ǁ
Appan ivaṃ parârttha-nidhiy appan ivaṃ kali dâni kûrmmeyind |
appan ivaṃ parâṅgane ...... sucharitra-guṇa-praṇûtan int |
appan âvan end eseva Jêḍara-Sômeyan-Appanaṃ ........ |
.. ppi tand oydav achcharasiyarkkaḷ id êṃ sura-lôka-sêvyanô ǁ

intu kâdi palaraṃ ............ tur̤uvaṃ magurchchi Jêḍara-Sômeyana magan Appugaṃ sura-lôka-
prâptan âdaṃ ǁ

48 On another vîrakal at the same place.


ôṃ namaḥ Śivâya ǁ svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-prithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ Yâdava-

tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi Mâyi-Dêva-daṇṇâyakaru Banavase-nâḍa mêlâḷikey-adhikâraṃ mâḍuttire ǁ

I.
Sinda-kuḷâmbara-dyumaṇiyaṃ kali-Malla-nṛipâḷa-putranaṃ |

kundade baṇṇikuṃ dhareyoḷ Îśvara-Dêvanan udgha-puṇyanaṃ ǁ

sukhadi râjyaṃ geyyutam ire ǁ Śaka-varshada 1138 neya Dhâtu-saṃvatsarada Vaiśâkha-śu 5 Bṛiha-
vâradal Îśvara-Dêvaṃ Chiṇṇeya-sâhaṇiyaṃ besase ǁ

pôdar ene muḷida-Javanant |

bharadindaṃ parid eydi Bêḍa-vaḍeyaṃ kaṇḍ ârddu beṅkoṇḍu tat- |

49 On a third vîrakal.


ôṃ namah Śivâya ǁ svasti samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ satya-ratnâkaraṃ
śaraṇâgata-vajra-pañjaraṃ arasaṅka-karagasaṃ Billêśvara-dêva-pâdârâdhakaṃ para-baḷa-sâdhakar
appa Bîra-Dêvarasaru bhuja-baḷadiṃ Beḷagavattiyoḷ râjyaṃ geyyuttire ǁ Śaka-varshada 1167 neya
Krôdhi-varshada Vaiśâkha-śu 5 Guruvâradal Lakhkhaṇapâḷa Kali-Dêvaṃ dhâḷiṭṭu Hattivûra
bavaradoḷ ǁ

I.
muḷid-â-Lakhkhaṇapâḷanâ kuduregaḷ dhâliṭṭu sênôchchaḷaj- |
jaḷadhi-dhvânadin uṇmi poṇmi baral â-bhîtôrvvipâḷôdgha-maṇ- |
ḍaḷikôdyad-bala-sâgaraṃ por̤amaḍutt ipp aisakaṃ muñchi tad- |
baḷamaṃ kâdi teraḷchi kondu palaraṃ vaichitradind Aichugaṃ ǁ
pareda-karuḷ-miduḷugaḷiṃ |
nore-nettara ponalgaḷinde kaṇḍada kesar̤iṃ |
siram uruḷva-muṇḍadiṃ bhî- |
karav âyt and Aichan ir̤ida saṅgara-raṅgaṃ ǁ
siḍil aḍasi poḍeva-ter̤adiṃ |
paḍey-aśvaman uruḷe poḍedu balamaṃ kondaṃ |
kaḍu-galiy-Aichuganaṃ taḷ- |
toḍan â-khêchariyar oyye saggaṃ bokkaṃ ǁ

Guttanahaḷḷiya Kâḷeyana tammaṃ leṅk-Aichaṃ sura-lôka-prâptan âdaṃ ǁ

EC 07 Hl 50
DHARMA ID: INSEC07Hl050

50 Behind the same temple.


Śivâya ǁ namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ

I.
jaya [nti Siddhanâtha] sya pâda-paṅkaja-pâṃsavaḥ |
sura-vidyâdharâdhîśa-matta-bhṛiṅgâṅga-saṅginaḥ ǁ
bhû-chandrârkka-samîraṇânal̤a-viya ...... rttis sadâ
Pârvvatyâs smita-lôḷa-nêtra-sukhadas traiḷôkya-śôbhâspadaḥ |
bhaktâbhîshṭa-phaḷa-pradas sura-gaṇa-prastu ........ |
.. yâd Îśvara-bhûmipâl̤am amaḷa-śrî-Sinda-vaṃśôdbhavaṃ ǁ

namaḥ Siddhêśvarâya Śambhavê ǁ

II.

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya .... pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ Kâḷâñjara-

vvare Sinda-kulâvatâranaṃ sale pogaḷguṃ ǁ

[page 301]...... mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara Karahâṭa-pura-varâdhîśvara Mâḷatî-dêvî-labdha-vara-pra-
sâdâsâdita-samasta-mahî-maṇḍaḷaṃ vijaya-lakshmî-karṇṇa-kuṇḍaḷaṃ .... virâjamâna dâna-Kânîna
mallaḷi-tûryya-nirgghôśaṇaṃ guṇa-ratna-bhûśaṇaṃ Sinda-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍa vijaya-dôr-ddaṇḍa
Phaṇirâja-vaṃsa sujanâvataṃsa byâghra-mṛiga-lâñchhanaṃ niyôga-kâñchanaṃ śauryya-parâ-
yaṇaṃ vairi-Nârâyaṇaṃ arasaṅ[ka]-karagasaṃ birudar-aṅkusa vairi-vana-dâvaṃ Sindara dêvaṃ
Niḍudôḷa-Sindaṃ Karahaḍa-nâlsâsira-voḷagâg anêka-dêśaṅgaḷan âḷvan âtana vaṃśadoḷ anêkaru
râjyaṃ geyidar avaroḷu

vṛi ǁ

mânini sale Dôrabarasi pempiṃ negaḷdaḷ ǁ

pinde turagamane pâyisi |

gindaṃ salag ir̤idan ur̤ade Mâcha-nṛipâḷaṃ ǁ
â-nripan-anujan udâraṃ |

tân enipaṃ Malli-Dêvan adaṭara dêva ǁ

harasaṃ pesarvetta ........ dhâtrî-taḷadoḷ ǁ

îyalum î-nṛipa-sutaṃ samartthan enuttaṃ |

jîy ene baṇṇipud udâtta-kîrttî-priyanaṃ ǁ

XVII.
iṅgaḍalante pempu-vaḍed Îśvara-bhûpana kîrttiyaṃ kaḷaṅ- |

laṅgisidâgaḷ ond inisu pôlvaḍe pôlke ...... êḷgeyoḷ ǁ

padan int î-vijayaṃ vi .... vijayâḷaṅkâran end endu lô- |
kadavar vvarṇṇise sat-kumârar esedar vviśvambharâ-bhâgadoḷ ǁ

va ǁ antu pogaḷtegaṃ negaḷtegaṃ neley enisida kumârar ttanage besakeyye nija-vijaya-bhuja-baḷadiṃ
pûrvva-purusharind upârjjisida nâḍugaḷ av âvuv endaḍe ǁ Eḍevaṭṭey-erppattuṃ .. yaḷige-nâlvattuṃ
Baḷḷave 70 Hoḷalûru .... Sântaḷigeyalli Muduvara 80 Yaḍasule ye 70 Kaḍambaḷike-nâḍoḷage

enipa Beḷagavarttiya nelevîḍinoḷu sukhadin arasu-geyyuttam iralu ǁ

kaṃ ǁ
XVIII.
Śiva-pâdâmbuja-bhṛiṅgaṃ |

.................... vidyâ- |
pravaraṃ Maleyâḷa-Dêvan eḷeyoḷu negaḷdaṃ ǁ
............ |

sach-chhâstrâmbu ...... |

tat-tâpasa-taneyaṃ Śiva- |

dâttaṇ ............ ǁ
para-hitan â-yati-putraṃ |

............ |
dhare pogaḷalu negaḷda Saṅka .... ǁ
.... yâdanô padapiniṃ vidyâdharaṃ varṇṇiy â- |
dano mêṇ Indra-tanû ........ koṇ- |
ḍane ...................... |
.... viśruta-Saṅkârâsi-yatipaṃ Siddhêśvarârâdhakaṃ ǁ

svasti ya ........ prâṇâyâma ........ śrîmatu Saṅkarâsi-panḍitar â-nṛipaṅge dharmmaman
abhivarṇṇise kaṃ ǁ↓1 ......... arddikkuṃ dharmma-tatparaṅg ariduṇṭê ǁ va ǁ endu dharmmamane
mukhyaṃ mâḍi ...... Siddhêśvara-dêva ...... dyakke khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhârakkav endu
Śaka-varshada 1102 neya Śârvvari-saṃvatsarada Vaiśâkha-suddha 8 Sômavâradandu śrîman-
mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara .... vara ... mêlâḷkeya Mahâdêva-daṇṇâyakaru tanna kumâraraṃ heggaḍe-
Sâyyaṇṇa heggaḍe-Sômayyanuṃ heggaḍe-Mâḷayyanuṃ heggaḍe-Bammayyanuṃ int î-pradhânaruṃ
daṇṇâyaka-Madhuvaṇṇanuṃ gauḍugaḷuṃ sahitav âgirddu tanna Beḷagavartti ...... ḷḷiya heg-
ger̤eya keḷage Gaṅgana gaḷeyalu keyi mattaru hadinaydaṃ 15 Saṅkarâsi-paṇḍitara kâlaṃ karchchi
...... â-holakke sîmey entendaḍe mûḍalu Dêhârada ker̤eya mûḍaṇa kôḍi teṅkalu ............
pûrvva sthaḷa-vṛitti śrîmat-Siddhêśvara-dêvarggaṃ Dâsêśvara-dêvarggaṃ maṭhada-hor̤a ...... va
50 mattaṃ daṇṇâyaka-Madhuvaiyana maga Sômayyan âtana ...... mâḍisikoṇḍ â-ker̤eya baḍaga-
gôḍiyalu biṭṭa beddale kamba 50 ........ telligar â-dêvara nandâ-dîvigge biṭṭa .. gâṇa ......
.... kaṃ ǁ virachisidano Pailamma .............. (usual final verse).

[page 303](on the top) śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Malli-Dêvana taḷâr̤am Biddaṇana Boppeya-Nâyakaṃ
tann-âḷdana kaiyalu paḍedu śrî-Kêśava-dêvargge Siddhêśvara-dêvara gaddeyiṃ teṅkalu biṭṭa gadde
kamma 10 ondu-gâṇada hoṅge vaṇa vond-eley-okkala sârige yale 100 Śivâya namaḥ ǁ

EC 07 Hl 51
DHARMA ID: INSEC07Hl051

51 At the same village, on a vîrakal near a wall to the east of the Channa-Kêśava temple.


svasti samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Malli-Dêvarasaru sukha-saṅkathâ-
vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyuttire Śaka-varshada 1117 neya Râksha sa-saṃvatsarada Chaitra-śuddha 5
Bṛihaspativâradandu ǁ

vṛitta ǁ
I.
Malli-nṛipâḷakaṃ besase machcharadindame R̤aṭṭepaḷḷiy â- |
ballaṇiyaṃ kar̤utt ir̤id idirchchidaraṃ tave kondu sêneyoḷ |
tallaḷamaṃ taguḷchi kaṭi-pallaṭav âgire poydu vairiyaṃ |
Kalleya-Nâyakaṃ karame mechchisidaṃ sura-kanneyarkkaḷaṃ ǁ
tarataradindav ârddisuva poyv iḍuv ôkuva nûṅkuv âṅkegoḷ- |
varan adaṭiṃ kar̤utt ir̤idu saṅgaradoḷ Javan okkilikkid ant- |
ire ner̤e-mâḍid aṅgarika Kalleya-Nâyakanaṃ mahôtsavaṃ |
beras idirgoṇḍar achcharaseyarkkaḷ id êṃ kaliyô viḷâsiyô ǁ
karuḷa toḍarppu koḷ-miduḷa-jâr̤ike kaṇḍada .... tûḷdi ne- |
ttara ponal aṭṭey aṭṭuḷi ...... gaḷa tintiṇiy âdud êṃ janaṃ |
pirid ir̤id-âva .................. Nâyakan âji-raṅgaḍoḷ |
sura-purav eydipaṃ nija-bhujôddhata ......... vâraṇaṃ ǁ

antu .... palaraṃ kondu sura-lôka-prâptan âda ǁ Siddhêśvarâya namaḥ ǁ

EC 07 Hl 54
DHARMA ID: INSEC07Hl054

54 At Kuḷahaḷḷi village (same hobli), on a vîrakal in Nañjayya’s field near Pâtara-maraḍi, south-west of the village.


I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

svasti samasta-pra[śa]sti-sahitaṃ śrîmanu mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ satya-ratunâkaraṃ śaraṇâgata-
vajra-pañjaraṃ arasaṅka-karagasaṃ birudar-aṅkusaṃ mûrtti-Nârâyaṇaṃ viḷâsa-vallabhaṃ śrî-
Billêśvara-dêvara dibya-śrî-pâda-padumârâdhakaṃ para-baḷa-sâdhakarum appa śrîmat-kumâra-Bîra-
Dêvarasaru Kalliseyalu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyvutam irddalli Saka-varsha 1168
neya Visvâvasu-saṃvatsarada Jêshṭha-śu 13 Śukravârada .. Boppula samasta-sênâ-nâyakaru
samasta-sannâha-sahita Kûḍaliya mutti śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ bâhattara niyôgâdhipati sakaḷa-
lakshmî-pati Sêvuṇa-sannâhana-samûhanum appa Śrîdhara-daṇṇâyakara kûḍe taḷt ir̤id ekkatuḷadoḷ
okkilikki kâduvalli mahâ-pasâyiṭaṃ Babbara-bâhâ Sêtuvina Ba .. ṇa mâḍida pratâpav entendoḍe ǁ

II.
dhâriṇi vorbba vîra-narapâlakanaṃ .. deyvadantahaṇ |
dâre negaḷteyaṃ kaḍupumaṃ manamaṃ manavâre nôḍe pem- |
Mâriyol â-mahâ-praḷaya-Bhairavanante virôdhi-sainya-saṃ- |
hâraka nimma (sêtu) Sêtuvina Bam .. yan orbbane pûṇdu mâḍidaṃ ǁ
Vîra-nṛipâḷa kêḷ kaligaḷ-aṅkusa ninnaya râya-râütar |
bhbhôrenal e .... mârmaled idirchchida-vîra-virôdhi-sainyamaṃ |
Bhairavanantire .......... endu pûṇdanaṃ |
vîrada sêtu Sêtuvina Bammayanaṃ .. gaḷguṃ jaga-trayaṃ ǁ
antu nija-patige .... pûṇ- |
dante kaṭâradoḷe tividu parivâraṃ .... |
[page 304].. ure suriye pû-maḷay |
intu Sadâsiva-padake Bim .. aṃ sandaṃ ǁ

namô’stu paramâtmanê ǁ Sêtuvina Bomeyage koṭṭa vaḷitavanu heṇḍiru-makkaḷige salisi sukadiṃ
pâpa .. ṭu ǁ tamma Er̤eyamanu bîra-gala nilisi pratipâlisidanu ǁ Śântinâtha ǁ

EC 07 Hl 55
DHARMA ID: INSEC07Hl055

55 On another vîrakal at the same place.


svasti samasta-praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîmanu mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ satya-ratnâkaraṃ śaraṇâgata-vajra-
pañjaran arasaṅka-karagasa birudar-aṅkusaṃ mûrtti-Nârâyaṇaṃ viḷâsa-vallabhaṃ śrî-Billêśvara-
dêvara dibya-śrî-pâda-padmârâdhakanuṃ para-bala-sâdhakarum appa śrîmatu Bîra-Dêvarasaru
sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ prithvî-râjyaṃ geyvuttuṃ Balâḷagondaḷ âsthânavâgi vaḍḍôlagaṃ goṭṭ-
iddalli Paṭṭa-sâhaṇada Gaṅgeya-sâhaṇiy-aḷiya Êchaya koṭṭa bhâsey entene para-baḷaṃ samasta-daḷa-
bhâraṃ sahitam uravaṇisi nûkidalli râjâdhyakshaṃ hiḍidu biḍe kaṭâradiṃ kur̤uhina kuduregaḷaṃ
ar̤ikeya nâyakaraṃ tividu para-baḷamaṃ kaḷakuḷamaṃ mâḍuven endaṃ paṇa-sattigeyaṃ paḍedu
sukhadin irppinaṃ ǁ śrîmanu mahâ-maṇḍaḷêsvaraṃ Dêkarasanuṃ Chêḷaṅgiya Bîreya-Nâyakanuṃ
tamma samasta-daḷa-bhâraṃ berasu Nêmattiya bayaloḷu môharisi nûkidalli ǁ śrîmanu mahâ-pra-
dhânaṃ Medimeya-Nâyakanuṃ Śrîdhara-Dêvanuṃ Koppala samasta-haḍi-parivâra-sahitaṃ môharisi
naḍedu tâgi Javan okkilikkidantir adbhutamâge hêsêḷe koṇḍu bennaṭṭidalli para-baḷadava neleya
môharaṃ saṅkaḷisi kûḍikoṇḍu nûṅkidalli pachanaṃ biṭṭ ikkidâgaḷu ǁ

I.
Bîrarasaṅge koṭṭa hosa-dêsiya bhâseyan ênan emben â- |
vêleya môharaṃ pralaya-vâridhiyante layâgniyantir â- |
Mâriya mûriyantir ar̤eyaṭṭidoḍ Êchaṇan indu vairi-saṃ- |
hâraman î-kaṭâradoḷe mâḍuven endan adante mâḍidaṃ ǁ
palaraṃ kur̤i-dar̤idar̤idaṃ |
palaraṃ sîḷd oṭṭi kaḍidu dese-vali geydaṃ |
palaraṃ bâḷdale viḍidaṃ |
kali chaladi kaṭârad Êchigaṃ raṇa-dhîraṃ ǁ
kur̤uhina kuduregaḷaṃ sand |
ar̤ikeya nâyakaran ir̤idu baḷedaṃ mer̤edaṃ |
ner̤e-gali kaṭârad Êchaṃ |
kar̤ev-alar-vaḷe mêle suriye sarggake sandaṃ ǁ

endu tanna koṭṭa bâseyaṃ pûrayisi Śaka-varshada 1169 Plavaṅga-saṃvatsa[ra]da Vaiśâkha-su 10

svasti samasta-bhuvanâsraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêsvara parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ
Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râjyam uttarôtta-
râbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhmânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi | śrî-
Châḷukya-Vikrama-varshada 28 neya Subhâ .. saṃvatsarada Asâḍa-ba 1 Bṛihavâraṃ vyatîpâta-
dakshiṇâyana-saṅkramâṇa .. svasti yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭâna-japa-
samâdhi-śîla-sampannaru sujana-prasannaru śrî-Nârasiṃha-dêva-labdha-vara-prasâdarum anêka-
tarkka-sâstra-vyâkaraṇa-chchhandôḷaṅkâra-kâvya-nâṭakaṅgaḷolu ... taruṃ samasta-jana-pûjitaruṃ
gôtra-pavitraruṃ châru-châritraruṃ ... chûḍâmaṇigaḷu bândhava-jana-rakshâmaṇigaḷu saraṇâgata-
vajra-pañjar̤aru Naḍegôṇṭe-mallaru châturyya-Chaturânanaruṃ dvija-jana-dâridrâdri .. jraru sukara-
sukavi-pika-nikara ... kâraruṃ bahu .. ḷâdhârarum êkâṅga-vîraru Brahma-vaṃsa-varddhanarum âśrita-
jana-chintâmaṇigaḷu vidagdha-vidvaj-jana-pûjâgragaṇigaḷuṃ darppitârâti-mada-nivâraṇaru chatus-sa-
mudra-paryyanta-yasô-bhâgigaḷum enippa śrîmad-uttamada-Bhattagrâmey-agrahâraṃ Nelavattiya
sâsirvvaruṃ mahâjanamum irddu Kâsyapa-gôtrâdhâraṃ Mâdhava-Saḷaṅgi-Kêsavayyana putra gôtra-
pavitra Biṭṭimayyaṅge kâruṇyaṃ geydu pâda-pûjeyaṃ koṭṭu khaṇḍikada dharmmake Koḍasigeyalu 16
kamma tôṇṭamaṃ sarvva-bâdhâ-parihâraṃ mâḍi naḍeyisuvar (usual final phrases and verses).

71 At Surahonne (same hobli), on a stone in the back-yard of Śiva-Liṅgappa, son of Śidda-Basappa.


I.
namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ

svasti śrî bhuvanâsrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara pûrvva-
paśchima-dakshiṇa-samudrâdhipati ari-râya-vibhâḍa ashṭa-dikku-râya-manô-bhayaṅkara śrî-vîra-
Harihara-mahârâyaru Hastinâvatiya duggada Vijayânagariya nelavîḍinoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ
râjyaṃ geyyuttam irdalli tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi śrîman-mahâ-pradhâna Turaka-daḷa-vibhâḍa sapta-
[page 306]Koṅkaṇa-dhûḷî-paṭṭa Kadamba-sûr̤ekâr̤a Kadamba-pura-jana-pratipâlana Gôvâ-pura-varâdhiśvara srî-
Vîra-Vasanta-Mâdhava-Râyara kumâra śrîman-mahâ-mantrîśvaraṃ Raṅgiṇi-pratâpa Giridurgga-malla
Koṅkaṇa-pratishṭhâchâryya Âtrêya-gôtra-kulôdbhavan aha Bâchaṇṇa-Râyaru Gôvâ-pura-varâdhîśvara
Kadamba-Râja-siṃhâsanâdhishṭitan âgi sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdaḍiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam irdalli Chandra-
gutti-Banavase-Koṅkaṇa-Raṅgiṇi-modalâda-samasta-râjyavanû pratipâlisuttaṃ viddalli tat-pâda-
padmôpajîvi Kauśika-Viśvâmitra-gôtrada Nandâûrada suṅkada Bollarasara maga Anantappagaḷu
Pâṇḍya-nâḍa oḷagaṇa Hoḷaguṇḍiya-purada Bâḷinâtha-dêvara amruta-paḍige â-Bâḷinâtha-dêvara
adhishṭâyakaru râya-râja-guru Khaṇḍeya-Râya Khaḷêśvara-dêva-ayyanavara pâda-prakshâlyavaṃ
mâḍi hiraṇya-udaka-sahavâgi dhârâ-pûrvvakavâgi koṭṭa dhamma-sâsanada kramav ent endare svasti
śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śaka-varuśa sâvirada-mûnûr̤a-hadiṇenṭu sandu varttamâna hattombhattaneya
Dhâtu-saṃvatsarada Âśâḍa-su 15 Budhavârada sôma-grahaṇada puṇya-kâladalu â-Bâḷinâtha-dêvara
amruta-paḍige namma suṅkake saluva Guttiya vênṭheyake saluva Baḷiya-nâḍa oḷagaṇa-Nêmattiya-
grâmada kâluvaḷi Surahonneya-puradalu namma suṅkake saluva grâma gadyâṇa pañchagâruka
magga-der̤e-mudre-dhanam âṛu maduve-der̤e gâṇa-der̤e huḍike-der̤e kulume-der̤e sâvantike muntâda
yênuḷḷa-suṅkavanu â-Bâḷinâtha-dêvara amruta-paḍi-nandâ-dîvigege namma strî-putra-jñâti-sâvanta-
dâyâdyar-anumata-purassaravâgi dhârâ-pûrvvakavâgi koṭṭa-dharmma-sâśana (usual final phrases).

su-ruchira-Padmagarbbha Siri-vallabha maṅgaḷa-nâmadhêya sad- |

vara-sura-nâtha-vandita-pada-dvaya pâvana-mûrtti Mandarâ- |
dhara vara-Nârasihya pore Bollarasâtma-Anantarâjanâ ǁ

n î(rî) kshisi rakshisida puṇya-purushargg akkuṃ |

EC 07 Hl 83
DHARMA ID: INSEC07Hl083

[page 308]83 At Vaḍêrahattûru (same hobli), on a copper plate belonging to Mudi-Mallappa, son of Guru-Basayya.


I.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varsha 1555 neya Âṅgîrasa-saṃvatsarada Chaitra-śu 1 llû
śrîmatu Yikkêri-hosa-pêṭheya vaḷagaṇa Mailâra-dêvara dêvatâ-vechchake Eḍava-Murâri Kôṭe-kôḷâ-
haḷa viśuddha-Vaidikâdvaita-siddhânta-pratishṭhâpaka Śiva-guru-bhakti-parâyaṇarâda Keḷadî-Veṅ-
kaṭappa-Nâyaka-pautrarâda Bhadrappa-Nâyakara putrarâda Vîrabhadra-Nâyakarû koṭṭa dharma-
śâsanada kramav entendare Yalagaḷale-sîme-vaḷagaṇa Yalagaḷale-grâmadalli (here follow details).
ga 12 hanneraḍu-varahana bhûmiyanu Śivârpitavâgi koṭṭevâgi â-bhûmige saluva sarva-svâmya-
vanu prâku-mariyâdeyalli âgumâḍikoṇḍu dêvatâ-vechake kâlam-pratiyalû naḍadu-bâha-bage koṭṭa
dharma-śâsana

II.
âditya-chandrâv anaḷo’niḷaś cha &c. ǁ

śrî-Veṅkaṭâdri.

EC 07 Hl 84
DHARMA ID: INSEC07Hl084

84 At Îsarâpura (same hobli), on a stone in Mallappa’s field.


I.
svasti svâgatam artthinaḥ kratu .................. dhîyatâṃ
............. vikrama . trayi-padaṃ dattaṃ jalaṃ pâtyatâṃ |
mâ dêhîty Uśanâ ..... Harir ayaṃ pâtraṃ ka .. sthâpakaṃ
yity êvaṃ Balinârchchitô makha-mukhê pâyât sa vô Vâmanaḥ ǁ

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvaraṃ
pûrvva-paśchima-dakshiṇa-samudrâdhipati ari-râya-vibhâḍaṃ ashṭa .... manô-bhayaṅkara bhâshege-
tappuva-râyara-gaṇḍa śrî-vîra-Harihara-Râyaru Hastinâvatiya durggada Vijayânagariya paṭṭaṇada
nelevîḍinoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyiuttam iddalli ǁ â-Harihara-Râyana kumâranû
śrîman-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvara Chikka-Râya-Voḍeyaru Âragadalli mûvattâr̤u-kampaṇavanû Male-râjyada
paṭṭaṇa-Âragadalli Chikka-Râya-Voḍeyaruṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjya-mâḍuva kâladalli tat-
pâda-padmôpajîvi | śrîman-mahâ-pradhânam | ari-râya-bhayaṅkaram | mûvara-râyara-gaṇḍa | Tu-
ruka-daḷa-vibhâḍa vairi-râya-mastaka-sûla | ...... bandî-vimôchana dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-prati-
pâlaka | dêva-Brâhmaṇa-jîrṇṇa-dharmmôddhâraka śaraṇâgata-vajra-pañjara śrî-Vîra-Vasanta-Mâdha-
va-Râyanu Âraga-Gutti-mûvattâr̤u-kampaṇavanû Âragada-paṭṭaṇadalli sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ
râjyaṃ mâḍuva kâladalli tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi Roddada gôva ..... | subhaṇṭar-âhava para-nârî-
sahôdara kha ........ sahasra ...... dara bhîtaraṃ kolla .......... ayivatt-âr̤u maṇḍaḷikara ....
gada Basavappagaḷa maga ........ gaḷa tamma Bairappa-Nâyakara tamma ...... ppa-Nâyaṅ-
kara maga Basavappa-Nâya ........ ǁ svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varshaṅgaḷu sâvi-
rada-mûnûr̤a-ondane Śiddhârtthi-saṃvatsara-Bhâdrapada-bahuḷa-saṭṭi-Maṅgaḷavâra | svasti śrîma-
tu vêda-mârgga-pratishṭâchâryya abha ........ râda Nârâyaṇa śaraṇâgata-vajra-pañjara dushta-
nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâlaka shaḍu-darśana-sthâpanâchâryya gaṇa-vîrôdaya sabannâ-vidyâ-viḷâsa-parâ
...... rappâ śrîman-mahâ .... prativâdi-bhayaṅkara parama-Vaishṇava-pârijâta-Mâyâvâdi-kôḷâhaḷa
mantravâdi-bhayaṅkara-praḷayânaḷa dêva-Brâhmaṇa-virôdhi-dûshaka-sirach-chhêda (stops here).

87 At Mâvanakôṭe (same hobli), on the stone-slab over the doorway of the Lakshmi-Narasimha temple in Gâṇigara Râmaṇṇa’s field.


svasti śrîmatu śrî-Vishṇuvarddhana-Yâdava-kuḷâmbaravaṃ sale Vijaya-Narasiṃha-Dêvana râjyadalli
śrî-Lakshmî-Narasimhâya namaḥ ǁ svasti śrîmatu Pâṇḍya-nâḍ-oḷagaṇa śrîmad-anâdy-agrahâraṃ
Koḷḷinaghaṭṭad aśêśa-mahâjanaṅgaḷa sanumatadindaṃ Lakshmi-Narasiṃha-dêvara pradiṭṭeyaṃ
mâḍa ... du â-Koḷḷiganagaṭṭada Hebbâruva Dêśiya-daṇḍanâyakan appa Dêvappaṅgaḷu â-Koḷḷiganagaṭṭa-
da haḷi Mâvanakôṭeya holake Tuṅgabadra-yettaradali bandu .. talu bâmiya asêsa-mahâjanaṅgaḷa
kayali dhâra-pûrbbakaṃ mâḍisikoṇḍu Subânu-samvacharada Chaitra-mâsada sudda-dasamî-Sôma-
vâra-Pusya-nakshatra ..... la .. nadali â-Lakumî-Narasiṅga-dêvara pradiṭeyaṃ mâḍidaru â-
devarigaṃ nitya-naimittôtsava-pûjâ-vidhânakaṃ biḍa ...... koṭṭa maṅgaḷa mahâ agrahârada
uṇṭâda bômiyalli gade bedale .. âgi ondu matalu bômiyaṃ mataṃ Kusugura ker̤eya teṅkaṇa
kôḍiya bômiyali ondu matalu bumiyaṃ mataṃ Lakumi-Nârasiṅga-dêvara-purada ker̤eya mûḍaṇa
.. ya Sâśavihaḷi holada .... kalu .... kalu gaḍi mûḍalu ... vaṇanaker̤e-oḷage gaḍiyâgi muvata ..
kamba keyaṃ .... matalu eraḍu muvata .. kamba bômiyaṃ sarvvana[ma]syavâgi asêsa-mâjanagaḷu
Lakumî-Narasiṃha-dêvara śrî-hatadali dhâra-pû[rva]ka .......... ǁ .. śrîmaṃ Hebaruva-Dêvan
.. nu Hoisaṇa-vîra-Vijaya-Narasiṅga ....... dêsi-nakarada samakaṃ .. svaraṃ samakaṃ balala ...
munûrbbara samakaṃ .......... modalâgi hadineṇṭu same[ya]davarigaṃ kaladeyâgi koṭaru ishṭa-
kaṃ paripâlisadavaru hadineṇṭu-samayakaṃ drôhi (v)î-saśana-mariyâdeya ..........

namas tuṅga &c. ǁ

śrî namaś Śivâya ǁ svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śaka-varusha 1213 neya Vikruta-saṃvatsarada Vayi-
śâkha-suda 1 Bri dandu | svasti śrîmanu-mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Dvârâvatî-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ Male-
râja-râja Malaparoḷu gaṇḍa gaṇḍa-bhêruṇḍa kadana-prachaṇḍa Śanivâra-siddhi Giridurgga-mallan
asahâya-śûra êkâṅga-vîra nissaṅka-pratâpa-chakravartti Hoysaṇa bhuja-baḷa śrî-vîra-Nârasiṃha-

vajra-pañjara Chôḷa-kaṭaka-sûr̤ekâr̤a . gâyi-gôvâḷa .... yaka-gaṇḍa .. Nârâyaṇa Brahmâdhirâjarum
appa Gaṅga-Perumâḷe-Dêvarasaru Pâṇḍya-nâḍ-oḷagaṇa Koḷiganagaṭṭada vittiya vaḷitêśvararâgi
râjyaṃ geyiutt irddalli svasti śrîmad-anâdiy-agrahâraṃ Chôḷamahâdêvipuravâda Koḷiganagaṭṭada śrî-
mad-asêsha-mahâjanaṅgaḷa adhidêvateyappa śrî-Mâdhava-dêvarggevû śrî-Sômanâtha-dêvarigevû
koṭṭa bhûmi Kêsariyaker̤eyalu Dêviger̤eya .... hinde Baḷḷiger̤eya voḷage Gaṅga-Perumâḷe-Dêvaru

namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ

bha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêsvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ .......... chintâmaṇi nissaṅka-pratâpa-

ânt ir̤ivaṃ tave-koṇḍu .............. ggaṇey ene vîra .................. sâyira-Noṇambavâḍi-

vettanûr-oḍeya Nâgana puṇyada puñjam embinaṃ ǁ antu .......... Malli-Dêvanind oḷpu-vetta
mahâ-prabhu Nâgarasa śrî-Nâgêśvara ........ pratishṭheya mâḍisid alliya sthânâchâryyar appa ..
.......... patiya mahime entene ǁ↓2vṛi ǁ Śiva-dharmmôttara-sôma-Śambhuva .......... yôga-pañ-
châksharî-pra ... âgama-kôvidaṃ ............ numata ...... Śaivâgamâchâradoḷ ............
........ embud illa Bairava-yati-tanu ....................... vaḍeya ǁ śrî-Nâgêśvara-dêvar-aṅga-
bhôga-nivêdyakkaṃ nandâ-dîvigegaṃ khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhâra-Chaitra-pavitra .... Saka-varsha
1125 neya Dundhubhi-saṃvatsarada Mâghad-amâvâsye-Sômavâra-vyatîpâta-saṅkramaṇa-sûryya-
grahaṇada divya-tithiyalli Ya .. ya Sôvâchâryyar appa Bairava-yatigaḷa kâla toḷedu dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ
mâḍi biṭṭa bhûmige (here follow details) dêvara nandâ-dîvigege sarvva-bâdhe-parihâravâgi salusuva
gâṇa vondu mummuri-daṇḍaṅgaḷu biṭṭa dâya santeya dâya koḍake aravân-eṇṇe hêr̤iṅge nûr̤a-ele hor̤eya-
.. tu hasubege aḍike 2 bhattake sôḍige bhata (usual final phrases).

Notes
↑1. * This inscription is very much effaced.
↑2. * As it is very much defaced, it has been found impossible to put this into verse.

namas-tuṅga &c. ǁ
II.
.......................... |
jîyât trailôkya-nâthasya śâsanaṃ dharmma-śâsanaṃ ǁ

svasti yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭhâna-pârâyaṇa-japa-samâdhi-sîla-guṇa-
sampannaruṃ sakaḷa-sâstra-pariṇataruṃ chaturvvêda-pâragaruṃ Śiva-dharmma-pratîtaruṃ sakaḷa-
guṇa-sampannar appa śrîmad-anâdiy-agrahâraṃ Kôṭiganapurada Hebbâruva Vor̤e-Gôvilli-Dâsaru

aḷige binnahaṃ geyidu kûḍi .. gauḍugaḷa gaṇḍa Râma-gâvuṇḍanuṃ Chîlûra Gogga-gâvuṇḍanuṃ Bâse-

119 At Neraḷaguṇḍi (same hobli), on a stone in front of the Îśvara temple.


svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâ-
rakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-Traiḷôkyamalla-Dêvaru chatus-samudra-
paryyantaṃ-bara sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyuttam ire | tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi samadhi-
gata-pañcha-mahâ-sabda Pallavânvaya śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ Pallava-kuḷa-tiḷakan êka-vâkhya śrîmat-
Traiḷôkyamalla Nol̤amba-Pallava-Permmânaḍi-Dêvara Dadirvvâl̤ige-sâsiravuṃ Ballakunde-mûnûr̤uṃ
Konaḍiyûr̤umaṃ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadi râjya-geyyuttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi samasta-râjya-
bhara-nirûpita-mahâmâtya-padavî-virâjamâna mânônnata prabhu-mantrôtsâha-sakti-traya-sampanna
Śiva-pâda-sêkhara pati-hita-Garuḍa nâmâdi-samasta-prasasti-sahita (south face) śrîmat-Traiḷô-
kyamalla Noḷamba-Permmâḍi râj[y]aṃ anubavisitam ire Saka-varisa ↓1986 Jaya-saṃvacharada ..
heya Nêr̤iluguṇḍiya-vûr-oḍeya Hiṭṭamayya sujya-grahaṇadalu Mallikârjuna-dêvargge gadde ka 400
beddale ma 4 Maṃ .. likabeyya kâla kachi dhârâ-pûrbbaka mâḍi koṭṭa go .. sasana (usual final phrases and verse) Mallikârjjuna mâḍisida dêgula ..........

EC 07 Ci 13
DHARMA ID: INSEC07Ci013

13 At the same village, on a copper plate belonging to Nâḍiga Guru Rao.


(Front).

I.
namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ
II.
avyâd avyâhataiśvarya-kâraṇô Vâraṇânanaḥ |
varadas tîvra-timira-mihirô Hara-nandanaḥ ǁ
śrîmân âdi-Varâhô’yaṃ śrêyasê bhûyasê’stu saḥ |
gâḍham âliṅgitâ yêna mêdinî môdatê sadâ ǁ
asti Kaustubha-Kalpa-dru-Kâma-dhênu-sahôdaraḥ |
Ramânujas sudhâdhâmâ kshîra-sâgara-sambhavaḥ ǁ
udabhûd anvayê tasya Yadu-nâmâ mahîpatiḥ |
pâlitaṃ yat-kulaṃ yêna Vâsudêvêna bhûtaḷê ǁ
abhût tasya kule śrîmân prabhur guru-guṇôdayaḥ |
apâsta-dôsha-saṃsargas Saṅgamô nâma bhûpatiḥ ǁ
tasya Gaurâmbikâ-nâmâ mahishî samabhûd varâ |
mânanîya-guṇârâmâ vallabhasya manônugâ ǁ
Kapardinô yathâ Gaurî Śachîva Namuchidvishaḥ |
Pitâmahasya Sâvitrî Chhâyâ Dinamaṇêr iva ǁ
vilâsa-vibhramôllâsa-tiṛaskṛita-Tilôttamâ |
Anasûyâpi sâsûyâ yat-pâtivratya-sampadâ ǁ
âsan Hariharaḥ Kampô Bukka-Râyô mahîpatiḥ |
Mârapô Muddapaś chêti kumârâs tasya bhûpatêḥ ǁ
pañchânâṃ samabhût têshâṃ prakhyâtô Bukka-bhûpatiḥ |
prachaṇḍa-vikra[mô] madhyê Pâṇḍavânâṃ yathârjunaḥ ǁ
dik-karîndra-sudhaurêya-dakshi .......... dhuraḥ |
Bukka-Râyas tataḥ śrîmân âsîd âhava-karkaśaḥ ǁ
yat-sêvâsakta-ra .. vidadhati paritaḥ tâṇḍavân maṇḍalêśâ
vaktrê śushkâs Turashkâḥ bahu-bhaya-bharitâḥ Koṅkaṇâḥ śaṅkayâsan |
Andhrâ randhrâṇy avindann Udaya-girivarê Gurjarâ jarjarâṅgâḥ
Kâmbhôjâ bhinna-dhairyâḥ sarabhasam abhavan prâpta-bhaṅgâḥ Kaḷiṅgâḥ ǁ
[page 316]ahîna-bhâgya-sampattiḥ asau râja-śikhâmaṇiḥ |
tasyâgrajas tyâga-śîlô nâmnâ Hariharô nṛipaḥ ǁ
râjâdhirâjas têjasvî yô râja-paramêśvaraḥ |
sarva-sâmanta-bhûpâla-bhujaṅgama-Vihaṅgarâṭ ǁ
râja-râja-bhujaṅgô yaḥ para-râja-bhayaṅkaraḥ |
Hindu-râya-kṛita-trâṇô dushṭa-śârddûla-marddanaḥ ǁ
yad-râjadhânî Vijayâ-nagarî sa-jayôdayâ |
râjñâṃ chakâsti vikhyâta-râjadhânî kṛitâśrayâ ǁ
śishṭâs saṃrakshitâ yêna dushṭa-nigraha-kâriṇâ |
labdhâ cha vidushâṃ prîtiś ślâghyô Hariharô nṛipaḥ ǁ
yat-shôḍaśa-mahâdâna-samayôdita-vâriṇâ |
ramya-buddhêr apârasya varddhitô dharma-pâdapaḥ ǁ
Śâlivâhana-nirṇîta-śaka-varsha-kramâgatê |
rasa-chandrâgni-vidhukê tasmin Bhâvâkhya-vatsarê ǁ
Vaiśâkhê mâsi paurṇamyâṃ divasê grahaṇê vidhôḥ |
saṅgamê Tuṅgabhadrâyâ Haridrâyâś cha pâvanê ǁ
kshêtrê Hariharâkhyê’smin kôṭi-tîrtha-samâkulê |
Guhâraṇyâbhidhê puṇyê sarva-dharma-vivardhanê ǁ
Rudrapâdê mahâ-tîrthê âdyê Hariharâtmakê |
dêvarshi-siddha-gandharva-vidyâdhara-nishêvitê ǁ
yôgi-sandôha-saṅkîrṇê Guhâraṇya-sthaḷê śubhê |
tulâpurusha-mukyâni kṛitvâ dânâni maṇṭapê ǁ
suprasannô mahîpâlô râjâ Hariharêśvaraḥ |
tulitê Hastinâvatyâ Vutsaṅgî-vêṅṭhya-bhûtaḷê ǁ
śrî-Mahâraṅgakê râjyê Madakaryâkhya-śîmani |
Chândramaṇḍala-nâḍau cha ramyê Madakari-sthaḷê ǁ
Śrîvatsa-gôtra-jâtâya Yâjushâya tathaiva cha |
Yindrakaṇṭhyâvalâkhyâya Narasim-bhaṭṭâya dhîmatê ǁ
daivajñâya dadau vṛitti-dvayaṃ Hariharô nṛipaḥ |
tatraikâ jyôtishâṃ vṛittiḥ aparâ lêkhanasya cha ǁ
Vêṅkaṭêśâlayât prâchyâṃ diśi dêvâgratas sthitaṃ |
Bramha-nâmaka-sad-grâmaṃ mahâ-Râmêśvarâlayaṃ ǁ
Haridrâ-tîra-sambhûtaṃ mahâ-puṇya-vivarddhanaṃ |
tasya vâyavya-dig-bhâgê grâmântaram .. sthitaṃ ǁ
Pavaḷakaṭṭîti vikhyâtaṃ dadau Hariharêśvaraḥ |
viprâya tasmai vidushê grâma-dvayam anuttamaṃ ǁ
sarvamânyaṃ chatus-sîmâ-sahitaṃ cha samantataḥ |
nidhi-nikshêpa-pâshâṇa-siddha-sâdhya-jalânvitaṃ ǁ

(Back).

III.
akshiṇy-âgâmi-saṃyuktair ashṭa-bhôgais samanvitaṃ |
vâpî-kûpa-taṭâkâdi-kachchhârâma-samanvitaṃ ǁ
putra-pautrâdibhir bhôgyaṃ kramâd â-chandra-târakaṃ |
dânasya vikrayasyâpi yôgyaṃ vinimayasya cha ǁ
śrîmân Hariharô râjâ mânanîyô manasvinâṃ |
sa-hiraṇya-payô-dhârâ-pûrvakaṃ pradadau mudâ ǁ
Narasim-bhaṭṭâya viprâya sa tu santushṭa-mânasaḥ |
râjñê chaivâśishaṃ chakrê chiraṃ jîvêti sa dvijaḥ ǁ
[page 317]Brahma-nâmnaś chatur-dikshu śilâ-sthâpanam uttamaṃ |
kârayâmâsa râjâsau tathâ Pavaḷakaṭṭekaṃ |
grâmasyâpi chatur-dikshu śilâṃ Vâmana-mudrayâ |
sahitâṃ sthâpayâmâsa râjâ Hariharêśvaraḥ |
vidadhê śâśvataṃ dharmmam êtam â-chandra-târakaṃ ǁ
âditya-chandrâv &c. ǁ (usual final verses).

śrî-Virûpâksha

ârjjuna-dêvara aṅga-bhôgakkaṃ nivêdyakkaṃ alliya tapôdhanara grâsakkam endu binnapaṃ geyyalu

EC 07 Ci 19
DHARMA ID: INSEC07Ci019

19 At Siddharamaṭha (same hobli), on a broken stone south-east of the Râmêśvara temple.


śrî
I.
namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śri-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvara parama-bha ......
raṇaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva .... mânam âchandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire ........
.................... nikara-kôrakita .... sîla ânartti ........ Kuniṅgilu-kôṭeya pokka viḍe ....
kîrtti-vallî-pa ............ (usual final verses).

vṛitta ǁ
II.
................................ bhum- |
bhukan akkuṃ viparîtadoḷ naḍedavaṃ Gaṅgâ-Gayâ-Vâraṇâ- |
si-Kurukshêtra ............ taṅgaḷaṃ konda pâ- |
takan akkuṃ biḍad irkkumm â-purushan .... -duva sthânamaṃ ǁ

↓1kanda ǁ ....... kuḷa mukhyam ene param anya .... ka-sthânaṃ divya-sthânam illig ............
sthanyabdake tapôdhana-sthânâ ..... ǁ

maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî

Notes
↑1. * As it is very much defaced, it has been found impossible to put this into verse.
EC 07 Ci 20
DHARMA ID: INSEC07Ci020

I.
namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ

svasti śrî vijayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varushaṅgaḷu ↓11637 neya Śukla-nâma-saṃvatsarada Vai-
śâkha-śudha 12 ........ śrîman-mahâ-âchâryya ........ ? Kariyappa-Nâyakara pautrarâda
Medakerr̤e-Nâyaka ... putrarâda Bommaṇṇa-Nâyakaru Âpastamba-sûtrada Bhâradvâja-gôtrada |
Âruvêli-Hari-bhaṭṭara pautrarâda Veṅgam-bhaṭṭara putrarâda Śi .... ma-bhaṭṭarige barasi koṭṭa
yêka-bhôgyad agrahârada dâna-śâsanada patra-kramav ent endare ǁ namma hiriyarugaḷige sukṛitav
âgabêk endu | nâvu âḷuvanthâ râjya Sante-Bennûra śîmey-oḷagaṇa Dêmachayvana-durggav emba
grâmavannu yî-mahâ-Vaisâkha-śuddha-paurnnamî-puṇyakâladalu Śivârppitavâgi sahiraṇyôdaka-
dâna-dhârâ-pûrvakavâgi koṭṭu yidhêve | yidakke saluva kâḍârambha-nirârambha-nidhi-nikshêpa-jala-
pâshâṇa-akshîṇa-âgâmi- ... sâdhyaṅgaḷ emba ashṭa-bhôga-têjôpârjjaneyannu anubhavisikoṇḍu namag
âśîrvâda mâḍikoṇḍu nimma putra-pâramparyya â-chandrârkka-sthâyigaḷâgi sukhadalli yirabêk endu
barasi koṭṭa dâna-patra (usual final verses) ......................

EC 07 Ci 21
DHARMA ID: INSEC07Ci021

21 At Hire-Kôgiluru (same hobli), on a stone in the back-yard of Patel Vîrabhadraya’s house.


I.
namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ
II.
svasti srî-Sôma-vaṃśâd udayati nṛipatir jJaitugis tat-sutô’bhût
.... Bhillamâkhyas tadanu vijayatê Siṃhaṇaś chakravarttî |
tasmât Sâraṅgapâṇis prati-nṛipati-bala-brâta-vidrâvakô’yaṃ
vîra-śrî-Mahadêva-Râya-nṛipatis trailôkyam âkrâmati ǁ
svasti śrî-Nimbi-Râjât samudayati sutas Chaṭṭa-Râjas tadîyô
bhrâtâ bhâsvat-pratâpaḥ praguṇa-guṇa-gaṇâḷaṅkṛitaḥ Kûcha-Râjaḥ |
Brahma-Kshatra . nîti-śânti-nipuṇau gôtrânvitau Kauśikâv
êtau śrî-Mahadêva-Râya-sachivau bhûmau chiraṃ jîbyatâṃ ǁ
indur bandhubhir aṅganâbhir aparaḥ Kâmô’yam urvvîtaḷê
jâtaḥ kalpa-tarur vvanîpaka-janais têjôbhir apy arjyamâ |
gôtra-brâta-manôratha-prada-mahî-sañchâri-chintâmaṇis
sô’yaṃ Chaṭṭa-tanûbhavô vijayatê Châvuṇḍa-daṇḍâdhipaḥ ǁ
paṇḍitaiḥ parisaṃstutyaḥ khaṇḍitârâti-maṇḍalaḥ |
Châvuṇḍaś chaṇḍa-dôrddaṇḍô jîyâd â-chandra-târakaṃ ǁ
yêshâm adhvara-hôma-dhûma-nivahair nnîlâlam êtan nabhô
yêshâṃ kîrtti-bharâ .... bhramupa .. śôbhâvilaṃ dig-gajâḥ |
yêshâṃ vêda-ravais samasta-girayô’bhûvan paraṃ vâgminas
têshâṃ Dakshiṇa-Bhâskarâhvaya-purîṃ vandê sad-ânandinîṃ ǁ
vidyâ-vinaya-saujanya-tyâga-sâhitya-sôdarî |
Dakshiṇâditya-nagarî-kîrttiḥ kair iha varṇyatê ǁ
↓1nânâ-bhûta-bhayankarâṭavi-mahâ-Bhêtâḷa-Kâpâḷakî
kaṅkâḷôjvalad-ugra-kâḷa-viḷasad-bhîtâkuḷâ bhûtaḷê |
paḍe mât êṃ gaḍiy-aṅka-Bhîma .. gedar kâḍ-âne mallaṃ gaḍaṃ |
[..............] ... bala-balumeg ad âr âmpar î-gaṇḍaroḷ ǁ

mattam â-mêdinî-maṇḍaḷadoḷ Indrôpabhôga-bhâjanaruṃ | Śaṅkara-sama-têjaruṃ | para-samaya-
kula-Vindhyâṭavî-dâvânaḷaruṃ | uddaṇḍa-maṇḍalika-daṇḍa-khaṅkaruṃ | chaṇḍa-prachaṇḍa-maṇḍita-
bhujâ-daṇḍa-kôdaṇḍa-khaṇḍitârâti-maṇḍaḷaruṃ | nânâ-samaya samuddharaṇaruṃ | śaraṇâgata-vajra-
[page 319]pañjararuṃ | pratibhaṭa-samaya-samûha-vichchhêdakaruṃ | kanaka-daṇḍâgra-virâja(ta)mânairâvata-
kâka-dhvajaruṃ | samaya-samûha-dharmma-chakra-varttakaruṃ | nânâ-samayâbhimâna-samsthâpa-
karuṃ | âkhaṇḍa-prachaṇḍa-mahâ-Bhairava-pâdâravinda-dvandva-samârâdhakaruṃ | śrî-Bilêśvara-
dêvara dibya-śrî-pâda-padmôpajîvigaḷum appa aḍavi-Kandarppara parâkramaṃ pêḷvaḍe ǁ

III.
Malaparoḷu gaṇḍar enipar |
chhaligaḷu śaraṇ endu banda bhîtara kâvar |
kuladalu Kauśikar embaru |
kaligaḷu kâḍâne-mallar agaṇita-charitar ǁ

svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda Dvârâvatî-pura-varâdhîśvara suvarṇṇa-Garuḍa-dhvaja Yâdava-
kuḷa-kamaḷikâ-vikâsa-bhâskara ari-râya-jagajhampa Mâḷava-Râya-Madana-Triṇêtra Gûrjjara-Râya-
bhayaṅkara Teluṅga-Râya-siraḥ-kamaḷa-nâḷônmûḷana ity-âdi-nâmâvaḷî-guṇa-gaṇâlaṅkrita śrî-Maha-
dêva-Râya-vijaya-râjyôdaya tatu-pâda-padmôpajîvinau parôpakâra-ni[ra]tau śaraṇâgata-vajra-pañjarau
kîrtti-kântâ-manôharau jagad-vaḷa-pêśaḷa-Hanûmanta-dhvajau śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ Chaṭṭarasa-
Kûcharasaru Noṇambavâḍi-mûvattirchhâsirada Arvvattâr̤u-bâḍadoḷagaṇa Bêtûra nija-râjadhâniyoḷu
sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyvutt irdda samayadalu śrîmad-anâdi-mahâgrahâra Dakshiṇâ-
ditya-voḷalâda Kôgilûra śrî-Billêśvara-dêvara dhûpa-dîpa-naivêdya-mukhya-samasta-śrî-kâryyakôsuga-
ra Śaka-varsha 1190 neya Vibhava-saṃvatsarada Kârttika-ba 30 maṃ sûjya-grahaṇadalu â-sthâ-
nika-Daṇḍapâṇi-gurugaḷa kâlaṃ toḷadu â-Chaṭṭarasara paṭṭada-hiriya-kumâ[ra]-Châvuṇḍarasaru dhârâ-
pûrvvakamâgi sarvva-namasyavâgi Matikaṭṭada kôḍiyiṃ paḍuvalu maṇala-keyi Tiguḷa ghaḷeyalu ma-
ttaru 2 Âpinakaṭṭeyoḷage gadde â-ghaḷeyalu kamma 100 int inituma chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ salu-
vantâgi â-grâmad ar̤avatta-nâlvaru mukhya yêṭu .. ṭṭu sthâna-mânyaṅgaḷa samakshadalu koṭṭaru ǁ
nâḍoḷage biluvaḍike yênu bandoḍaṃ Kôgilûra Haḷivuḷûra hadikeya Billêśvara-dêvara dhûpa-dîpake â-
staḷada Mâka-bôva-Kâḷa-bôvaṅgaḷa mamma Baicha-bôvanu tammaya Kâva-bôvanû naḍasi koḍuvarû

Notes
↑1. † These verses are incomplete in the original.

22 At the same village, on a stone to the south of the entrance of the Kallêśvara temple.


śrî-Gaṇapatayê namaḥ ǁ

I.
namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ
II.
daṃshṭrâgrêṇôddhṛita bhûmiḥ .. saptârṇṇavâtmikâ |
jhallarîva Varâhasya ...... mbu-pallavâ ǁ
svasti śrî-Sôma-vaṃśâd udayati nṛipatir Jaitugis tat-sutô’bhût
.... Bhillamâkhyas tadanu vijayatê Simhaṇas chakravarttî |
tasmât Sâraṅgapâṇiḥ prati-nṛipati-bala-brâta-vidrâvakô’yaṃ
vîra-śrî-Mahadêva-Râya-nṛipatis trailôkyam âkrâmati ǁ
svasti śrî-Nimbi-Râjât samudayati sutaś Chaṭṭa-Râyas tadîyô
bhrâtâ bhâsvat-pratâpa-praguṇa-guṇa-gaṇâḷaṅkṛitaḥ Kûchi-Râjaḥ |
Brahma-Kshatra-sva-nîti-śânti-nipuṇau gôtrânvitau Kauśikâv
êtau śrî-Mahadêva-Râya-sachivau bhumau chiraṃ jîvyatâ .. ǁ
indur bandhubhir aṅganâbhir aparaḥ Kâmô’yam urbbîtaḷê
jâtaḥ kalpa-tarur vvanîpaka-janais têjôbhir apy arjyamâ |
gôtra-brâta-manôratha-prada-mahî-sañchâri-chintâmaṇiḥ
sô’yaṃ Chaṭṭa-tanûbhavô vijayatê Châvuṇḍa-daṇḍâdhipaḥ ǁ
paṇḍitaiḥ parisaṃstutyaḥ khaṇḍitârâti-maṇḍaḷaḥ |
Châvuṇḍaś chaṇḍa-dôrddaṇḍô jîyad â-chandra-târakaṃ ǁ
vidyâ-vinaya-saujnya-tyâga-sâhitya-sôdarî |
Dakshiṇâditya-nagarî-kîrttiḥ kair iha varṇyatê ǁ

[page 320]svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda Dvârâvatî-pura-varâdhîśvara suvarṇṇa-Garuḍa-dhvaja Yâdava-
kuḷa-kamaḷa-↓1kâvikâ-vikâsa-bhâskara ari-râya-jagajhampa Mâḷava-Râya-Madana-Triṇêtra Gûrjjara-
Râya-bhayaṅkara Telu[ṅga]-Râya-siraḥ-kamaḷa-nâḷônmûḷana ity-âdi-nâmâvaḷî-gaṇâlaṅkṛita-śrî-Maha-
dêva-Râya-vijaya-râjyôdayê tat-pâda-padmôpajîvinau parôpakâra-niratau śaraṇâgata-vajra-pañjarau
kîrtti-kântâ-manôharau jagad-daḷa- .................. śrîman-mahâpradhâna-Chaṭṭarasa-Kûchara-
saru ............ sirada ↓2mûvattar̤u-bâḍad oḷagaṇa ..... nija-râjadhâniyoḷu sukha-saṅkatâ-vinôda-
diṃ râjyaṃ geyyut ire ...... lu śrîmad-anâdiy-agrahâra Dakshiṇâditya .......... śrî-Svayambhu-
Kali ... vargge dhûpa-dîpa-naivêdya ............ kâryyagôsugara Śaka-varsha 1190 neya Vibhava-
saṃvatsarada Kârttika-ba 30 ... sûrjya-grahaṇadalu â-sthânika-Sômarâsi-Âcharâsigaḷa kâlaṃ toḷadu
â-Chaṭṭarasara paṭṭada hiriya-kumâra Chavuḍarasaru dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi sarvva-namasyavâgi
pûrvva-sthânavan â-sarvva-svâmya-sahita chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluvantâgi â ...... saluvudu
mukhya ...... sthâna-mânyagalu .......... kshadalu koṭṭaru (usual final verse).

Notes

vijaya-râjyôdayada 14 lkaneya Chitrabhânu-saṃvatsarada Bhâdrapada-ba 10 Âdivâradalli Chavuṇḍ-
arasara mayiduna Gôparasanu Nâgavi-Kaḷasâpurad eḍeyali kâdi Śiva-lôka-prâptan âdanu śrî-Achaḷa-
nâtha saraṇu śrî-Vîrabhadra saraṇu

svasti śrîmatu Yâdavarâya-Nârâyaṇaṃ bhuja-baḷa-prauḍha-pratâpa-chakravartti śrî-vîra-Râma-Dêva-
vijaya-râjyôdayê 12 neya Pramâthi-saṃvatsarada Mâgha-ba 30 Gu śrîman-mahâ-pradhânaṃ râya-daṇ-
ḍanâtha pêsaṇi-Hanuma śrî-vîra-Chavuṇḍarasaru Kur̤ugôḍa-nâḍa Doravadege Mummaḍi-Siṅgeya-
Nâyakana mêle naḍadu kâdi halav-âḷu-kudureyaṃ kondu Śiva-lôka-prâptan âdan ad ent endaḍe ǁ

I.
bhûtaḷadalliya bhôgaṃ |
tîrddudu yîtaṅge marttyadall irabâradu |
bêgaṃ tannire end Acha- |
ḷêśvaran and oppugoṇḍa Châvuṇḍanumaṃ ǁ
yîtaṅge takkud allind |
âruṃ enabêḍa munna likhitâksharamaṃ |
bared iṭṭad aśakyaṃ maru- |
.... ṭṭa Vidhâtra kêḷi mânavar ellaṃ ǁ
mar̤adirdan andu marttyada |
baḷakeya ner̤ey ar̤idan alli môksha-lakshmiyaṃ |
sadu-guru-Lakshmînâthaṃ |
yidirgoṇḍaṃ Chaṭṭan-aṇuga-Châmuṇḍanumaṃ ǁ
kaṭṭisid uppara-muḍiyaṃ |
ettisidaṃ Abhavan-olda-Nandiya sindaṃ |
hô üghe ughe end enutaṃ |

28 At Nîtager̤e (same hobli), on the inner wall of the Vîrabhadra temple.


śrî-guruvê saraṇu | śrî

I.
puṭṭutal âdi-Rudranaṃ satya-samudranaṃ Vîrabhadran â- |
.. shṭigaḷinda . valageyinda ... ṭar endu ...... |
goṭṭisi tôḷamaṃ gaḍiüta ... yenut ârddaḍeye ...... |
biṭṭaḍe mû-jagaṃ bedar̤e hêḷe .. b ârddaḍe summan irdda .. ǁ
anatara tôḷgaḷaṃ kaḍidu pûsa ... dôrade ka .. râya Da- |
kshana tale goṇḍan â-tale .. ge mu .. tivaḷk .. degoṭṭu Dêvarâ- |
jana pati-śastramaṃ seḷedu kṛishṇamṛigâjinav etti siddha-Ru- |
drana suta Vîrabhadran era ... mâḍidan eyde yôgamaṃ ǁ
dhura-dhîraṃ raüdrâvatâraṃ durita-kula-nivâraṃ pratâpaika-śûraṃ |
Hara-putraṃ .... putraṃ sura-nara-vara .. pâtraṃ puṇyaṃ pavitraṃ |
ta .. dakshaṃ Daksha-sikshaṃ tri-bhuvana-jana-rakshaṃ Śivâchâra-dakshaṃ |
.. ra-raudraṃ tânu Rudraṃ karuṇa-rasa-samudraṃ mahâ-Vîrabhadraṃ ǁ

.... ra-râya-râya .. kaṇṭaka-râya-taḷa-prahâri ari-râya-vibhâḍa para .. gaja-mastaka-śûla Virâṭa-
Râya-nirdhûmakan emba râyara raṇa-Bhai .... ra-vihâra ari-râya .................. râya ........
ra Hariharêśvaraṃ ǁ svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Saka-varsha ... 25 ....... varttamâna Târa ........
Nîtager̤eya śrî-Vîrabhadra-dêvara pratishṭe âyitu | svasti śrîman-mahârâjâdhirâja râja-paramêśvara
parama-bhaṭṭâraka Dvârâvatî-pura-varâdhîśvara śrî-vîra-Bukka-Râya .... svasti śrîman-mahârâjâdhi-
râja râja-paramêśvara parama-bhaṭṭâraka Dvârâvatî-pura-varâdhîśvara Vijayânagariya Hastinâvatiya
pratâpa-Harihara-Râyaru sukha-râjyaṃ geyyuttam iralu ǁ â-pratâpa-Harihara-Râyana hinde yi ....
.... varamaṃ ... ra chandrâyudha-śaṅkha-chakra-gajâ .... Tumbaḷa-gâva Basa ........ raṃ dâna
maṇḍaḷikara gaṇḍa Dummiya Yar̤e-Gaṅgeya-Nâyakaru â-Gaṅgeya-Nâykara maga Sîraṅganâtha-Nâya-
karu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam iralu â-Nîtager̤eya ...... śrî-Vîrabhadra-dêva-
rige amṛita-paḍi gadde bedda ...... vûrige âguêya-dikkinalu yer̤eya-bhûmi nandâdîvigge koṭṭaru ..
... śrî-Vîrabhadra-dêvarige Dummiya Er̤a-Pemmaya-Nâya ........ Nâykaru tannaya Gaṅgûrali
koṭṭa vṛitti ûrige nayirutya-dikkina .... paḍuva ha ... Nîtager̤eya Vîrabhadra-dêvarige Koḍenâḍa
Râma-gauṇḍan-oḷagâda samasta-gauṇḍu-prajegaḷu koṭṭa nandâdîvige ûrige nayirutya-dikkinali Nîta-
ger̤eya sîme-vottininda dâriya paḍuva gadde maṇṇuvin ikkuḷa ǁ (here follows a number of other grants [page 322]and usual final phrases) maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî .... gauṇḍana makkaḷu Kala-gauṇḍa (others named)
dêvâlyava mâḍisidavaru ǁ .. dêvara dêvâlyava mâḍisi .... nahaḷḷiya .... na maga Mallôjanu

EC 07 Ci 32
DHARMA ID: INSEC07Ci032

32 At Kaggattûr (same hobli), on the pillar in front of the Vîrabhadra temple.


(North side—45 lines are effaced) yamaṃ biṭaru ǁ â-sthaḷada asaṅkhyâtaru Vîra-Sômanâtha-dêva[ra]
aṅga-bhôga-raṅga Śivârchaneyali Vuda .. ger̤e majjanak ir̤asikoṇḍalli haṇa .. daṃ koṭṭaru ǁ mattaṃ
.... ya-sâhaṇi ...... hana Ballayya Ammayya Râjayya Kêśava-sâhaṇiya Siriyaṇṇa Râṇayya Bam-
meya-sâhaṇiya aḷiya Kêśiyaṇa-Gondayya Perumâḷe Kêchaiya-sâhaṇiya Mârayya-mukhyavâda samasta-
sâhaṇi-yekkaṭigaru śrî-Vîra-Sômanâtha-dêvargge biṭṭa datti ǁ Arppaḍeya Basuriya-koḷana modalêriya-
lu biṭṭadu Gaṅgana gaḷeyalu kamba ippattaṃ dhârâ-pürbbakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭaru ǁ mattaṃ sâr̤i baḍiva
Râṇayyanu tanna ker̤eya keḷage Gaṅgana kamba hattaṃ dhârâ-pûrbbakaṃ mâḍi koṭṭanu ǁ

(east side—60 lines are effaced) li Huliger̤eya Sômanâtha-dêvara kshêtra sanyâsi-Honna- .. kaḷa pra-
sanna-Sômanâtha-dêvara ........ yara kalasadinde .... dêvara Honnayya ....... Râmayya .... mûla
pari .. yambhu-dêvara Saṅkayya .... na makkaḷu ga .. liṅgina ...................... gaḷu śrî-
Vîra-Sômanâtha-dêvara pratishṭheyaṃ mâḍidalli â-sthaḷada manneya Sâvira-nâḍa manneya Siṅga-
Cheṭṭarasa śrîman-nâḷ-prabhu Bîrê-Gauḍa (others named) int ivar-oḷagâda Biḷichey-eppattara-
prabhu-gavuḍagaḷuṃ ........ (west side—70 lines are effaced) kavâḍam â-parivârav appa ........
ttu-kottaḷi Kâḷikâ-dêviya .......... putrar appa ippatta-nâlvaralli mukhyar appa Ammi-Seṭṭi Bhâṇi-
Seṭṭiyara priya-putrar appa Chiñchayya .. Râchayyaṅgaḷu mâḍisida śrî-Vîra-Sômanâtha-dêvara tri-
küṭa-dêvâlyaṃ Herûra nâgaraṃ ... ya śrî-pâda-padmârâdhaka Râchayya (others named) Dâsara Gaṅga
ma .. da kelasada śas travan otteyiṭṭu hôdaḍe â-sthaḷadalu irabêk endu tamma hesaran ikkiy
endaḍe Chiñchayyanu koṭṭu nambugoḷe hesaran iki śastravaṃ hosidanu ǁ Chiñchayya-Dôchayyagaḷa-
tande Sômayya tâyi Mâravve ârâdhyaru Saṅgayya ârâdhyara madavaḷige Boppavve

(south face—effaced).

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabha mahârâjâdhirâja paramêśvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭâ-

rôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saḷuttam ire | tatu-pâda-padmôpa-
jîvi samadhi . ta-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ .... sâsirada ........ chûḍâmaṇi nija-
kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ parichchhêdi-gaṇḍaṃ .. jiga-Chôḷa-manô-bhaṅga śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-

38 At Astâpura (same hobli), on a stone in the kaṭṭêhola west of the village.


I.
namas-tuṅga-&c. ǁ

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pritivî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ parama-
bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîma[j]-Jagadêkamalla-Dêvara vijaya-râ-
jyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-pravarddhamânam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ-baraṃ saluttam ire tat-pâda-
padmôpajîvi ǁ svasti samadhigata-pañcha-mahâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Kâñchî-pura-varâdhî-
śvaraṃ Noḷambavâḍi-mûvattirchchâsiramaṃ tri-bhôgâbhyantaraṃ dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâḷa-
nadiṃ pâḷisuttu râjadhâni-Uchchaṅgiya nelevîḍinalu sukha-saṅkatâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyuttam ire
tat-pâda-padumôpajîvi |

II.
madavad-ari-nṛiparan âjiyoḷ |
adirade beṅkoṇḍu dhareyan unnata-śauryyaṃ |
paduḷisi pâḷisi kîrttiyan |
odavisidaṃ guṇa-vibhâsi manneya-Sôma ǁ

â-mahâ-sâmanta-Sôvi-Dêvagaṃ Sôvala-Dêvigaṃ udiyisidaṃ Eḍavari-Dêva ǁ

III.
âtaṃ samasta-guṇa-vi- |
khyâtaṃ bhûtaḷadoḷ eseye dharmmagaḷan uditô- |
ditadindaṃ pratipâḷisal |
udayisidaṃ Sôma-Dêvan-aṇugina-putra ǁ
dhareyuṃ vârddhigaḷuṃ kuḷâdri-kuḷamuṃ dig-dantiyuṃ chandra-sû- |
ryyarum uḷḷannegam eyde nilke daśeyuṃ sad-dharmmamuṃ kîrttiyuṃ |
[...................................] sâṃrâjyamaṃ satyamaṃ |
parid ond unnatiyaṃ Śivaṃ dayeyin â-kal̤pântara-sthâyuva ǁ
nuḍida nuḍi Râma-bâṇaṃ |
toḍar̤d-eḍeyoḷu Bhîman ârttu kuḍuvaḍe Karṇṇaṃ |
paḍiy enisi negal̤da namm î- |
Eḍavari-Dêvaṅge kuchita-manneyar ddoreyê ǁ
baḍatanav âdud endu budha-kôṭi vimôhisi bandu munde nind |
aḍigiḍe bêḍalîvane manaṅ-giḍalîvane pôgi bannim end |
eḍey uḍiy âḍalîvane manô-mudadiṃ kared ittu keygaḷaṃ |
biḍe mugiv âje dal negal̤dan î-dhareyoḷ Eḍevâri-Dêvanê ǁ

Sûsaluger̤eya mûlasthâna-Mallikârjjuna-dêvarige Eḍavariyarasa Dêvarâsi-paṇḍitarige kâlaṃ
karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭa dharmma Hiriyaker̤eya keḷage gadde kamma 500 Kir̤uger̤eya
[page 324]keḷage hüdôṇṭa kammaṃ 100 dêvâlyakke pûrvvadalu bedalu mattaru 2 dêvara tâṇa-dîvigege gâṇa 1
dêvara paśchimadalu mûr̤u maneya nivêshana (usual final verses and phrases) int î-śâsanamaṃ bare-
daṃ Maṇḍaliya guru Trilôchana-dêvaru nyûnâksharam adhikâksharaṃ vâ tat sarvvaṃ pramâṇam iti

.... tu jagat-traya-nâtha jñâna-kaḷâdhâra-nêtra-tritaya phaṇi-pati vi .............. maṇḍana

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśraya śrî-pṛithvî-va ...... śvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭâraka Satyâśraya-kuḷa-tiḷaka

târaṃ-baraṃ Kalyâṇada-nelevîḍinoḷ sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râ ...... re tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ

II.
praṇata-pratyanta-dhâtrîśvarara talegaḷoḷ kayyan iṭṭi .... voḷ- |
guṇav opputtirppinaṃ rakshipan ati-kṛipeyiṃ mîr̤i mâr̤ .... |
........ andu kond ikkuvan adaṭaran â-bâḷa poyliṃ paḍalpaṭṭ- |
aṇeyal matt-aṭṭe taṭṭutt ir̤iyi ........ ya-Pâṇḍya-kshitîśaṃ ǁ
âtana tanayaṃ bhuvana- | khyâtaṃ Nṛiga-Nahusha-Naḷa-Bha ...... |
.... sauryyadoḷ ârppinoḷ | âtata-yaśadinde Vîra-Pâṇḍya-kshitipaṃ ǁ

svasti samadhigata ......... hâ-śabda mahâ-maṇḍaḷêśvaraṃ Kâñchî-pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ Yadu-vaṃ-
śâmbara-dyumaṇi ...... tâmaṇi nija-kula-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ parichchêdi-gaṇḍa Râjêndra-Chôḷa-
manôbhaṅga jayâ ........ j-Jagadêkamalla-Vîra-Pâṇḍya-Dêvaru Noṇambavâḍi-mûvattirchchâsira-
maṃ dushṭa ........ pratipâlanadiṃ Uchchaṅgiya nelavîḍinoḷu suka-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râ ......
.. ttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ

ghana-sauryyan abhayan âśrita- |
jana-kalpâvanijan a ........ adaṭara mallaṃ |
vinaya-nidhi vikrama-krama- |
dhanan ên ene yaśôdhikaṃ Sôvarasaṃ ǁ
â ....................... na- |
khyâtiya Sôbarasi sadubudha-stute negarddaḷ |

jâtege migil esekad ârppi . le mântanadoḷ ǁ
ant avarge tanujan âdaṃ |

.... bhû-bhuvana-stutan |
Antakan ene ripu-balakke Yaḍavari-Dêva ǁ
âtana vallabheyar jjaga- |
tî-taḷa-vi .. teyar gguṇâdhikeyaru sam- |
bhûta-śubha-matigaḷ enal î- |
bhûtaḷa[doḷ] pogaḷal aridu Dharaṇîdhraṅgaṃ ǁ
bhû-nute Chandala-Dêviy a- |
nûna-guṇânvitey enippa Gaṅgarasi sarô- |
jânane Honnarsiyum u- |
ddâniya śakti-trayaṅgaḷ andadin esevar ǁ
Hara-satige migilu rûpiṃ |
Sarasatig eṇey enipa bahu-kaḷâ-pariṇatiyiṃ |
[page 325]Harisutana satiya sobagina |
dorey ene Gaṅgavveg itara-satiyar ddoreye ǁ

mattam â-Eḍavari-Dêvana pratâpav ent endoḍe ǁ

IV.
paṇidaṃ boyd anya-sainya-dvipa-haya-bhaṭa-sandôhamaṃ tanna tôḷoḷ |
kuṇiyalk utsâhadindaṃ jaya-siri siri taḷt appiral tannan î-dhâ- |
riṇiyaṃ Pâṇḍyâvanîśaṅg aḷavaḍisuvan î-vârddhi-tîraṃ-baram ba- |
ṇḍaṇadoḷ mârkkoṇḍaraṃ taḷt ir̤id Eḍavari-Dêvaṃ jagat-stutyan âdaṃ ǁ
eḷey anituṃ rasâtaḷadoḷ ardire kaṇḍu Varâha-vêśamaṃ |
taḷedu Gadâdharaṃ negapi pott ireyuṃ kali kâydu nûṅkal ag- |
galisi daridratârṇṇavadoḷ ardda dharitriyan ôho tanna kô- |
ḍoḷe negahittu kêvaḷave bhû-nutav aṇṇana gandha-vâraṇa ǁ
odavida dânadindam eredaṅgam ârâtigam îva tôrppa kûr- |
idav enisirppa kôḍ-eraḍariṃ negard unnata-vaṃśadiṃ sagâ- |
trada kaḍu gâḍi nêtrada madhu-tsaviyindam agurvvu-vettu pôl- |
tudu digu-dantiyaṃ vijaya-kâraṇav aṇṇana gandha-vâraṇa ǁ

ant enisida pogarttegaṃ negarttegaṃ neleyâgi ǁ svasti samasta-prasasti-sahitaṃ tri-bhuvana-jana-
stutaṃ Jagadêkamalla-Vîra-Pâṇḍya-Dêva-chitta-sarôvara-râja-haṃsaṃ tri-bhuvana-praśaṃsa dâyiga-
manneya-mṛiga-bêṇṭekâr̤a ripu-maṇḍaḷa-sûr̤ekâr̤a kûḍi kûṭakke tappuva manneyara gaṇḍa kadana-
prachaṇḍa uddaṇḍa-ripu-mada-nivâraṇaṃ aṇṇana gandha-vâraṇa Chandraśêkhara-nakha-chandra-
chandrikâsvâdana-chakôraṃ sarasa-mṛidu-gêya-karṇṇapûra satya-Hariśchandra prajâ-pâḷanôpêndra
ity-âdi-nâmâḷikâ-virâjitar appa śrîmadu-Biḷiche-yeppattar̤a manneya Yeḍavariyarasaru Sûsula-
ger̤eyali sukhadiṃ râjyaṃ geyvuttam irddu śrîmatu pratâpa-Châḷukya-chakravartti-Jagadêkamalla-

(Persian characters and language).

Bismillah ir-rahmân ir-rahîm

I.
1Ba nâm-i jahân dar-i’ jân âfrîn
II.
Hakîm-i sakhun bar zabân âfrîn

[page 326]2ze barkat-i Muhammad Mustafa sallallah-o-alaihi wo sallam dar ahd-i-Sultân

3Muhammad Shâh Ibrâhim Khân Khân-i-Khânân nâm ast farkhunda hauz

4........................................................

5........................................................

6khub se’hat shudan hauz khwâham bast

(Kannaḍa characters and language).

bisamilla rahimânnu rahimma ǁ ha ǁ divâṇa Sulitâna Mahammadu Pâduśâha ha ǁ Khânakhâna-
sâhêbaru ǁ śrî-Gaṅgâ-Viśvêśvarâya namaḥ | nirvighnam astu ǁ

III.
namas tuṅga &c. ǁ 1 ǁ
IV.
sâmânyô’yaṃ dharma-sêtur &c. ǁ 2 ǁ
mad-vaṃśajâḥ &c. ǁ 3 ǁ
lâvakaś cha varâhaś cha mahishî kuñjaras tathâ |
upadêshṭâ cha karttâ cha shaḍ êtê svarga-gâminaḥ ǁ 4 ǁ
taṭâkaṃ dhana-nikshêpaṃ Brahma-sthâpyaṃ Śivâlayaṃ |
vanâni santatiḥ putrâḥ sapta-santânam uchyatê ǁ 5 ǁ

svasti śrî jayâbhyudaya-Śâlivâhana-śaka-varusha 1575 daneyâ Vijaya-saṃvatsarada Bhâdrapada-
sudha 5 Guruvâra-Svâtî-nakshatradalli baradanthâ śâsana ǁ

V.
Kusumâstraṃ sama-rûpa Sêkha-Malikaṃ vesarâda sukumâranaṃ |
hosa-saśi .. yaśôñchitaṃ daya-nidhiṃ dhura-vîra Lâr .. naguṃ |
śasi-śântaṃ sukumâra Baḍeya-Malikaṃ tat-sûnu Sêku-Mallikaṃ |
desey-artiyal saha śâsanavanu nilisirdud âd atisayaṃ ǁ 6 ǁ
dhareyoḷu Basavâpaṭṭaṇa- |
k ora-dakshiṇa-dikkil iruva Sêndra-dhareyoḷu |
paramâraṇyam ad âgire |
moreyiṭṭaru sakala-janaru chôrara bhayakaṃ ǁ 7 ǁ
nâḍigaru seṭṭaru jîgaḷu |
rûḍipa .... mârgga-mandi pêḷal bharadoḷu |
nâḍina dore Baḍeya-Mallikanu |
nôḍuvanêm uṇṭ id endu manasige tandaṃ ǁ 8 ǁ
ballidanu bahu-parâkrami |
nillade tâṃ pôgi sakalam eḷe-mara-tarugaḷan |
ellavanu katrisi mudadiṃ |
Mollipurav emba grâmavanu kaṭṭisidaṃ ǁ 9 ǁ
mûru-bhuvanadoḷu râjipa |
châru vichi . dalli mereva giriyoḷuv allina sarô- |
varav enisuva ker̤eyanu |
dhâruṇipati nilisi kîrttiyoḍa mun-deseyoḷu ǁ 10 ǁ
paramâ-Nandana-samvat- |
saradoḷu hajarattu Pâttuśâhage jaḍav âg- |
ire harasikoṇḍan oli Tâ- |
vareker̤eyaṃ nilisi Patushâ ........ nalu ǁ 11 ǁ
bittisuvenu gaḍi illade |
uttuma Râmêśa-Kâśig eḍey âḍuvarige |
nityaṃ kabb-âley âḍisiy |
.... ra pâl-aravaṭigeyan ikkuven enutaṃ ǁ 12 ǁ
[page 327]teṅgu rasa-vâḷe râjâ- |
naṅgaḷu modalâda nâgavalliya sahitaṃ |
hiṅgade bittisi prajegaḷa |
tuṅga-balaṃ naḍisikoṇḍa tave santasadiṃ ǁ 13 ǁ
yî-dharaṇiyu Basavapaṭṭaṇad |
âdiyoḷuṃ râya-rêkhe râjyadoḷ ellâ- |
mêdini ...... raṇyaṅgaḷal |
âda baḷikk init adanu sistige horatuṃ ǁ 14 ǁ
sutta chatu-sîme-gavuḍaru |
uttuma-nâḍigaru seṭṭi praje parivâraṃ |
aty-adhikânandadoḷu |
bittaradind oppi koṭṭa nûtana-bhûmiṃ ǁ 15 ǁ
Hinduvan âgali athavâ |
chhandadi tâṃ Musalmânan âdaḍe matt â- |
banda-dhore naḍasikoṇḍare |
chandrârkaru uḷḷadanaka kîrttiyan âḷvaṃ ǁ 16 ǁ
yidakke tappidare Hinduva |
mudadind ... Kâśiyali gôvaṃ koyidavan |
idakke Musalamâna tapalu |
vidhavidhadâ masîtiyali pandiya kondava ǁ 17 ǁ

kundade tâṃ pôda-phalavu paramâyushyaṃ |
munde Musalamâna naḍasalk â- |
nandadi Makkavanu pokka phalav ahud idariṃ ǁ 18 ǁ
dhore-râyanu Khânakhânige |
siri sampada hechchal endu yinit î-dharmava |
kara .... vidhanu Baḍeya-Mallikanu |
prati-bala-ma .. asahâ .. dada dhîraṃ ǁ 19 ǁ
dharey olagaṇa sat-puruśaru |
karuṇadoḷ î-śâsanavanu vôd î-ker̤eyaṃ |
nere kaṇḍ â-kshaṇadindaṃ |
pariharipudu sakala-sampadaṃ kai-sârgguṃ ǁ 23 ǁ

(usual final verses) śrî-Dêsa-kulakaraṇi Chikaṇṇa (others named) ivaru muntâda samasta-mahâ-nâḍu
î-râjyakke kartanâgi bandâtâ î-dharmava naḍisade .. kila mâḍidare nâḍigaru muntâdavaru ava-
rige hêḷi kêḷi goṇḍu naḍasade upêkshe mâḍida gauḍ-arasu Sivâchâra kulâchârake horagu ǁ Brâh-

44 At the same place, on the 2nd stone.


(Persian characters and language).

Allah
Muhammad
Abu-Bakr Umar Usmân Ali

1Bâ’adaz hamd-i Khudâ wo na’at-i Rasul alaihis-salat-o-was-satâm

2ânke dar âhde Pâdshâh-i-Dîn panâh Sultân Muhammad ibn-i Ibrâhim ‘Adil Shâh Ghâzi

[page 328]3mu’amala-i Sultánnagar takht-i istikhamat-i Khân-i Wâla makân Khân-i-Khanân Vazîr-i Hukumat wo

4sipâh sâlâr bûd. Khwâs-i bârgha-ai û Bari-Malik bin-i Lâr Khân ibn-i

5Shêkh Malik Havâldâr mu’amala-i mazkûr în hauz ra ke Musamma ba Wali

6Surûr ast basta basabab ânke darân rôzha andukai ta-ghye-ardar mizâj-i

7mubârak Bâdshâh pidîd âmad nazar kard ke chun shifâ rôzy shavad binâ-i hauz

8khwâham kard dar neyat ast bûd se’hat rôzai wafaâi shud nazar lâzim dîdah

9...... ba itmam rasanîd wo mauza âi Walipur ke bar hukm i firmân ashraf

10khâriji Vilâyat wo rakḥm-i mu’ âmala mazkûr ast ba nâm-i Shêkh Malik

11firzand-i Bari Malik ke ham nâṃ-i jadd-i khîsh ast ba sûrat-i inâm-i abdi

12marhamat ghashta har ke khalal kunad mal ûn wo zina zâdah bâshad. San 1064

13............................................... azîm buvad âb-i û mudâm

14chun shud ............................................ û ke Wali Surûr ast nâm

52 At Nalkudare (same hobli), on stone near the wall of the Brahmeśvara temple.


I.
namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ

svasti samasta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâdhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ Dvârâvatî-
pura-varâdhîśvaraṃ Yâdava-kuḷâmbara-dyumaṇi sarvvajña-chûḍâmaṇi Malerâja-râja Malaparoḷ
gaṇḍa gaṇḍa-bhêruṇḍan asahâya-śûra Śanivâra-siddhi Giridurgga-malla chalad-aṅka-Râma vairî-
bha-kaṇṭhîravaṃ Magara-râjya-nirmmûḷanaṃ Chôḷa-râjya-pratishṭhâchâryyanuṃ śrîmat-pratâpa-
chakravartti-Hoyiśaḷa-śrî-vîra-Nârasiṃha-Dêvaṃ Chôḷu-nâḍa Pâñchala-nelevîḍinoḷu dushṭa-nigraha-
śishṭa-pratipâḷanaṃ mâḍi sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyuttam ire ǁ

II.
dig-adhîśar vvârddhiyind attale maḍagidar â-diggajânîkamaṃ vâ- |
jigaḷaṃ vyômâgradindaṃ dinapan iḷipan â-dibya-ratnêchchheyiṃ Vâ- |
sugi Pâtâḷasthan âdand udadhi-vaḷayad urvvîtaḷaṃ ta[t-]sthan âdan- |
du gajâśva-brâta-ratnaṅgaḷan avarg uḷipaṃ vîra-Ballâḷa-bhûpaṃ ǁ
vîradoḷ unnatikke Yadu-vaṃśajaroḷ kali-Nârasiṃhanaṃ |
dhîrana vîrad êḷgegaḷa pêḷvaḍe kautukam intu nôḷpaḍ î- |
dhâriṇiyarkkaḷ app arasugaḷ palaraṃ tave kondu kôpadiṃ |
bhôrene Kâḍavaṃ Magara-Pâṇḍyana bennoḷu dhâḷi iṭṭanô |
vâridhi mêreyâgi dhareg orvvane gaṇḍanu Hoyśaṇêśvaraṃ ǁ
narapati Nârasiṃhanoḷ idirchchaḍ ad echchar̤ad emba bhîtiyiṃ |
haraṇada hânig añji Javanaṃ mar̤evokku barduṅkuvôpa râ- |
yara naḍu-bennoḷ uṇḍigeyan ottuven end amṛitâṃśu tâḷdan end |
eraḷeyan endaḍ ê-vogaḷvud unnatiyaṃ Śaśi-vaṃśa-ratnanaṃ ǁ
śrîge neley âgi vidyâ- |
śrîg âgaram enisit îgaḷ î-Nelkudare |
śrîge modal enisit î-bhû- |
bhâgadoḷ ↓1ûr-aḍeya-grâma-chûḍâratnaṃ ǁ

stâram enippud ûr-aḍeya-grâmavanuṃ pratipâlisutta tâṃ |
[page 330]dhâriṇiyalli vunnatan udâra-guṇaṃ dharey eyde baṇṇikuṃ |

nteyan olavinda Muddale-mahâsatiyaṃ negaḷd î-jagaj-janaṃ ǁ

bhû-nuta-Basavaṇana hasta-darppaṇa-taḷadoḷ ǁ

guṇiy enipaṃ saujanyada |

maṇiy enip ûr-aḍeya-Muṭṭan avanî-taḷadoḷ ǁ
vadanadoḷ âgaḷuṃ nalidu narchchisuvaḷ śruta-kânte santataṃ |
mudad esev-akshadoḷ nelasi yirppaḷ ad âvaga puṇya-kânte vun- |
mada-baḷa-bâhu-gêhad oḷagirdd atiśôbhise yîva-kânte sam- |
pada padavettud î-negaḷda vûr-aḍe-Chandranan êne baṇṇipeṃ ǁ
dharmmada Mêru dharmmada tavarmmane dharmmada bittu styadâ |

dharmma-nidhânan endu dhare kîrttisut irppudu Chandra-Dêvanaṃ ǁ
śrîma .......... Bôkana |
śrî-kîrttige nelegaḷâgi puṭṭidar îgaḷ |
śrîmad-Vaśishṭa-gôtraṃ |

bhâsura-têjadoḷ dinapan îveḍeg Arkkasutaṃ kaḷâgamâ- |
bhyâsadoḷ Abjagarbbhan uru-mantradoḷaṃ Suramantri bhôgadoḷ |

esev emba kaḷpa-taruvaṃ |
vosedum late vaḷḷi parvvid antire ninn î- |
pesar emba kîrtti-ravigaṃ |
posat âdudu â-Dêvaṇaṅge guṇa-vibhavaṅgaḷ ǁ

[page 331]śrîman-mahâpasâyita parama-viśvâsi mûliga-heggaḍe Bammayyanuṃ Basavayyanuṃ Padumayyanuṃ
svasti yama-niyama-svâdhyâya-dhyâna-dhâraṇa-maunânushṭhâna-japa-samâdhi-śîla-guṇa-sampanna-
ruṃ avupâsanâgnihôtra-dvija-guru dêvatâ-pûjâ-tatpararum appa śrîman-mahâ-nâḷ-prabhûtaruṃ parô-
pakâra-pariṇataruṃ parîkshâ-daksharuṃ prabhu-mantrôtśâha-śakti-traya-sampannarum appa Nel-
kudureya vûr-aḍeya-Śaṅkara-Dêvanuṃ Mâdayyanuṃ Bhâskara-Dêvanuṃ Harihara-Dêvanuṃ Muṭ-
ṭayyanuṃ Lôkayyanuṃ Abbuchiya Kallayyanuṃ Nârâyaṇa-Dêvanuṃ Dêvayyanuṃ Chandayyanuṃ
Satyaṇṇanuṃ Achyuta-Dêvan-oḷagâda vûr-aḍeyaru Śaka-varshaṃ 1156 neya Vijaya-saṃvatsarada
Mârggaśira-śu 10 Bṛi-Pushya-nakshatra-vyatiyapâta-Dhanus-saṅkrântiyalu Nelkudureya śrî-Brahmêś-
vara-dêvara aṅga-bhôga-raṅga-bhôga-khaṇḍa-sphuṭita-jîrṇṇôddhârakkam endu Bonteya Vâmarâsi-
gurugaḷa kâlaṃ karchchi dhârâ-pûrvvakaṃ mâḍi biṭṭa bhûmi (12 lines following contain details of gift and usual final phrases and verses) vûr-oḍeya Chandra-Dêvana barepa maṅgaḷa mahâ śrî śrî
vijeyad-Daśakîrtti-dêvar vvirachisidar eseva śâsana-kṛitiyaṃ gâṇadalu aravân-eṇṇe Pasuvagêriya ..

61 At the same village, on a stone near the road in the back-yard.


I.
namas tuṅga-&c. ǁ

.......... bhuja vinamra ............ ṇika-stôma-marîchi-mañjarî-virâji .... pâda ............
..... maṇi Vikramâṅka .................... sta-bhuvanâśrayaṃ śrî-pṛithvî-vallabhaṃ mahârâjâ-
dhirâjaṃ paramêśvaraṃ parama-bhaṭṭârakaṃ Satyâ ........ tiḷakaṃ Châḷukyâbharaṇaṃ śrîmat-
Tribhuvanamalla ........ ya-râjyam uttarôttarâbhivṛiddhi-prava .... nam â-chandrârkka-târaṃ
saluttam ire tat-pâda-padmôpajîvi ǁ

II.
........ ḷârppita-nakha-mukuraṃ .......... |
jana-rakshâ-śânti-dîkshâ-guru vijaya . krânta .... lakshmî- |
.. vâsaṃ châru-chandra ...... viśada-yaśô-vallarî-vyâpta-lôkaṃ |
vanadhi-vyâvêshṭitôrvvî ........ sedan â-Râya-Pâṇḍya-kshitîśaṃ ǁ

.... mahâ- ...... Kâḷâñjapura-varâdhîśvaraṃ nija-kuḷa-kamaḷa-mârttaṇḍaṃ parichchhêdi-gaṇ-
ḍaṃ Râjiga-Chôḷa-manôbhaṅgaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Dêva-pâdâbja-bhṛiṅgaṃ nâmâdi-samasta-
praśasti-sahitaṃ śrîmat-Tribhuvanamalla-Râya-Pâṇḍya-Dêvaru Noḷambavâḍi-mûvattirchchhâsiramu-
maṃ Sântaḷige-sâsiramumaṃ tri-bhôgâbhyantaraṃ dushṭa-nigraha-śishṭa-pratipâḷanaḍiṃ pâḷisuttuṃ
râjadhâ ........ vina neleviḍinoḷu sukha-saṅkathâ-vinôdadiṃ râjyaṃ geyyuttam ire | tat-pâda-
padmôpajîvi ǁ

kanda ǁ
III.
nambida râya ...... ḷaṅg |
imbine sâmrâjya-râjyadoḷu nilisida peṃ- |
paṃ be ...... dhâtrig a- |
ḷumba parichchhêdi-gaṇḍa Pallava-Râya ǁ
Turaka-ma .. ta parid eydi |
........ kaydu-viḍiye pul-viḍiyade nint |
ari-si ........... pari |
dhurake parichchhêdi-gaṇḍa Pallava-Râya ǁ
âtana bi ...... dagradoḷu vîra-bhaya- |
.... śaradiṃ khacharâkṛitiyiṃ .... rddanaṃ |
bhûtala- .. kravarttiya ba ............. |
dûtanan ikkidaṃ dharege mech ...... Arjjunan ikkuv-andadiṃ ǁ

â-mahâ-sâmantaṃ vîra-lakshmî-kântam ............ nistâraṃ śrîmat-parichchhêdi-gaṇḍa Pallava-
Râya Biḷiche-yeppattumaṃ Dummi-hanneraḍumaṃ tri-bhôgâbhyantaraṃ dusḥta-nigraha-śishṭa-
pratipâḷanadiṃ pâḷisuttam ire ǁ

kanda ǁ
IV.
dhîraṃ Sômana doreg oreg |
âruṃ nindapar î-Kṛitayuga-Trête-Dvâ- |
pâraṃ-Kali-yugadoḷagaṇa |
bîrar udâra-pratâpigaḷu dharmma-parar ǁ
[page 333]kadanadoḷ ânt ari-bhûparan |
adirade beṅkoṇḍa tanna pempu urvvareyaṃ |
pudid ire pâḷisi dhâtriyan |
odavisidaṃ guṇa-vibhâsi Sôva-nṛipâḷaṃ ǁ

â-mahâ-sâmantaṃ vîra-lakshmî-kântaṃ sishṭa-nidhânaṃ dâna-Kânînaṃ nâmâdi-samasta-prasasti-
sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-sâmanta-Sômarasar â-Biḷichey-eḷpattar̤alli manneyamaṃ sad-dharmma-prati-
pâḷanadiṃ pâḷisuttam ire śrî svasti samasta-vastu-guṇa-sampannaṃ nuḍidu mattennaṃ śishṭa-janâ-
dhâraṃ gôtra-vistâraṃ sakaḷa-yâchaka-brinda-sandôha-sahâya ... dâna-Kânînaṃ vibudha-
vanaja-vana-kaḷahaṃsaṃ Sarasvatî-kaṇṭhâvataṃsaṃ dêva-dvija-guru-pâdâbja-bhṛiṅga sâhasôttuṅga-
nâmâdi-samasta-prasasti-sahitaṃ śrîman-mahâ-prabhu Kêśi-râjana mahatvânubhâvam ent endaḍe ǁ

kanda ǁ

purushârtthada kaṇi satyada |

karam arttiyinde pogaḷalu |

vṛitta ǁ

IX.

taḍeyade kêḷ udâtta-guṇan iṃ tiḷi yammavan endu gallamaṃ |
miḍi miḍidandu tây kalise kaltan akhaṇḍita-chaṇḍa-vikrama ǁ
.. ḍumaneya baykey Irugaṃ |
paḍed oḍave budhâḷig anyar ârjjisida dhanaṃ |
kaḍala naḍuvaṇa dharâdharad |
eḍeyaṇa Phaṇipatiya peḍeya mâṇikam enikuṃ ǁ
vinayâmbhônidhi satya-śaucha-niḷayaṃ sad-dharmma-Dharmmâtmajaṃ |
vanadhi-vyâvr̤ita-dhâtri-vêshṭita-yaśaṃ nêtrâmbujâtaṃ jagaj- |
jana-pûjyaṃ sujanaika-bândhavan iḷâ-lôkaika-kaḷpa-drumaṃ |
